</dd><dt> </dt><dd> </dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.nbreservationblocks" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.nbreservationblocks</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
储备的内存block的数量(译者注:就像石油储备一样)。当发生out of memory 异常的时候，我们可以用这些内存在RegionServer停止之前做清理操作。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">4</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.zookeeper.dns.interface" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.zookeeper.dns.interface</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当使用DNS的时候，Zookeeper用来上报的IP地址的网络接口名字。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">default</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.zookeeper.dns.nameserver" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.zookeeper.dns.nameserver</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当使用DNS的时候，Zookeepr使用的DNS的域名或者IP 地址，Zookeeper用它来确定和master用来进行通讯的域名.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">default</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.dns.interface" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.dns.interface</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当使用DNS的时候，RegionServer用来上报的IP地址的网络接口名字。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">default</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.dns.nameserver" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.dns.nameserver</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当使用DNS的时候，RegionServer使用的DNS的域名或者IP 地址，RegionServer用它来确定和master用来进行通讯的域名.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">default</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.master.dns.interface" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.master.dns.interface</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当使用DNS的时候，Master用来上报的IP地址的网络接口名字。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">default</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.master.dns.nameserver" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.master.dns.nameserver</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当使用DNS的时候，RegionServer使用的DNS的域名或者IP 地址，Master用它来确定用来进行通讯的域名.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">default</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.balancer.period%0A%20%20%20%20" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.balancer.period</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Master执行region balancer的间隔。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">300000</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regions.slop" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.regions.slop</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当任一区域服务器有average + (average * slop)个分区，将会执行重新均衡。默认 20% slop .</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认:0.2</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.master.logcleaner.ttl" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.master.logcleaner.ttl</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Hlog存在于.oldlogdir 文件夹的最长时间, 超过了就会被 Master 的线程清理掉.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">600000</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.master.logcleaner.plugins" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.master.logcleaner.plugins</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
LogsCleaner服务会执行的一组LogCleanerDelegat。值用逗号间隔的文本表示。这些WAL/HLog cleaners会按顺序调用。可以把先调用的放在前面。你可以实现自己的LogCleanerDelegat，加到Classpath下，然后在这里写下类的全称。一般都是加在默认值的前面。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.TimeToLiveLogCleaner</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.global.memstore.upperLimit" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.global.memstore.upperLimit</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
单个region server的全部memtores的最大值。超过这个值，一个新的update操作会被挂起，强制执行flush操作。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">0.4</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.global.memstore.lowerLimit" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.global.memstore.lowerLimit</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当强制执行flush操作的时候，当低于这个值的时候，flush会停止。默认是堆大小的 35% . 如果这个值和 hbase.regionserver.global.memstore.upperLimit 相同就意味着当update操作因为内存限制被挂起时，会尽量少的执行flush(译者注:一旦执行flush，值就会比下限要低，不再执行)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">0.35</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.server.thread.wakefrequency" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.server.thread.wakefrequency</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
service工作的sleep间隔，单位毫秒。 可以作为service线程的sleep间隔，比如log roller.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">10000</code></p>
</dd><dt>hbase.server.versionfile.writeattempts</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
退出前尝试写版本文件的次数。每次尝试由 hbase.server.thread.wakefrequency 毫秒数间隔。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: 3</p>
</dd><dd> </dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.hregion.memstore.flush.size" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.hregion.memstore.flush.size</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当memstore的大小超过这个值的时候，会flush到磁盘。这个值被一个线程每隔hbase.server.thread.wakefrequency检查一下。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认:134217728</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.hregion.preclose.flush.size" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.hregion.preclose.flush.size</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当一个region中的memstore的大小大于这个值的时候，我们又触发了close.会先运行“pre-flush”操作，清理这个需要关闭的memstore，然后将这个region下线。当一个region下线了，我们无法再进行任何写操作。如果一个memstore很大的时候，flush操作会消耗很多时间。"pre-flush"操作意味着在region下线之前，会先把memstore清空。这样在最终执行close操作的时候，flush操作会很快。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">5242880</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.hregion.memstore.block.multiplier" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.hregion.memstore.block.multiplier</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果memstore有hbase.hregion.memstore.block.multiplier倍数的hbase.hregion.flush.size的大小，就会阻塞update操作。这是为了预防在update高峰期会导致的失控。如果不设上界，flush的时候会花很长的时间来合并或者分割，最坏的情况就是引发out of memory异常。(译者注:内存操作的速度和磁盘不匹配，需要等一等。原文似乎有误)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">2</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.hregion.memstore.mslab.enabled" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.hregion.memstore.mslab.enabled</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
体验特性：启用memStore分配本地缓冲区。这个特性是为了防止在大量写负载的时候堆的碎片过多。这可以减少GC操作的频率。(GC有可能会Stop the world)(译者注：实现的原理相当于预分配内存，而不是每一个值都要从堆里分配)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">true</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.hregion.max.filesize" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.hregion.max.filesize</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
最大HStoreFile大小。若某个列族的HStoreFile增长达到这个值，这个Hegion会被切割成两个。 默认: 10G.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认:10737418240</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.hstore.compactionThreshold" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.hstore.compactionThreshold</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当一个HStore含有多于这个值的HStoreFiles(每一个memstore flush产生一个HStoreFile)的时候，会执行一个合并操作，把这HStoreFiles写成一个。这个值越大，需要合并的时间就越长。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">3</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.hstore.blockingStoreFiles" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.hstore.blockingStoreFiles</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当一个HStore含有多于这个值的HStoreFiles(每一个memstore flush产生一个HStoreFile)的时候，会执行一个合并操作，update会阻塞直到合并完成，直到超过了hbase.hstore.blockingWaitTime的值</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">7</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.hstore.blockingWaitTime" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.hstore.blockingWaitTime</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
hbase.hstore.blockingStoreFiles所限制的StoreFile数量会导致update阻塞，这个时间是来限制阻塞时间的。当超过了这个时间，HRegion会停止阻塞update操作，不过合并还有没有完成。默认为90s.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">90000</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.hstore.compaction.max" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.hstore.compaction.max</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
每个“小”合并的HStoreFiles最大数量。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">10</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.hregion.majorcompaction" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.hregion.majorcompaction</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
一个Region中的所有HStoreFile的major compactions的时间间隔。默认是1天。 设置为0就是禁用这个功能。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">86400000</code></p>
</dd><dt>hbase.storescanner.parallel.seek.enable</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
允许 StoreFileScanner 并行搜索 StoreScanner, 一个在特定条件下降低延迟的特性。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: false</p>
</dd><dd> </dd><dt>hbase.storescanner.parallel.seek.threads</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
并行搜索特性打开后，默认线程池大小。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: 10</p>
</dd><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.mapreduce.hfileoutputformat.blocksize" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.mapreduce.hfileoutputformat.blocksize</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
MapReduce中HFileOutputFormat可以写 storefiles/hfiles. 这个值是hfile的blocksize的最小值。通常在HBase写Hfile的时候，bloocksize是由table schema(HColumnDescriptor)决定的，但是在mapreduce写的时候，我们无法获取schema中blocksize。这个值越小，你的索引就越大，你随机访问需要获取的数据就越小。如果你的cell都很小，而且你需要更快的随机访问，可以把这个值调低。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">65536</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hfile.block.cache.size" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hfile.block.cache.size</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
分配给HFile/StoreFile的block cache占最大堆(-Xmx setting)的比例。默认0.25意思是分配25%，设置为0就是禁用，但不推荐。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认:0.25</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.hash.type" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.hash.type</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
哈希函数使用的哈希算法。可以选择两个值:: murmur (MurmurHash) 和 jenkins (JenkinsHash). 这个哈希是给 bloom filters用的.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">murmur</code></p>
</dd><dt>hfile.block.index.cacheonwrite</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
This allows to put non-root multi-level index blocks into the block cache at the time the index is being written.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: false</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hfile.index.block.max.size" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hfile.index.block.max.size</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
When the size of a leaf-level, intermediate-level, or root-level index block in a multi-level block index grows to this size, the block is written out and a new block is started.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: 131072</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hfile.format.version" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hfile.format.version</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The HFile format version to use for new files. Set this to 1 to test backwards-compatibility. The default value of this option should be consistent with FixedFileTrailer.MAX_VERSION.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: 2</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="io.storefile.bloom.block.size" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>io.storefile.bloom.block.size</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The size in bytes of a single block ("chunk") of a compound Bloom filter. This size is approximate, because Bloom blocks can only be inserted at data block boundaries, and the number of keys per data block varies.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: 131072</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hfile.block.bloom.cacheonwrite" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hfile.block.bloom.cacheonwrite</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Enables cache-on-write for inline blocks of a compound Bloom filter.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: false</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.rs.cacheblocksonwrite" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.rs.cacheblocksonwrite</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Whether an HFile block should be added to the block cache when the block is finished.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: false</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.rpc.server.engine" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.rpc.server.engine</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Implementation of org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.RpcServerEngine to be used for server RPC call marshalling.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.ProtobufRpcServerEngine</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.ipc.client.tcpnodelay" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.ipc.client.tcpnodelay</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Set no delay on rpc socket connections. See http://docs.oracle.com/javase/1.5.0/docs/api/java/net/Socket.html#getTcpNoDelay()</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: true</p>
</dd><dd> </dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.master.keytab.file" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.master.keytab.file</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HMaster server验证登录使用的kerberos keytab 文件路径。(译者注：HBase使用Kerberos实现安全)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认:<code class="varname"></code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.master.kerberos.principal" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.master.kerberos.principal</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
例如. "hbase/_HOST@EXAMPLE.COM". HMaster运行需要使用 kerberos principal name. principal name 可以在: user/hostname@DOMAIN 中获取. 如果 "_HOST" 被用做hostname portion，需要使用实际运行的hostname来替代它。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认:<code class="varname"></code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.keytab.file" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.keytab.file</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HRegionServer验证登录使用的kerberos keytab 文件路径。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认:<code class="varname"></code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.kerberos.principal" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.kerberos.principal</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
例如. "hbase/_HOST@EXAMPLE.COM". HRegionServer运行需要使用 kerberos principal name. principal name 可以在: user/hostname@DOMAIN 中获取. 如果 "_HOST" 被用做hostname portion，需要使用实际运行的hostname来替代它。在这个文件中必须要有一个entry来描述 hbase.regionserver.keytab.file</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认:<code class="varname"></code></p>
</dd><dt>hadoop.policy.file</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The policy configuration file used by RPC servers to make authorization decisions on client requests. Only used when HBase security is enabled.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: hbase-policy.xml</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.superuser" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.superuser</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
List of users or groups (comma-separated), who are allowed full privileges, regardless of stored ACLs, across the cluster. Only used when HBase security is enabled.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default:</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.auth.key.update.interval" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.auth.key.update.interval</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The update interval for master key for authentication tokens in servers in milliseconds. Only used when HBase security is enabled.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: 86400000</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.auth.token.max.lifetime" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.auth.token.max.lifetime</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The maximum lifetime in milliseconds after which an authentication token expires. Only used when HBase security is enabled.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: 604800000</p>
</dd><dd> </dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="zookeeper.session.timeout" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">zookeeper.session.timeout</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
ZooKeeper 会话超时.HBase把这个值传递改zk集群，向他推荐一个会话的最大超时时间。详见http://hadoop.apache.org/zookeeper/docs/current/zookeeperProgrammers.html#ch_zkSessions "The client sends a requested timeout, the server responds with the timeout that it can give the client. "。 单位是毫秒</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">180000</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="zookeeper.znode.parent" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">zookeeper.znode.parent</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
ZooKeeper中的HBase的根ZNode。所有的HBase的ZooKeeper会用这个目录配置相对路径。默认情况下，所有的HBase的ZooKeeper文件路径是用相对路径，所以他们会都去这个目录下面。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">/hbase</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="zookeeper.znode.rootserver" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">zookeeper.znode.rootserver</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
ZNode 保存的 根region的路径. 这个值是由Master来写，client和regionserver 来读的。如果设为一个相对地址，父目录就是 ${zookeeper.znode.parent}.默认情形下，意味着根region的路径存储在/hbase/root-region-server.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">root-region-server</code></p>
</dd><dt><br>
zookeeper.znode.acl.parent</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Root ZNode for access control lists.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: acl</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.coprocessor.region.classes" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.coprocessor.region.classes</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A comma-separated list of Coprocessors that are loaded by default on all tables. For any override coprocessor method, these classes will be called in order. After implementing your own Coprocessor, just put it in HBase's classpath and add the fully qualified
 class name here. A coprocessor can also be loaded on demand by setting HTableDescriptor.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default:</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.coprocessor.master.classes" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.coprocessor.master.classes</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A comma-separated list of org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.MasterObserver coprocessors that are loaded by default on the active HMaster process. For any implemented coprocessor methods, the listed classes will be called in order. After implementing your
 own MasterObserver, just put it in HBase's classpath and add the fully qualified class name here.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default:</p>
</dd><dd> </dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.zookeeper.quorum" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.zookeeper.quorum</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Zookeeper集群的地址列表，用逗号分割。例如："host1.mydomain.com,host2.mydomain.com,host3.mydomain.com".默认是localhost,是给伪分布式用的。要修改才能在完全分布式的情况下使用。如果在hbase-env.sh设置了HBASE_MANAGES_ZK，这些ZooKeeper节点就会和HBase一起启动。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">localhost</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.zookeeper.peerport" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.zookeeper.peerport</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
ZooKeeper节点使用的端口。详细参见：http://hadoop.apache.org/zookeeper/docs/r3.1.1/zookeeperStarted.html#sc_RunningReplicatedZooKeeper</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">2888</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.zookeeper.leaderport" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.zookeeper.leaderport</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
ZooKeeper用来选择Leader的端口，详细参见：http://hadoop.apache.org/zookeeper/docs/r3.1.1/zookeeperStarted.html#sc_RunningReplicatedZooKeeper</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">3888</code></p>
</dd><dt>hbase.zookeeper.useMulti</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Instructs HBase to make use of ZooKeeper's multi-update functionality. This allows certain ZooKeeper operations to complete more quickly and prevents some issues with rare Replication failure scenarios (see the release note of HBASE-2611 for an example). IMPORTANT:
 only set this to true if all ZooKeeper servers in the cluster are on version 3.4+ and will not be downgraded. ZooKeeper versions before 3.4 do not support multi-update and will not fail gracefully if multi-update is invoked (see ZOOKEEPER-1495).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: false</p>
</dd><dd> </dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.zookeeper.property.initLimit" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.zookeeper.property.initLimit</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
ZooKeeper的zoo.conf中的配置。 初始化synchronization阶段的ticks数量限制</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">10</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.zookeeper.property.syncLimit" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.zookeeper.property.syncLimit</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
ZooKeeper的zoo.conf中的配置。 发送一个请求到获得承认之间的ticks的数量限制</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">5</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.zookeeper.property.dataDir" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.zookeeper.property.dataDir</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
ZooKeeper的zoo.conf中的配置。 快照的存储位置</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">${hbase.tmp.dir}/zookeeper</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.zookeeper.property.clientPort" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.zookeeper.property.clientPort</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
ZooKeeper的zoo.conf中的配置。 客户端连接的端口</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">2181</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.zookeeper.property.maxClientCnxns" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.zookeeper.property.maxClientCnxns</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
ZooKeeper的zoo.conf中的配置。 ZooKeeper集群中的单个节点接受的单个Client(以IP区分)的请求的并发数。这个值可以调高一点，防止在单机和伪分布式模式中出问题。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">300</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.rest.port" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.rest.port</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase REST server的端口</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">8080</code></p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.rest.readonly" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><code class="varname">hbase.rest.readonly</code></dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
定义REST server的运行模式。可以设置成如下的值： false: 所有的HTTP请求都是被允许的 - GET/PUT/POST/DELETE. true:只有GET请求是被允许的</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认: <code class="varname">false</code></p>
</dd><dt>hbase.defaults.for.version.skip</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Set to true to skip the 'hbase.defaults.for.version' check. Setting this to true can be useful in contexts other than the other side of a maven generation; i.e. running in an ide. You'll want to set this boolean to true to avoid seeing the RuntimException complaint:
 "hbase-default.xml file seems to be for and old version of HBase (\${hbase.version}), this version is X.X.X-SNAPSHOT"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: false</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.coprocessor.abortonerror" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.coprocessor.abortonerror</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Set to true to cause the hosting server (master or regionserver) to abort if a coprocessor throws a Throwable object that is not IOException or a subclass of IOException. Setting it to true might be useful in development environments where one wants to terminate
 the server as soon as possible to simplify coprocessor failure analysis.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: false</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.online.schema.update.enable" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.online.schema.update.enable</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Set true to enable online schema changes. This is an experimental feature. There are known issues modifying table schemas at the same time a region split is happening so your table needs to be quiescent or else you have to be running with splits disabled.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: false</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.table.lock.enable" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.table.lock.enable</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Set to true to enable locking the table in zookeeper for schema change operations. Table locking from master prevents concurrent schema modifications to corrupt table state.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: true</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="dfs.support.append" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>dfs.support.append</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Does HDFS allow appends to files? This is an hdfs config. set in here so the hdfs client will do append support. You must ensure that this config. is true serverside too when running hbase (You will have to restart your cluster after setting it).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: true</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.thrift.minWorkerThreads" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.thrift.minWorkerThreads</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The "core size" of the thread pool. New threads are created on every connection until this many threads are created.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: 16</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.thrift.maxWorkerThreads" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.thrift.maxWorkerThreads</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The maximum size of the thread pool. When the pending request queue overflows, new threads are created until their number reaches this number. After that, the server starts dropping connections.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: 1000</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.thrift.maxQueuedRequests" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.thrift.maxQueuedRequests</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The maximum number of pending Thrift connections waiting in the queue. If there are no idle threads in the pool, the server queues requests. Only when the queue overflows, new threads are added, up to hbase.thrift.maxQueuedRequests threads.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: 1000</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.offheapcache.percentage" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.offheapcache.percentage</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The amount of off heap space to be allocated towards the experimental off heap cache. If you desire the cache to be disabled, simply set this value to 0.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: 0</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.data.umask.enable" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.data.umask.enable</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Enable, if true, that file permissions should be assigned to the files written by the regionserver</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: false</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.data.umask" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.data.umask</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
File permissions that should be used to write data files when hbase.data.umask.enable is true</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: 000</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.metrics.showTableName" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.metrics.showTableName</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Whether to include the prefix "tbl.tablename" in per-column family metrics. If true, for each metric M, per-cf metrics will be reported for tbl.T.cf.CF.M, if false, per-cf metrics will be aggregated by column-family across tables, and reported for cf.CF.M.
 In both cases, the aggregated metric M across tables and cfs will be reported.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: true</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.metrics.exposeOperationTimes" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.metrics.exposeOperationTimes</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Whether to report metrics about time taken performing an operation on the region server. Get, Put, Delete, Increment, and Append can all have their times exposed through Hadoop metrics per CF and per region.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: true</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.master.hfilecleaner.plugins" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.master.hfilecleaner.plugins</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A comma-separated list of HFileCleanerDelegate invoked by the HFileCleaner service. These HFiles cleaners are called in order, so put the cleaner that prunes the most files in front. To implement your own HFileCleanerDelegate, just put it in HBase's classpath
 and add the fully qualified class name here. Always add the above default log cleaners in the list as they will be overwritten in hbase-site.xml.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.cleaner.TimeToLiveHFileCleaner</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.catalog.timeout" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.regionserver.catalog.timeout</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Timeout value for the Catalog Janitor from the regionserver to META.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: 600000</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.master.catalog.timeout" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.master.catalog.timeout</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Timeout value for the Catalog Janitor from the master to META.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: 600000</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.config.read.zookeeper.config" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.config.read.zookeeper.config</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Set to true to allow HBaseConfiguration to read the zoo.cfg file for ZooKeeper properties. Switching this to true is not recommended, since the functionality of reading ZK properties from a zoo.cfg file has been deprecated.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: false</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.snapshot.enabled" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.snapshot.enabled</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Set to true to allow snapshots to be taken / restored / cloned.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: true</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.rest.threads.max" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.rest.threads.max</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The maximum number of threads of the REST server thread pool. Threads in the pool are reused to process REST requests. This controls the maximum number of requests processed concurrently. It may help to control the memory used by the REST server to avoid OOM
 issues. If the thread pool is full, incoming requests will be queued up and wait for some free threads. The default is 100.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: 100</p>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" name="hbase.rest.threads.min" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>hbase.rest.threads.min</dt><dd>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The minimum number of threads of the REST server thread pool. The thread pool always has at least these number of threads so the REST server is ready to serve incoming requests. The default is 2.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Default: 2</p>
</dd><dt> </dt></dl>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="3.2.  hbase-env.sh" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t49" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.env.sh" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.3.2. <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-env.sh</code></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
在这个文件里面设置HBase环境变量。比如可以配置JVM启动的堆大小或者GC的参数。你还可在这里配置HBase的参数，如Log位置，niceness(译者注:优先级)，ssh参数还有pid文件的位置等等。打开文件<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">conf/hbase-env.sh</code>细读其中的内容。每个选项都是有详尽的注释的。你可以在此添加自己的环境变量。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这个文件的改动系统HBase重启才能生效。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="3.3. log4j.properties" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t50" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="log4j" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.3.3. <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">log4j.properties</code></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
编辑这个文件可以改变HBase的日志的级别，轮滚策略等等。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这个文件的改动系统HBase重启才能生效。 日志级别的更改会影响到HBase UI</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="3.4. 重要的配置" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div class="section" title="3.7. 连接HBase集群的客户端配置和依赖" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t51" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client_dependencies" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.3.4. 连接HBase集群的客户端配置和依赖</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
因为HBase的Master有可能转移，所有客户端需要访问ZooKeeper来获得现在的位置。ZooKeeper会保存这些值。因此客户端必须知道Zookeeper集群的地址，否则做不了任何事情。通常这个地址存在 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-site.xml</code> 里面，客户端可以从<code class="varname">CLASSPATH</code>取出这个文件.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果你是使用一个IDE来运行HBase客户端，你需要将<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">conf/</code>放入你的 classpath,这样 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-site.xml</code>就可以找到了，(或者把hbase-site.xml放到 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">src/test/resources</code>，这样测试的时候可以使用).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase客户端最小化的依赖是 hbase, hadoop, log4j, commons-logging, commons-lang, 和 ZooKeeper ，这些jars 需要能在 <code class="varname">CLASSPATH</code> 中找到。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
下面是一个基本的客户端 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-site.xml</code> 例子：</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_21_6632399" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">&lt;?xml version="1.0"?&gt;
&lt;?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="configuration.xsl"?&gt;
&lt;configuration&gt;
  &lt;property&gt;
    &lt;name&gt;hbase.zookeeper.quorum&lt;/name&gt;
    &lt;value&gt;example1,example2,example3&lt;/value&gt;
    &lt;description&gt;The directory shared by region servers.
    &lt;/description&gt;
  &lt;/property&gt;
&lt;/configuration&gt;
          </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<div class="section" title="3.7.1. Java客户端配置" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t52" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d613e2045" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.3.4.1. Java客户端配置</h4>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 class="subtitle" style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t53" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>Java是如何读到<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-site.xml</code> 的内容的</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Java客户端使用的配置信息是被映射在一个<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HBaseConfiguration" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBaseConfiguration</a> 实例中. HBaseConfiguration有一个工厂方法, <code class="code">HBaseConfiguration.create();</code>,运行这个方法的时候，他会去<code class="varname">CLASSPATH</code>,下找<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-site.xml</code>，读他发现的第一个配置文件的内容。
 (这个方法还会去找<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-default.xml</code> ; <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase.X.X.X.jar</code>里面也会有一个an hbase-default.xml). 不使用任何<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-site.xml</code>文件直接通过Java代码注入配置信息也是可以的。例如，你可以用编程的方式设置ZooKeeper信息，只要这样做:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_22_3025882" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">Configuration config = HBaseConfiguration.create();
config.set("hbase.zookeeper.quorum", "localhost");  // Here we are running zookeeper locally</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果有多ZooKeeper实例，你可以使用逗号列表。(就像在<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-site.xml</code> 文件中做得一样). 这个 <code class="classname">Configuration</code> 实例会被传递到 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HTable</a>,
 之类的实例里面去.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="footnotes" style="margin:0px"><br>
<hr width="100" align="left" style="margin:0.6em; border-top-width:0px; border-right-width:0px; border-left-width:0px; border-style:solid; border-color:rgb(206,206,206)">
<div class="footnote" style="margin:0px"></div>
<div class="footnote" style="margin:0px"></div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="2.1. 需要的软件" style="margin:0px">
<div class="section" title="2.3. 配置例子" style="margin:0px">
<div class="section" title="2.3.1. 简单的分布式HBase安装" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t54" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="example_config" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.4. 配置示例</h2>
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t55" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d613e896" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.4.1. 简单的分布式HBase安装</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这里是一个10节点的HBase的简单示例，这里的配置都是基本的，节点名为 <code class="varname">example0</code>, <code class="varname">example1</code>... 一直到 <code class="varname">example9</code> . HBase Master 和 HDFS namenode 运作在同一个节点 <code class="varname">example0</code>上. RegionServers 运行在节点 <code class="varname">example1</code>-<code class="varname">example9</code>.
 一个 3-节点 ZooKeeper 集群运行在<code class="varname">example1</code>, <code class="varname">example2</code>, 和 <code class="varname">example3</code>，端口保持默认. ZooKeeper 的数据保存在目录 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">/export/zookeeper</code>. 下面我们展示主要的配置文件-- <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-site.xml</code>, <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">regionservers</code>,
 和 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-env.sh</code>-- 这些文件可以在 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">conf</code>目录找到.</p>
<div class="section" title="2.3.1.1. hbase-site.xml" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t56" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase_site" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.4.1.1. <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-site.xml</code></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_23_7259774" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">&lt;?xml version="1.0"?&gt;
&lt;?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="configuration.xsl"?&gt;
&lt;configuration&gt;
  &lt;property&gt;
    &lt;name&gt;hbase.zookeeper.quorum&lt;/name&gt;
    &lt;value&gt;example1,example2,example3&lt;/value&gt;
    &lt;description&gt;The directory shared by RegionServers.
    &lt;/description&gt;
  &lt;/property&gt;
  &lt;property&gt;
    &lt;name&gt;hbase.zookeeper.property.dataDir&lt;/name&gt;
    &lt;value&gt;/export/zookeeper&lt;/value&gt;
    &lt;description&gt;Property from ZooKeeper's config zoo.cfg.
    The directory where the snapshot is stored.
    &lt;/description&gt;
  &lt;/property&gt;
  &lt;property&gt;
    &lt;name&gt;hbase.rootdir&lt;/name&gt;
    &lt;value&gt;hdfs://example0:9000/hbase&lt;/value&gt;
    &lt;description&gt;The directory shared by RegionServers.
    &lt;/description&gt;
  &lt;/property&gt;
  &lt;property&gt;
    &lt;name&gt;hbase.cluster.distributed&lt;/name&gt;
    &lt;value&gt;true&lt;/value&gt;
    &lt;description&gt;The mode the cluster will be in. Possible values are
      false: standalone and pseudo-distributed setups with managed Zookeeper
      true: fully-distributed with unmanaged Zookeeper Quorum (see hbase-env.sh)
    &lt;/description&gt;
  &lt;/property&gt;
&lt;/configuration&gt;

          </pre></div>
<div class="section" title="2.3.1.2. regionservers" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t57" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="regionservers" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.4.1.2. <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">regionservers</code></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这个文件把RegionServer的节点列了下来。在这个例子里面我们让所有的节点都运行RegionServer,除了第一个节点 <code class="varname">example1</code>，它要运行 HBase Master 和 HDFS namenode</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_24_5605104" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">    example1
    example3
    example4
    example5
    example6
    example7
    example8
    example9
          </pre></div>
<div class="section" title="2.3.1.3. hbase-env.sh" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t58" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase_env" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.4.1.3. <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-env.sh</code></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
下面我们用<span class="command"><strong>diff</strong></span> 命令来展示 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-env.sh</code> 文件相比默认变化的部分. 我们把HBase的堆内存设置为4G而不是默认的1G.</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_25_8410536" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">    
$ git diff hbase-env.sh
diff --git a/conf/hbase-env.sh b/conf/hbase-env.sh
index e70ebc6..96f8c27 100644
--- a/conf/hbase-env.sh
+++ b/conf/hbase-env.sh
@@ -31,7 +31,7 @@ export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib//jvm/java-6-sun/
 # export HBASE_CLASSPATH=
 
 # The maximum amount of heap to use, in MB. Default is 1000.
-# export HBASE_HEAPSIZE=1000
+export HBASE_HEAPSIZE=4096
 
 # Extra Java runtime options.
 # Below are what we set by default.  May only work with SUN JVM.

          </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
你可以使用 <span class="command"><strong>rsync</strong></span> 来同步 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">conf</code> 文件夹到你的整个集群.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="footnotes" style="margin:0px"><br>
<hr width="100" align="left" style="margin:0.6em; border-top-width:0px; border-right-width:0px; border-left-width:0px; border-style:solid; border-color:rgb(206,206,206)">
<div class="footnote" style="margin:0px"></div>
</div>
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t59" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="important_configurations" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.5. 重要的配置</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
下面我们会列举<span class="emphasis"><em>重要</em></span> 的配置. 这个章节讲述必须的配置和那些值得一看的配置。(译者注:淘宝的博客也有本章节的内容，<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://rdc.taobao.com/team/jm/archives/975" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBase性能调优</a>，很详尽)。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="3.5. 必须的配置" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div title="2.8.1. Required Configurations" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t60" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.5.1. 必须的配置</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#os" rel="nofollow" title="2.2. Operating System" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 2.2, “操作系统”</a> 和 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hadoop" rel="nofollow" title="2.3. Hadoop" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 2.3,
 “Hadoop”</a> 节.</p>
</div>
<div title="2.8.2. Recommended Configurations" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t61" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="recommended_configurations" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.5.2. 推荐配置</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div title="2.8.2.1. zookeeper.session.timeout" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t62" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="zookeeper.session.timeout" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.5.2.1. zookeeper.session.timeout</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这个默认值是3分钟。这意味着一旦一个server宕掉了，Master至少需要3分钟才能察觉到宕机，开始恢复。你可能希望将这个超时调短，这样Master就能更快的察觉到了。在你调这个值之前，你需要确认你的JVM的GC参数，否则一个长时间的GC操作就可能导致超时。（当一个RegionServer在运行一个长时间的GC的时候，你可能想要重启并恢复它）.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
要想改变这个配置，可以编辑 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-site.xml</code>, 将配置部署到全部集群，然后重启。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
我们之所以把这个值调的很高，是因为我们不想一天到晚在论坛里回答新手的问题。“为什么我在执行一个大规模数据导入的时候Region Server死掉啦”，通常这样的问题是因为长时间的GC操作引起的，他们的JVM没有调优。我们是这样想的，如果一个人对HBase不很熟悉，不能期望他知道所有，打击他的自信心。等到他逐渐熟悉了，他就可以自己调这个参数了。</p>
</div>
<div title="2.8.2.2. Number of ZooKeeper Instances" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t63" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="zookeeper.instances" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.5.2.2.  ZooKeeper 实例个数</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#zookeeper" rel="nofollow" title="2.5. ZooKeeper" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 2.5, “ZooKeeper”</a>.</p>
</div>
<div title="2.8.2.3. hbase.regionserver.handler.count" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t64" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.handler.count" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.5.2.3. hbase.regionserver.handler.count</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这个设置决定了处理用户请求的线程数量。默认是10，这个值设的比较小，主要是为了预防用户用一个比较大的写缓冲，然后还有很多客户端并发，这样region servers会垮掉。有经验的做法是，当请求内容很大(上MB，如大puts, 使用缓存的scans)的时候，把这个值放低。请求内容较小的时候(gets, 小puts, ICVs, deletes)，把这个值放大。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当客户端的请求内容很小的时候，把这个值设置的和最大客户端数量一样是很安全的。一个典型的例子就是一个给网站服务的集群，put操作一般不会缓冲,绝大多数的操作是get操作。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
把这个值放大的危险之处在于，把所有的Put操作缓冲意味着对内存有很大的压力，甚至会导致OutOfMemory.一个运行在内存不足的机器的RegionServer会频繁的触发GC操作，渐渐就能感受到停顿。(因为所有请求内容所占用的内存不管GC执行几遍也是不能回收的)。一段时间后，集群也会受到影响，因为所有的指向这个region的请求都会变慢。这样就会拖累集群，加剧了这个问题。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
你可能会对handler太多或太少有感觉，可以通过 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#rpc.logging" rel="nofollow" title="12.2.2.1. Enabling RPC-level logging" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 12.2.2.1, “启用 RPC级 日志”</a> ，在单个RegionServer启动log并查看log末尾
 (请求队列消耗内存)。</p>
</div>
<div title="2.8.2.4. Configuration for large memory machines" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t65" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="big_memory" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.5.2.4. <span class="title">大内存机器的配置</span></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase有一个合理的保守的配置，这样可以运作在所有的机器上。如果你有台大内存的集群-HBase有8G或者更大的heap,接下来的配置可能会帮助你. TODO.</p>
</div>
<div title="2.8.2.5. Compression" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t66" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="config.compression" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.5.2.5. 压缩</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
应该考虑启用ColumnFamily 压缩。有好几个选项，通过降低存储文件大小以降低IO，降低消耗且大多情况下提高性能。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#compression" rel="nofollow" title="Appendix C. Compression In HBase" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Appendix C, <em> HBase压缩 </em></a> 获取更多信息.</p>
</div>
<div title="2.8.2.6. Bigger Regions" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t67" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="bigger.regions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.5.2.6. 较大 Regions</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
更大的Region可以使你集群上的Region的总数量较少。 一般来言，更少的Region可以使你的集群运行更加流畅。(你可以自己随时手工将大Region切割，这样单个热点Region就会被分布在集群的更多节点上)。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
较少的Region较好。一般每个RegionServer在20到小几百之间。 调整Region大小以适合该数字。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
0.90.x 版本, 默认情况下单个Region是256MB。Region 大小的上界是 4Gb. 0.92.x 版本, 由于 HFile v2 已经将Region大小支持得大很多， (如, 20Gb).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
可能需要实验，基于硬件和应用需要进行配置。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
可以调整<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-site.xml</code>中的 <code class="code">hbase.hregion.max.filesize</code>属性. RegionSize 也可以基于每个表设置：  <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HTableDescriptor.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HTableDescriptor</a>.</p>
</div>
<div title="2.8.2.7. Managed Splitting" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t68" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="disable.splitting" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.5.2.7. <span class="title">管理</span> Splitting</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
除了让HBase自动切割你的Region,你也可以手动切割。 <sup>[<a target="_blank" name="d613e1974" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d613e1974" rel="nofollow" class="footnote" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">12</a>]</sup> 随着数据量的增大，splite会被持续执行。如果你需要知道你现在有几个region,比如长时间的debug或者做调优，你需要手动切割。通过跟踪日志来了解region级的问题是很难的，因为他在不停的切割和重命名。data
 offlineing bug和未知量的region会让你没有办法。如果一个 <code class="classname">HLog</code> 或者 <code class="classname">StoreFile</code>由于一个奇怪的bug，HBase没有执行它。等到一天之后，你才发现这个问题，你可以确保现在的regions和那个时候的一样，这样你就可以restore或者replay这些数据。你还可以调优你的合并算法。如果数据是均匀的，随着数据增长，很容易导致split / compaction疯狂的运行。因为所有的region都是差不多大的。用手的切割，你就可以交错执行定时的合并和切割操作，降低IO负载。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
为什么我关闭自动split呢？因为自动的splite是配置文件中的 <code class="code">hbase.hregion.max.filesize</code>决定的. 你把它设置成<code class="varname">Long.MAX_VALUE</code>是不推荐的做法，要是你忘记了手工切割怎么办.推荐的做法是设置成100GB，一旦到达这样的值，至少需要一个小时执行 major compactions。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
那什么是最佳的在pre-splite regions的数量呢。这个决定于你的应用程序了。你可以先从低的开始，比如每个server10个pre-splite regions.然后花时间观察数据增长。有太少的region至少比出错好，你可以之后再rolling split.一个更复杂的答案是这个值是取决于你的region中的最大的storefile。随着数据的增大，这个也会跟着增大。 你可以当这个文件足够大的时候，用一个定时的操作使用<code class="classname">Store</code>的合并选择算法(compact
 selection algorithm)来仅合并这一个HStore。如果你不这样做，这个算法会启动一个 major compactions，很多region会受到影响，你的集群会疯狂的运行。需要注意的是，这样的疯狂合并操作是数据增长造成的，而不是手动分割操作决定的。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果你 pre-split 导致 regions 很小,你可以通过配置<code class="varname">HConstants.MAJOR_COMPACTION_PERIOD</code>把你的major compaction参数调大</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果你的数据变得太大，可以使用<code class="classname">org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.RegionSplitter</code> 脚本来执行针对全部集群的一个网络IO安全的rolling split操作。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
</div>
<div title="2.8.2.8. Managed Compactions" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t69" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="managed.compactions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.5.2.8. <span class="title">管理</span> Compactions</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
通常管理技术是手动管理主紧缩(major compactions)， 而不是让HBase 来做。 缺省HConstants.MAJOR_COMPACTION_PERIOD 是一天。主紧缩可能强行进行，在你并不太希望发生的时候——特别是在一个繁忙系统。关闭自动主紧缩，设置该值为0.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
重点强调，主紧缩对存储文件(StoreFile)清理是绝对必要的。唯一变量是发生的时间。可以通过HBase shell进行管理，或通过 <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HBaseAdmin.html#majorCompact%28java.lang.String%29" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBaseAdmin</a>.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
更多信息关于紧缩和紧缩文件选择过程，参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#compaction" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.5.5. Compaction" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5.5, “紧缩”</a></p>
</div>
<div title="2.8.2.9. Speculative Execution" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t70" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="spec.ex" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.5.2.9.  预测执行 (Speculative Execution)</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
MapReduce任务的预测执行缺省是打开的，HBase集群一般建议在系统级关闭预测执行，除非在某种特殊情况下需要打开，此时可以每任务配置。设置mapred.map.tasks.speculative.execution 和 mapred.reduce.tasks.speculative.execution 为 false.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div title="2.8.3. Other Configurations" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t71" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="other_configuration" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.5.3. 其他配置</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div title="2.8.3.1. Balancer" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t72" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="balancer_config" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.5.3.1. 负载均衡</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
负载均衡器(LoadBalancer)是在主服务器上运行的定期操作，以重新分布集群区域。通过hbase.balancer.period 设置，缺省值300000 (5 分钟).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#master.processes.loadbalancer" rel="nofollow" title="9.5.4.1. LoadBalancer" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.5.4.1, “负载均衡”</a> 获取关于负载均衡器( LoadBalancer )的更多信息。</p>
</div>
<div title="2.8.3.2. Disabling Blockcache" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t73" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="disabling.blockcache" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.5.3.2. 禁止块缓存(Blockcache)</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
不要关闭块缓存 (通过hbase.block.cache.size 为 0 来设置)。当前如果关闭块缓存会很不好，因为区域服务器会花很多时间不停加载hfile指数。如果工作集如此配置块缓存没有好处，最少应保证hfile指数保存在块缓存内的大小(可以通过查询区域服务器的UI，得到大致的数值。可以看到网页的上方有块指数值统计).</p>
</div>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div title="2.5. The Important Configurations" style="margin:0px">
<div title="2.5.3. Other Configurations" style="margin:0px">
<div title="2.5.3.3. Nagle's or the small package problem" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t74" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>2.5.3.3. <a target="_blank" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nagle'%20rel=" nofollow style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Nagle算法</a> 或小包问题</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果操作HBase时看到大量40ms左右的偶然延时，尝试Nagles配置。如，参考用户邮件列表线索, <a target="_blank" href="http://search-hadoop.com/m/pduLg2fydtE/Inconsistent+scan+performance+with+caching+set+&amp;subj=Re+Inconsistent+scan+performance+with+caching+set+to+1" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Inconsistent
 scan performance with caching set to 1</a> ，该议题在其中启用tcpNoDelay (译者注，本英文原文notcpdelay有误)提高了扫描速度。你也可以查看该文档的尾部图表<a target="_blank" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-7008" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">：HBASE-7008
 Set scanner caching to a better default</a>  (xie liang)，我们的Lars Hofhansl 尝试了各种不同的数据大小，Nagle打开或关闭的测量结果。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
