<div class="chapter" title="Chapter 2. 升级" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t75" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="upgrading" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>Chapter 3. 升级</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="toc" style="margin:0px"></div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
不能跳过主要版本升级。如果想从0.20.x 升级到 0.92.x，必须从0.20.x 升级到 0.90.x ，再从0.90.x 升级到 0.92.x.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参见 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#requirements" rel="nofollow" title="2.1. 需要的软件" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 2, “配置”</a>, 需要特别注意有关Hadoop 版本的信息.</p>
<div title="3.1. Upgrading from 0.94.x to 0.96.x" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t76" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>3.1. 从 0.94.x 升级到 0.96.x</h2>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t77" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>The Singularity</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
You will have to stop your old 0.94 cluster completely to upgrade. If you are replicating between clusters, both clusters will have to go down to upgrade. Make sure it is a clean shutdown so there are no WAL files laying around (TODO: Can 0.96 read 0.94 WAL
 files?). Make sure zookeeper is cleared of state. All clients must be upgraded to 0.96 too.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The API has changed in a few areas; in particular how you use coprocessors (TODO: MapReduce too?)</p>
</div>
<div title="3.2. Upgrading from 0.92.x to 0.94.x" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t78" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="upgrade0.94" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>3.2. 从 0.92.x 升级到 0.94.x</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
0.92 和 0.94 接口兼容，可平滑升级。</p>
</div>
<div title="3.3. Upgrading from 0.90.x to 0.92.x" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="chapter" title="Chapter 2. 升级" style="margin:0px">
<div class="footnotes" style="margin:0px">
<div class="footnote" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="chapter" title="Chapter 3. 配置" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div title="3.2. Upgrading from 0.90.x to 0.92.x" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t79" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>3.3. 从 0.90.x 到 0.92.x 升级</h2>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t80" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>升级指引</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
You will find that 0.92.0 runs a little differently to 0.90.x releases. Here are a few things to watch out for upgrading from 0.90.x to 0.92.0.</p>
<div title="tl;dr" style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t81" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a> </h3>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If you've not patience, here are the important things to know upgrading.</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ol type="1" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>Once you upgrade, you can’t go back.</li><li>MSLAB is on by default. Watch that heap usage if you have a lot of regions.</li><li>Distributed splitting is on by defaul. It should make region server failover faster.</li><li>There’s a separate tarball for security.</li><li>If -XX:MaxDirectMemorySize is set in your hbase-env.sh, it’s going to enable the experimental off-heap cache (You may not want this).</li></ol>
</div>
</div>
<div title="3.2.1. You can’t go back!" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t82" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e2951" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>3.3.1. 不可回退!</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
To move to 0.92.0, all you need to do is shutdown your cluster, replace your hbase 0.90.x with hbase 0.92.0 binaries (be sure you clear out all 0.90.x instances) and restart (You cannot do a rolling restart from 0.90.x to 0.92.x -- you must restart). On startup,
 the .META. table content is rewritten removing the table schema from the info:regioninfo column. Also, any flushes done post first startup will write out data in the new 0.92.0 file format, <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hfilev2" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HFile
 V2</a>. This means you cannot go back to 0.90.x once you’ve started HBase 0.92.0 over your HBase data directory.</p>
</div>
<div title="3.2.2. MSLAB is ON by default" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t83" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e2965" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>3.3.2. MSLAB 缺省启用</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
In 0.92.0, the <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hbase.hregion.memstore.mslab.enabled" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">hbase.hregion.memstore.mslab.enabled</a> flag is set to true (参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#mslab" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 11.3.1.1,
 “Long GC pauses”</a>). In 0.90.x it was false. When it is enabled, memstores will step allocate memory in MSLAB 2MB chunks even if the memstore has zero or just a few small elements. This is fine usually but if you had lots of regions per regionserver in a
 0.90.x cluster (and MSLAB was off), you may find yourself OOME'ing on upgrade because the thousands of regions * number of column families * 2MB MSLAB (at a minimum) puts your heap over the top. Set hbase.hregion.memstore.mslab.enabled to false or set the
 MSLAB size down from 2MB by setting hbase.hregion.memstore.mslab.chunksize to something less.</p>
</div>
<div title="3.2.3. Distributed splitting is on by default" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t84" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e2990" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>3.3.3. 分布式分割缺省启用</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Previous, WAL logs on crash were split by the Master alone. In 0.92.0, log splitting is done by the cluster (参考 “HBASE-1364 [performance] Distributed splitting of regionserver commit logs”). This should cut down significantly on the amount of time it takes
 splitting logs and getting regions back online again.</p>
</div>
<div title="3.2.4. Memory accounting is different now" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t85" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e2995" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>3.3.4. 内存计算改变</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
In 0.92.0, <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hfilev2" rel="nofollow" title="Appendix E. HFile format version 2" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Appendix E, <em>HFile format version 2</em></a> indices and bloom filters
 take up residence in the same LRU used caching blocks that come from the filesystem. In 0.90.x, the HFile v1 indices lived outside of the LRU so they took up space even if the index was on a ‘cold’ file, one that wasn’t being actively used. With the indices
 now in the LRU, you may find you have less space for block caching. Adjust your block cache accordingly. 参考 the <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#block.cache" rel="nofollow" title="9.6.4. Block Cache" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.6.4,
 “Block Cache”</a> for more detail. The block size default size has been changed in 0.92.0 from 0.2 (20 percent of heap) to 0.25.</p>
</div>
<div title="3.2.5. On the Hadoop version to use" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t86" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e3004" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>3.3.5.  可用 Hadoop 版本</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Run 0.92.0 on Hadoop 1.0.x (or CDH3u3 when it ships). The performance benefits are worth making the move. Otherwise, our Hadoop prescription is as it has been; you need an Hadoop that supports a working sync. 参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hadoop" rel="nofollow" title="2.3. Hadoop" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 2.3,
 “Hadoop”</a>.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If running on Hadoop 1.0.x (or CDH3u3), enable local read. 参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://files.meetup.com/1350427/hug_ebay_jdcryans.pdf" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Practical Caching</a> presentation for ruminations
 on the performance benefits ‘going local’ (and for how to enable local reads).</p>
</div>
<div title="3.2.6. HBase 0.92.0 ships with ZooKeeper 3.4.2" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t87" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e3016" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>3.3.6. HBase 0.92.0 带 ZooKeeper 3.4.2</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If you can, upgrade your zookeeper. If you can’t, 3.4.2 clients should work against 3.3.X ensembles (HBase makes use of 3.4.2 API).</p>
</div>
<div title="3.2.7. Online alter is off by default" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t88" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e3021" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>3.3.7. 在线切换缺省关闭</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
In 0.92.0, we’ve added an experimental online schema alter facility (参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hbase.online.schema.update.enable" rel="nofollow" title="hbase.online.schema.update.enable" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">hbase.online.schema.update.enable</a>).
 Its off by default. Enable it at your own risk. Online alter and splitting tables do not play well together so be sure your cluster quiescent using this feature (for now).</p>
</div>
<div title="3.2.8. WebUI" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t89" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e3028" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>3.3.8. WebUI</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The webui has had a few additions made in 0.92.0. It now shows a list of the regions currently transitioning, recent compactions/flushes, and a process list of running processes (usually empty if all is well and requests are being handled promptly). Other additions
 including requests by region, a debugging servlet dump, etc.</p>
</div>
<div title="3.2.9. Security tarball" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t90" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e3033" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>3.3.9. 安全 tarball</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
我们发布两个tarball： 安全和非安全 HBase. 如何设置安全HBase的文档正在制定中。</p>
</div>
<div title="3.2.10. Experimental off-heap cache" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t91" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e3038" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>3.3.10. 试验离堆(off-heap)缓存</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
(译者注：on-heap和off-heap是Terracotta 公司提出的概念。on-heap指java对象在GC内存储管理，效率较高，但GC只能管理2G内存，有时成为性能瓶颈。off-heap又叫<a target="_blank" href="http://www.terracotta.org/bigmemory?src=ehcache_off_heap_store" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">BigMemory</a> ，是JVM的GC机制的替代，在GC外存储，100倍速于DiskStore，cache量目前(2012年底)达到350GB)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A new cache was contributed to 0.92.0 to act as a solution between using the “on-heap” cache which is the current LRU cache the region servers have and the operating system cache which is out of our control. To enable, set “-XX:MaxDirectMemorySize” in hbase-env.sh
 to the value for maximum direct memory size and specify hbase.offheapcache.percentage in hbase-site.xml with the percentage that you want to dedicate to off-heap cache. This should only be set for servers and not for clients. Use at your own risk. See this
 blog post for additional information on this new experimental feature: http://www.cloudera.com/blog/2012/01/caching-in-hbase-slabcache/</p>
</div>
<div title="3.2.11. Changes in HBase replication" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t92" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e3043" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>3.3.11. HBase 复制的变动</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
0.92.0 adds two new features: multi-slave and multi-master replication. The way to enable this is the same as adding a new peer, so in order to have multi-master you would just run add_peer for each cluster that acts as a master to the other slave clusters.
 Collisions are handled at the timestamp level which may or may not be what you want, this needs to be evaluated on a per use case basis. Replication is still experimental in 0.92 and is disabled by default, run it at your own risk.</p>
</div>
<div title="3.2.12. RegionServer now aborts if OOME" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t93" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e3048" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>3.3.12. 对OOME ，RegionServer 现在退出</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If an OOME, we now have the JVM kill -9 the regionserver process so it goes down fast. Previous, a RegionServer might stick around after incurring an OOME limping along in some wounded state. To disable this facility, and recommend you leave it in place, you’d
 need to edit the bin/hbase file. Look for the addition of the -XX:OnOutOfMemoryError="kill -9 %p" arguments (参考 [HBASE-4769] - ‘Abort RegionServer Immediately on OOME’)</p>
</div>
<div title="3.2.13. HFile V2 and the “Bigger, Fewer” Tendency" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t94" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e3053" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>3.3.13. HFile V2 和 “更大, 更少” 趋势</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
0.92.0 stores data in a new format, <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hfilev2" rel="nofollow" title="Appendix E. HFile format version 2" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Appendix E, <em>HFile format version 2</em></a>.
 As HBase runs, it will move all your data from HFile v1 to HFile v2 format. This auto-migration will run in the background as flushes and compactions run. HFile V2 allows HBase run with larger regions/files. In fact, we encourage that all HBasers going forward
 tend toward Facebook axiom #1, run with larger, fewer regions. If you have lots of regions now -- more than 100s per host -- you should look into setting your region size up after you move to 0.92.0 (In 0.92.0, default size is not 1G, up from 256M), and then
 running online merge tool (参考 “HBASE-1621 merge tool should work on online cluster, but disabled table”).</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
<div class="section" title="2.1. 从HBase 0.20.x or 0.89.x 升级到 HBase 0.90.x" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t95" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="upgrade0.90" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>3.4. 从HBase 0.20.x or 0.89.x 升级到 HBase 0.90.x</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
0.90.x 版本的HBase可以在 HBase 0.20.x 或者 HBase 0.89.x的数据上启动. 不需要转换数据文件， HBase 0.89.x 和 0.90.x 的region目录名是不一样的 -- 老版本用md5 hash 而不是jenkins hash 来命名region-- 这就意味着，一旦启动，再也不能回退到 HBase 0.20.x.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
在升级的时候，一定要将<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-default.xml</code> 从你的 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">conf</code>目录删掉。 0.20.x 版本的配置对于 0.90.x HBase不是最佳的. <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-default.xml</code> 现在已经被打包在
 HBase jar 里面了. 如果你想看看这个文件内容，你可以在src目录下 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">src/main/resources/hbase-default.xml</code> 或者在 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hbase_default_configurations" rel="nofollow" title="3.1.1. HBase 默认配置" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 2.31.1,
 “HBase 默认配置”</a>看到.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
最后，如果从0.20.x升级，需要在shell里检查 <code class="varname">.META.</code> schema . 过去，我们推荐用户使用16KB的 <code class="varname">MEMSTORE_FLUSHSIZE</code>. 在shell中运行 <code class="code">hbase&gt; scan '-ROOT-'</code>. 会显示当前的<code class="varname">.META.</code> schema. 检查 <code class="varname">MEMSTORE_FLUSHSIZE</code> 的大小.
 看看是不是 16KB (16384)? 如果是的话，你需要修改它(默认的值是 64MB (67108864)) 运行脚本 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">bin/set_meta_memstore_size.rb</code>. 这个脚本会修改 <code class="varname">.META.</code> schema. 如果不运行的话，集群会比较慢<sup>[<a target="_blank" name="d613e1033" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d613e1033" rel="nofollow" class="footnote" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">15</a>]</sup> .</p>
</div>
<div class="footnotes" style="margin:0px"><br>
<hr width="100" align="left" style="margin:0.6em; border-top-width:0px; border-right-width:0px; border-left-width:0px; border-style:solid; border-color:rgb(206,206,206)">
<div class="footnote" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="chapter" title="Chapter 3. 配置" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div title="3.2. Upgrading from 0.90.x to 0.92.x" style="margin:0px">
<div title="3.2.13. HFile V2 and the “Bigger, Fewer” Tendency" style="margin:0px">
</div>
</div>
[<a target="_blank" id="ftn.d1952e2919" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d1952e2919" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">15</a>] 参考 <a target="_blank" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-3499" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBASE-3499
 Users upgrading to 0.90.0 need to have their .META. table updated with the right MEMSTORE_SIZE</a><br>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="footnotes" style="margin:0px"></div>
</div>
<div class="chapter" title="Chapter 4. The HBase Shell" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t96" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="shell" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>Chapter 4.  HBase Shell</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="toc" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<strong>Table of Contents</strong></p>
<dl style="margin:0.8em 0px; line-height:1.2"><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#scripting" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">4.1. 使用脚本</a></span></dt><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#shell_tricks" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">4.2. Shell 技巧</a></span></dt><dd>
<dl style="margin:0.8em 0px; line-height:1.2"><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d613e2127" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">4.2.1. <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">irbrc</code></a></span></dt><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d613e2145" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">4.2.2. LOG 时间转换</a></span></dt><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d613e2163" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">4.2.3. 调试</a></span></dt></dl>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase Shell is 在<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://jruby.org/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">(J)Ruby</a>的IRB的基础上加上了HBase的命令。任何你可以在IRB里做的事情都可在在HBase Shell中做。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
你可以这样来运行HBase Shell:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_26_1215969" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/hbase shell</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
输入 <span class="command"><strong>help</strong></span> 就会返回Shell的命令列表和选项。可以看看在Help文档尾部的关于如何输入变量和选项。尤其要注意的是表名，行，列名必须要加引号。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参见 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#shell_exercises" rel="nofollow" title="1.2.3. Shell 练习" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 1.2.3, “Shell 练习”</a>可以看到Shell的基本使用例子。</p>
<div class="section" title="4.1. 使用脚本" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t97" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="scripting" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>4.1. 使用脚本</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果要使用脚本，可以看HBase的<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">bin</code> 目录.在里面找到后缀为 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">*.rb</code>的脚本.要想运行这个脚本，要这样</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_27_7053044" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/hbase org.jruby.Main PATH_TO_SCRIPT</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
就可以了</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="4.2. Shell 技巧" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t98" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="shell_tricks" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>4.2. Shell 技巧</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="4.2.1. irbrc" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t99" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d613e2127" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>4.2.1. <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">irbrc</code></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
可以在你自己的Home目录下创建一个<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">.irbrc</code>文件. 在这个文件里加入自定义的命令。有一个有用的命令就是记录命令历史，这样你就可以把你的命令保存起来。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_28_2890120" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                        $ more .irbrc
                        require 'irb/ext/save-history'
                        IRB.conf[:SAVE_HISTORY] = 100
                        IRB.conf[:HISTORY_FILE] = "#{ENV['HOME']}/.irb-save-history"</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
可以参见 <span class="application">ruby</span> 关于 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">.irbrc</code> 的文档来学习更多的关于IRB的配置方法。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="4.2.2. LOG 时间转换" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t100" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d613e2145" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>4.2.2. LOG 时间转换</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
可以将日期'08/08/16 20:56:29'从hbase log 转换成一个 timestamp, 操作如下:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_29_3535961" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                    hbase(main):021:0&gt; import java.text.SimpleDateFormat
                    hbase(main):022:0&gt; import java.text.ParsePosition
                    hbase(main):023:0&gt; SimpleDateFormat.new("yy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").parse("08/08/16 20:56:29", ParsePosition.new(0)).getTime() =&gt; 1218920189000</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
也可以逆过来操作。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_30_2437699" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                    hbase(main):021:0&gt; import java.util.Date
                    hbase(main):022:0&gt; Date.new(1218920189000).toString() =&gt; "Sat Aug 16 20:56:29 UTC 2008"</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
要想把日期格式和HBase log格式完全相同，可以参见文档 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://download.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/text/SimpleDateFormat.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">SimpleDateFormat</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="4.2.3. Debug" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t101" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d613e2163" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>4.2.3. 调试</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="4.2.3.1. Shell 切换成debug 模式" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t102" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d613e2166" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>4.2.3.1. Shell 切换成debug 模式</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
你可以将shell切换成debug模式。这样可以看到更多的信息。 -- 例如可以看到命令异常的stack trace:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_31_5799539" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">hbase&gt; debug &lt;RETURN&gt;</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="4.2.3.2. DEBUG log level" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t103" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d613e2174" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>4.2.3.2. DEBUG log level</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
想要在shell中看到 DEBUG 级别的 logging ，可以在启动的时候加上 <span class="command"><strong>-d</strong></span> 参数.</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_32_8637991" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/hbase shell -d</pre>
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t104" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="datamodel" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>Chapter 5. 数据模型</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="toc" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<strong>Table of Contents</strong></p>
<dl style="margin:0.8em 0px; line-height:1.2"><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#conceptual.view" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">5.1. 概念视图</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#physical.view" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">5.2. 物理视图</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#table" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">5.3. 表</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#row" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">5.4. 行</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#columnfamily" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">5.5. 列族</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#cells" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">5.6. Cells</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#versions" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">5.7. 版本</a></dt><dd>
<dl style="margin:0.8em 0px; line-height:1.2"><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#versions.ops" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">5.7.1. HBase的操作(包含版本操作)</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d613e2965" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">5.7.2. 现有的限制</a></dt></dl>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
简单来说，应用程序是以表的方式在HBase存储数据的。表是由行和列构成的，所有的列是从属于某一个列族的。行和列的交叉点称之为cell,cell是版本化的。cell的内容是不可分割的字节数组。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
表的行键也是一段字节数组，所以任何东西都可以保存进去，不论是字符串或者数字。HBase的表是按key排序的，排序方式之针对字节的。所有的表都必须要有主键-key.</p>
<div class="section" title="11.1. 概念视图" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t105" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="conceptual.view" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.1. 概念视图</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
下面是根据<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://labs.google.com/papers/bigtable.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">BigTable</a> 论文稍加修改的例子。 有一个名为<code class="varname">webtable</code>的表，包含两个列族<code class="varname">：contents</code>和<code class="varname">anchor</code>.在这个例子里面，<code class="varname">anchor</code>有两个列
 (<code class="varname">anchor:cssnsi.com</code>, <code class="varname">anchor:my.look.ca</code>)，<code class="varname">contents</code>仅有一列(<code class="varname">contents:html</code>)</p>
<div class="note" title="列名" style="margin:0px 0.5in">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -43.921875px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t106" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>列名</h3>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
一个列名是由它的列族前缀和<span class="emphasis"><em>修饰符(qualifier)</em></span>连接而成。例如列<span class="emphasis"><em>contents:html</em></span>是列族 <code class="varname">contents</code>加冒号(<code class="literal">:</code>)加 <span class="emphasis"><em>修饰符</em></span> <code class="varname">html</code>组成的。</p>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<div class="table" style="margin:0px"><a target="_blank" name="d1934e3221" id="d1934e3221" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>
<p class="title" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">

<div class="section" title="11.2. 物理视图" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t107" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="physical.view" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.2. 物理视图</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
尽管在概念视图里，表可以被看成是一个稀疏的行的集合。但在物理上，它的是区分列族 存储的。新的columns可以不经过声明直接加入一个列族.</p>
<div class="table" style="margin:0px"><a target="_blank" name="d1934e3305" id="d1934e3305" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>
<p class="title" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span style="color:rgb(153,0,0)">Table 5.2. ColumnFamily <code class="varname">anchor</code></span></p>
<div class="table-contents" style="margin:0px">
<table summary="ColumnFamily anchor" border="1">
<colgroup><col align="left"><col align="left"><col align="left"></colgroup>
<thead>
<tr>
<th align="left" style="line-height:1.2">Row Key</th>
<th align="left" style="line-height:1.2">Time Stamp</th>
<th align="left" style="line-height:1.2">Column Family <code class="varname">anchor</code></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td align="left" style="line-height:1.2">"com.cnn.www"</td>
<td align="left" style="line-height:1.2">t9</td>
<td align="left" style="line-height:1.2"><code class="varname">anchor:cnnsi.com</code> = "CNN"</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="left" style="line-height:1.2">"com.cnn.www"</td>
<td align="left" style="line-height:1.2">t8</td>
<td align="left" style="line-height:1.2"><code class="varname">anchor:my.look.ca</code> = "CNN.com"</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<br class="table-break">
</p>
<div class="table" style="margin:0px"><a target="_blank" name="d1934e3344" id="d1934e3344" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>
<p class="title" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span style="color:rgb(153,0,0)">Table 5.3. ColumnFamily <code class="varname">contents</code></span></p>
<div class="table-contents" style="margin:0px">
<table summary="ColumnFamily contents" border="1">
<colgroup><col align="left"><col align="left"><col align="left"></colgroup>
<thead>
<tr>
<th align="left" style="line-height:1.2">Row Key</th>
<th align="left" style="line-height:1.2">Time Stamp</th>
<th align="left" style="line-height:1.2">ColumnFamily "contents:"</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td align="left" style="line-height:1.2">"com.cnn.www"</td>
<td align="left" style="line-height:1.2">t6</td>
<td align="left" style="line-height:1.2"><code class="varname">contents:html</code> = "&lt;html&gt;..."</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="left" style="line-height:1.2">"com.cnn.www"</td>
<td align="left" style="line-height:1.2">t5</td>
<td align="left" style="line-height:1.2"><code class="varname">contents:html</code> = "&lt;html&gt;..."</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="left" style="line-height:1.2">"com.cnn.www"</td>
<td align="left" style="line-height:1.2">t3</td>
<td align="left" style="line-height:1.2"><code class="varname">contents:html</code> = "&lt;html&gt;..."</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<br class="table-break">
值得注意的是在上面的概念视图中空白cell在物理上是不存储的，因为根本没有必要存储。因此若一个请求为要获取<code class="literal">t8</code>时间的<code class="varname">contents:html</code>，他的结果就是空。相似的，若请求为获取<code class="literal">t9</code>时间的<code class="varname">anchor:my.look.ca</code>，结果也是空。但是，如果不指明时间，将会返回最新时间的行，每个最新的都会返回。例如，如果请求为获取行键为"com.cnn.www"，没有指明时间戳的话，活动的结果是<code class="literal">t6</code>下的contents:html，<code class="literal">t9</code>下的<code class="varname">anchor:cnnsi.com</code>和<code class="literal">t8</code>下<code class="varname">anchor:my.look.ca</code>。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For more information about the internals of how HBase stores data, see <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#regions.arch" rel="nofollow" title="9.7. Regions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7, “Regions”</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.3. 表" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t108" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="table" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.3. 表</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
表是在schema声明的时候定义的。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.4. 行" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t109" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="row" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.4. 行</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
行键是不可分割的字节数组。行是按字典排序由低到高存储在表中的。一个空的数组是用来标识表空间的起始或者结尾。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.5. Column Family" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t110" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="columnfamily" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.5. 列族</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
在HBase是<span class="emphasis"><em>列族</em></span>一些列的集合。一个列族所有列成员是有着相同的前缀。比如，列<span class="emphasis"><em>courses:history</em></span> 和 <span class="emphasis"><em>courses:math</em></span>都是 列族 <span class="emphasis"><em>courses</em></span>的成员.冒号(:)是列族的分隔符，用来区分前缀和列名。column
 前缀必须是可打印的字符，剩下的部分(称为qualify),可以又任意字节数组组成。列族必须在表建立的时候声明。column就不需要了，随时可以新建。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
在物理上，一个的列族成员在文件系统上都是存储在一起。因为存储优化都是针对列族级别的，这就意味着，一个colimn family的所有成员的是用相同的方式访问的。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.6. Cells" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t111" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="cells" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.6. Cells<a target="_blank" class="indexterm   " name="d613e2790" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A <span class="emphasis"><em>{row, column, version} </em></span>元组就是一个HBase中的一个 <code class="literal">cell</code>。Cell的内容是不可分割的字节数组。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.7. 版本" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px"></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="5.7. Data Model Operations" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t112" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="data_model_operations" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.7. 数据模型操作</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
四个主要的数据模型操作是 Get, Put, Scan, 和 Delete. 通过 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HTable</a> 实例进行操作.</p>
<div class="section" title="5.7.1. Get" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t113" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="get" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.7.1. Get</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/Get.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Get</a> 返回特定行的属性。 Gets 通过 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html#get%28org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Get%29" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HTable.get</a> 执行。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="5.7.2. Put" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t114" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="put" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.7.2. Put</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/Put.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Put</a> 要么向表增加新行 (如果key是新的) 或更新行 (如果key已经存在)。 Puts 通过 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html#put%28org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Put%29" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HTable.put</a> (writeBuffer)
 或 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html#batch%28java.util.List%29" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HTable.batch</a> (non-writeBuffer)执行。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="5.7.3. Scans" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t115" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="scan" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.7.3. Scans</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/Scan.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Scan</a> 允许多行特定属性迭代。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
下面是一个在 HTable 表实例上的示例。 假设表有几行键值为 "row1", "row2", "row3", 还有一些行有键值 "abc1", "abc2", 和 "abc3". 下面的示例展示startRow 和 stopRow 可以应用到一个Scan 实例，以返回"row"打头的行。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_33_1999832" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">HTable htable = ...      // instantiate HTable
    
Scan scan = new Scan();
scan.addColumn(Bytes.toBytes("cf"),Bytes.toBytes("attr"));
scan.setStartRow( Bytes.toBytes("row"));                   // start key is inclusive
scan.setStopRow( Bytes.toBytes("row" +  (char)0));  // stop key is exclusive
ResultScanner rs = htable.getScanner(scan);
try {
  for (Result r = rs.next(); r != null; r = rs.next()) {
  // process result...
} finally {
  rs.close();  // always close the ResultScanner!
}
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="5.7.4. Delete" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t116" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="delete" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.7.4. Delete</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/Delete.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Delete</a> 从表中删除一行. 删除通过<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html#delete%28org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Delete%29" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HTable.delete</a> 执行。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase 没有修改数据的合适方法。所以通过创建名为墓碑(<span class="emphasis"><em>tombstones</em></span>)的新标志进行处理。这些墓碑和死去的值，在主紧缩时清除。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#version.delete" rel="nofollow" title="5.8.1.5. Delete" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 5.8.1.5, “Delete”</a> 获取删除列版本的更多信息。参考<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#compaction" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.5.5. Compaction" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5.5,
 “Compaction”</a> 获取更多有关紧缩的信息。</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.7.1. HBase的操作(包含版本操作)" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t117" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="versions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.8. 版本<a target="_blank" class="indexterm   " name="d613e2804" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
一个 <span class="emphasis"><em>{row, column, version} </em></span>元组是HBase中的一个单元(<code class="literal">cell</code>).但是有可能会有很多的单元的行和列是相同的，可以使用版本来区分不同的单元.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
rows和column key是用字节数组表示的，version则是用一个长整型表示。这个long的值使用 <code class="code">java.util.Date.getTime()</code> 或者 <code class="code">System.currentTimeMillis()</code>产生的。这就意味着他的含义是<span class="quote">“当前时间和1970-01-01 UTC的时间差，单位毫秒。”</span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
在HBase中，版本是按倒序排列的，因此当读取这个文件的时候，最先找到的是最近的版本。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
有些人不是很理解HBase单元(<code class="literal">cell</code>)的意思。一个常见的问题是:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果有多个包含版本写操作同时发起，HBase会保存全部还是会保持最新的一个？<sup>[<a target="_blank" name="d613e2836" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d613e2836" rel="nofollow" class="footnote" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">16</a>]</sup></p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
可以发起包含版本的写操作，但是他们的版本顺序和操作顺序相反吗?<sup>[<a target="_blank" name="d613e2842" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d613e2842" rel="nofollow" class="footnote" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">17</a>]</sup></p>
</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
下面我们介绍下在HBase中版本是如何工作的。<sup>[<a target="_blank" name="d613e2847" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d613e2847" rel="nofollow" class="footnote" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">18</a>]</sup>.</p>
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t118" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="versions.ops" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.8.1. HBase的操作(包含版本操作)</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
在这一章我们来仔细看看在HBase的各个主要操作中版本起到了什么作用。</p>
<div class="section" title="11.7.1.1. Get/Scan" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t119" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d613e2865" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.8.1.1. Get/Scan</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Gets实在Scan的基础上实现的。可以详细参见下面的讨论 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/docs/current/api/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/Get.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Get</a> 同样可以用 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/docs/current/api/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/Scan.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Scan</a>来描述.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认情况下，如果你没有指定版本，当你使用<code class="literal">Get</code>操作的时候，会返回最近版本的Cell(该Cell可能是最新写入的，但不能保证)。默认的操作可以这样修改:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果想要返回返回两个以上的把版本,参见<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/docs/current/api/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/Get.html#setMaxVersions()" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Get.setMaxVersions()</a></p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果想要返回的版本不只是最近的，参见 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html???" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Get.setTimeRange()</a></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
要向查询的最新版本要小于或等于给定的这个值，这就意味着给定的'最近'的值可以是某一个时间点。可以使用0到你想要的时间来设置，还要把max versions设置为1.</p>
</li></ul>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.7.1.2. 默认 Get 例子" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t120" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="default_get_example" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.8.1.2. 默认 Get 例子</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
下面的Get操作会只获得最新的一个版本。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_34_8774998" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">        Get get = new Get(Bytes.toBytes("row1"));
        Result r = htable.get(get);
        byte[] b = r.getValue(Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("attr"));  // returns current version of value          </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.7.1.3. 含有的版本的Get例子" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t121" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="versioned_get_example" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.8.1.3. 含有的版本的Get例子</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
下面的Get操作会获得最近的3个版本。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_35_2136838" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">        Get get = new Get(Bytes.toBytes("row1"));
        get.setMaxVersions(3);  // will return last 3 versions of row
        Result r = htable.get(get);
        byte[] b = r.getValue(Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("attr"));  // returns current version of value
        List&lt;KeyValue&gt; kv = r.getColumn(Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("attr"));  // returns all versions of this column       
                    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.7.1.4. Put" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t122" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="put_operation" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.8.1.4. Put</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
一个Put操作会给一个<code class="literal">cell</code>,创建一个版本，默认使用当前时间戳，当然你也可以自己设置时间戳。这就意味着你可以把时间设置在过去或者未来，或者随意使用一个Long值。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
要想覆盖一个现有的值，就意味着你的row,column和版本必须完全相等。</p>
<div class="section" title="11.7.1.4.1. 不指明版本的例子" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 class="title" style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t123" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="implicit_version_example" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.8.1.4.1. 不指明版本的例子</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
下面的Put操作不指明版本，所以HBase会用当前时间作为版本。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_36_2500055" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">          Put put = new Put(Bytes.toBytes(row));
          put.add(Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("attr1"), Bytes.toBytes( data));
          htable.put(put);
                    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.7.1.4.2. 指明版本的例子" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 class="title" style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t124" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="explicit_version_example" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.8.1.4.2. 指明版本的例子</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
下面的Put操作，指明了版本。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_37_1783477" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">          Put put = new Put( Bytes.toBytes(row ));
          long explicitTimeInMs = 555;  // just an example
          put.add(Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("attr1"), explicitTimeInMs, Bytes.toBytes(data));
          htable.put(put);
                    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.7.1.5. Delete" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t125" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d613e2936" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.8.1.5. Delete</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
有三种不同类型的内部删除标记  [<a target="_blank" name="d1952e3698" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d1952e3698" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">19</a>]:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Delete: 删除列的指定版本.</p>
</li><li>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Delete column: 删除列的所有版本.</p>
</li><li>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Delete family: 删除特定列族所有列</p>
</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当删除一行，HBase将内部对每个列族创建墓碑(非每个单独列)。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
删除操作的实现是创建一个<span class="emphasis"><em>墓碑标记</em></span>。例如，我们想要删除一个版本，或者默认是<code class="literal">currentTimeMillis</code>。就意味着<span class="quote">“删除比这个版本更早的所有版本”</span>.HBase不会去改那些数据，数据不会立即从文件中删除。他使用删除标记来屏蔽掉这些值。<sup>[<a target="_blank" name="d613e2961" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d613e2961" rel="nofollow" class="footnote" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">20</a>]</sup>若你知道的版本比数据中的版本晚，就意味着这一行中的所有数据都会被删除。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#keyvalue" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.5.4. KeyValue" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5.4, “KeyValue”</a> 获取内部 KeyValue 格式更多信息。</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.7.2. 现有的限制" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t126" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d613e2965" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.8.2. 现有的限制</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
关于版本还有一些bug(或者称之为未实现的功能)，计划在下个版本实现。</p>
<div class="section" title="11.7.2.1. 删除标记误删Puts" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t127" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d613e2970" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.8.2.1. 删除标记误标新Put 的数据</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
删除标记操作可能会标记其后put的数据。<sup>[<a target="_blank" name="d613e2975" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d613e2975" rel="nofollow" class="footnote" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">21</a>]</sup>记住，当写下一个墓碑标记后，只有下一个主紧缩操作发起之后，墓碑才会清除。假设你删除所有&lt;=
 时间T的数据。但之后，你又执行了一个Put操作，时间戳&lt;= T。就算这个Put发生在删除操作之后，他的数据也打上了墓碑标记。这个Put并不会失败，但你做Get操作时，会注意到Put没有产生影响。只有一个主紧缩执行后，一切才会恢复正常。如果你的Put操作一直使用升序的版本，这个问题不会有影响。但是即使你不关心时间，也可能出现该情况。只需删除和插入迅速相互跟随，就有机会在同一毫秒中遇到。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.7.2.2. Major compactions 改变查询的结果" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t128" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d613e2980" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.8.2.2. 主紧缩改变查询的结果</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="quote">“设想一下，你一个cell有三个版本t1,t2和t3。你的maximun-version设置是2.当你请求获取全部版本的时候，只会返回两个，t2和t3。如果你将t2和t3删除，就会返回t1。但是如果在删除之前，发生了major compaction操作，那么什么值都不好返回了。<sup>[<a target="_blank" name="d613e2986" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d613e2986" rel="nofollow" class="footnote" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">22</a>]</sup>”</span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="footnotes" style="margin:0px"><br>
<div class="footnote" style="margin:0px"></div>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t129" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="dm.sort" id="dm.sort" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.9. 排序</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
所有数据模型操作 HBase 返回排序的数据。先是行，再是列族，然后是列修饰(column qualifier), 最后是时间戳(反向排序,所以最新的在前).</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t130" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="dm.column.metadata" id="dm.column.metadata" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.10. 列的元数据</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
对列族，没有内部的KeyValue之外的元数据保存。这样，HBase不仅在一行中支持很多列，而且支持行之间不同的列。 由你自己负责跟踪列名。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
唯一获取列族的完整列名的方法是处理所有行。HBase内部保存数据更多信息，请参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#keyvalue" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.5.4. KeyValue" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5.4, “KeyValue”</a>.</p>
<div title="5.11. Joins" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t131" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="joins" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>5.11. 联合查询(Join)</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase是否支持联合是一个网上常问问题。简单来说 : 不支持。至少不想传统RDBMS那样支持(如 SQL中带 equi-joins 或 outer-joins). 正如本章描述的，读数据模型是 Get 和 Scan.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
但并不表示等价联合不能在应用程序中支持，只是必须自己做。 两种方法，要么指示要写到HBase的数据，要么查询表并在应用或MapReduce代码中做联合(如 RDBMS所展示,有几种步骤来实现，依赖于表的大小。如 nested loops vs. hash-joins). 哪个更好？依赖于你准备做什么，所以没有一个单一的回答适合所有方面。</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
