<div class="section" title="8.1.  Schema 创建" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t133" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>Chapter 6. HBase 的 Schema 设计</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="toc" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<strong>Table of Contents</strong></p>
<dl style="margin:0.8em 0px; line-height:1.2"><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#schema.creation" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">6.1. </a><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#schema.creation" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Schema
 创建<br>
</a><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#schema.creation" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none"></a><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#number.of.cfs" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">6.2. </a><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#number.of.cfs" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">列族的数量</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#rowkey.design" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">6.3. Rowkey 设计</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#schema.versions" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">6.4. 版本数量</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#supported.datatypes" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">6.5. 支持的数据类型</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#schema.joins" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">6.6. 联合</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ttl" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">6.7. 存活时间 (TTL)</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#cf.keep.deleted" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">6.8. 保存删除的单元</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#secondary.indexes" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">6.9. 第二索引和改变查询路径</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#schema.smackdown" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">6.10. 模式设计对决</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#schema.ops" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">6.11. 业务和性能配置选项</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#constraints" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">6.12. 常量</a></dt></dl>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
一份关于各种NSQL数据库的优点和缺点的通用介绍，就是 Ian Varley的博士论文， <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://ianvarley.com/UT/MR/Varley_MastersReport_Full_2009-08-07.pdf" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">No Relation: The Mixed Blessings of Non-Relational
 Databases</a>。 推荐。也可阅读 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#keyvalue" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.5.4. KeyValue" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5.4, “KeyValue”</a> ，了解HBase如何内部保存数据。</p>
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t134" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.creation" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.1.  模式(Schema) 创建</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
可以使用<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#shell" rel="nofollow" title="Chapter 4. The HBase Shell" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Chapter 4, <em>HBase Shell</em></a> 或Java API的<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HBaseAdmin.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBaseAdmin</a>来创建和编辑HBase的模式。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
表必须禁用以修改列族，如：</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_38_1000859" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">Configuration config = HBaseConfiguration.create();  
HBaseAdmin admin = new HBaseAdmin(conf);    
String table = "myTable";

admin.disableTable(table);           

HColumnDescriptor cf1 = ...;
admin.addColumn(table, cf1);      // adding new ColumnFamily
HColumnDescriptor cf2 = ...;
admin.modifyColumn(table, cf2);    // modifying existing ColumnFamily

admin.enableTable(table);                
      </pre>参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#client_dependencies" rel="nofollow" title="2.6.4. Client configuration and dependencies connecting to an HBase cluster" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 2.3.4,
 “Client configuration and dependencies connecting to an HBase cluster”</a> ，获取更多配置客户端连接的信息。
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
注意: 0.92.x 支持在线修改模式, 但 0.90.x 需要禁用表。</p>
<div title="6.1.1. Schema Updates" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t135" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.1.1. 模式更新</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当表或列族改变时(如 region size, block size), 当下次存在主紧缩及存储文件重写时起作用。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#store" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.5. Store" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5, “Store”</a> 获取存储文件的更多信息。</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px"><br>
</div>
<div class="section" title="8.2.  column families的数量" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t136" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="number.of.cfs" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.2.  列族的数量</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
现在HBase并不能很好的处理两个或者三个以上的列族，所以尽量让你的列族数量少一些。目前，flush和compaction操作是针对一个Region。所以当一个列族操作大量数据的时候会引发一个flush。那些不相关的列族也有进行flush操作，尽管他们没有操作多少数据。Compaction操作现在是根据一个列族下的全部文件的数量触发的，而不是根据文件大小触发的。当很多的列族在flush和compaction时,会造成很多没用的I/O负载(要想解决这个问题，需要将flush和compaction操作只针对一个列族)
 。 更多紧缩信息, 参考<a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#compaction" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.5.5. Compaction" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5.5, “Compaction”</a>.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
尽量在你的应用中使用一个列族。只有你的所有查询操作只访问一个列族的时候，可以引入第二个和第三个列族.例如，你有两个列族,但你查询的时候总是访问其中的一个，从来不会两个一起访问。</p>
<div title="6.2.  On the number of column families" style="margin:0px">
<div title="6.2.1. Cardinality of ColumnFamilies" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t137" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.2.1. 列族的基数</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
一个表存在多列族，注意基数(如, 行数). 如果列族A有100万行，列族B有10亿行，列族A可能被分散到很多很多区(及区服务器)。这导致扫描列族A低效。</p>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="8.3.  单调递增Row Keys/时序数据(log)" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t138" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="rowkey.design" id="rowkey.design" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.3.  行键(RowKey)设计</h2>
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t139" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.3.1. 单调递增行键/时序数据</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
在Tom White的Hadoop: The Definitive Guide一书中，有一个章节描述了一个值得注意的问题：在一个集群中，一个导入数据的进程一动不动，所有的client都在等待一个region(就是一个节点)，过了一会后，变成了下一个region...如果使用了单调递增或者时序的key就会造成这样的问题。详情可以参见IKai画的漫画<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://ikaisays.com/2011/01/25/app-engine-datastore-tip-monotonically-increasing-values-are-bad/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">monotonically
 increasing values are bad</a>。使用了顺序的key会将本没有顺序的数据变得有顺序，把负载压在一台机器上。所以要尽量避免时间戳或者(e.g. 1, 2, 3)这样的key。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果你需要导入时间顺序的文件(如log)到HBase中，可以学习<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://opentsdb.net/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">OpenTSDB</a>的做法。他有一个页面来描述他的<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://opentsdb.net/schema.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">schema</a>.OpenTSDB的Key的格式是[metric_type][event_timestamp]，乍一看，似乎违背了不将timestamp做key的建议，但是他并没有将timestamp作为key的一个关键位置，有成百上千的metric_type就足够将压力分散到各个region了。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="8.4. 尽量最小化row和column的大小" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t140" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="keysize" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.3.2. 尽量最小化行和列的大小(为何我的存储文件指示很大？)</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
在HBase中，值是作为一个单元(Cell)保存在系统的中的，要定位一个单元，需要行，列名和时间戳。通常情况下，如果你的行和列的名字要是太大(甚至比value的大小还要大)的话，你可能会遇到一些有趣的情况。例如Marc Limotte 在 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-3551?page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel&amp;focusedCommentId=13005272#comment-13005272" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBASE-3551</a>(推荐!)尾部提到的现象。在HBase的存储文件<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hfile" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.5.2. StoreFile (HFile)" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5.2,
 “StoreFile (HFile)”</a>中，有一个索引用来方便值的随机访问，但是访问一个单元的坐标要是太大的话，会占用很大的内存，这个索引会被用尽。所以要想解决，可以设置一个更大的块大小，当然也可以使用更小的列名 。压缩也能得到更大指数。参考话题 <a target="_blank" href="http://search-hadoop.com/m/hemBv1LiN4Q1/a+question+storefileIndexSize&amp;subj=a+question+storefileIndexSize" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">a
 question storefileIndexSize</a> 用户邮件列表.</p>
<div title="6.3.2. Try to minimize row and column sizes" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
大部分时候，小的低效不会影响很大。不幸的是，这里会是个问题。无论是列族，属性和行键都会在数据中重复上亿次。参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#keyvalue" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.5.4. KeyValue" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5.4, “KeyValue”</a> 获取更多信息，关于HBase
 内部保存数据，了解为什么这很重要。</p>
<div title="6.3.2.1. Column Families" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t141" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="keysize.cf" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.3.2.1. 列族</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
尽量使列族名小，最好一个字符。(如 "d" 表示 data/default).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#keyvalue" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.5.4. KeyValue" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5.4, “KeyValue”</a> 获取更多信息，关于HBase 内部保存数据，了解为什么这很重要。</p>
</div>
<div title="6.3.2.2. Attributes" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t142" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="keysize.atttributes" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.3.2.2. 属性</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
详细属性名 (如, "myVeryImportantAttribute") 易读，最好还是用短属性名 (e.g., "via") 保存到HBase.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#keyvalue" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.5.4. KeyValue" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5.4, “KeyValue”</a> 获取更多信息，关于HBase 内部保存数据，了解为什么这很重要。</p>
</div>
<div title="6.3.2.3. Rowkey Length" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t143" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="keysize.row" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.3.2.3. 行键长度</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
让行键短到可读即可，这样对获取数据有用(e.g., Get vs. Scan)。 短键对访问数据无用，并不比长键对get/scan更好。设计行键需要权衡。</p>
</div>
<div title="6.3.2.4. Byte Patterns" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t144" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="keysize.patterns" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.3.2.4. 字节模式</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
long 类型有 8 字节. 8字节内可以保存无符号数字到18,446,744,073,709,551,615. 如果用字符串保存--假设一个字节一个字符--，需要将近3倍的字节数。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
不信? 下面是示例代码，可以自己运行一下。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_39_2377832" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">// long
//
long l = 1234567890L;
byte[] lb = Bytes.toBytes(l);
System.out.println("long bytes length: " + lb.length);   // returns 8
		
String s = "" + l;
byte[] sb = Bytes.toBytes(s);
System.out.println("long as string length: " + sb.length);    // returns 10
			
// hash 
//
MessageDigest md = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
byte[] digest = md.digest(Bytes.toBytes(s));
System.out.println("md5 digest bytes length: " + digest.length);    // returns 16
		
String sDigest = new String(digest);
byte[] sbDigest = Bytes.toBytes(sDigest);
System.out.println("md5 digest as string length: " + sbDigest.length);    // returns 26(译者注：实测值为22)		
</pre></div>
</div>
<div title="6.3.3. Reverse Timestamps" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t145" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="reverse.timestamp" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.3.3. 倒序时间戳</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
一个数据库处理的通常问题是找到最近版本的值。采用倒序时间戳作为键的一部分可以对此特定情况有很大帮助。也在Tom White的Hadoop书籍的HBase 章节能找到: The Definitive Guide (O'Reilly), 该技术包含追加(Long.MAX_VALUE - timestamp) 到key的后面，如 [key][reverse_timestamp].</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
表内[key]的最近的值可以用[key]进行 Scan 找到并获取第一个记录。由于 HBase 行键是排序的，该键排在任何比它老的行键的前面，所以必然是第一个。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
该技术可以用于代替<a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#schema.versions" rel="nofollow" title="6.4.  Number of Versions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 6.4, “ 版本的数量 ”</a> ，其目的是保存所有版本到“永远”(或一段很长时间) 。同时，采用同样的Scan技术，可以很快获取其他版本。</p>
</div>
<div title="6.3.4. Rowkeys and ColumnFamilies" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t146" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="rowkey.scope" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.3.4. 行键和列族</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
行键在列族范围内。所以同样的行键可以在同一个表的每个列族中存在而不会冲突。</p>
</div>
<div title="6.3.5. Immutability of Rowkeys" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t147" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="changing.rowkeys" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.3.5. 行键永远不变</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
行键不能改变。唯一可以“改变”的方式是删除然后再插入。这是一个网上常问问题，所以要注意开始就要让行键正确(且/或在插入很多数据之前)。</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t148" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.versions" id="schema.versions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.4.  版本数量</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div title="6.4.1. Maximum Number of Versions" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t149" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.versions.max" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.4.1. 最大版本数</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
行的版本的数量是<a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HColumnDescriptor.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HColumnDescriptor</a>设置的，每个列族可以单独设置，默认是3。这个设置是很重要的，在<a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#datamodel" rel="nofollow" title="Chapter 11. 数据模型" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Chapter 5, <em>数据模型</em></a>有描述，因为HBase是<em>不会</em>去覆盖一个值的，他只会在后面在追加写，用时间戳来区分、过早的版本会在执行主紧缩的时候删除。这个版本的值可以根据具体的应用增加减少。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
不推荐将版本最大值设到一个很高的水平 (如, 成百或更多)，除非老数据对你很重要。因为这会导致存储文件变得极大。</p>
</div>
<div title="6.4.2.  Minimum Number of Versions" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t150" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.minversions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.4.2.  最小版本数</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
和行的最大版本数一样，最小版本数也是通过<a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HColumnDescriptor.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HColumnDescriptor</a> 在每个列族中设置的。最小版本数缺省值是0，表示该特性禁用。 最小版本数参数和存活时间一起使用，允许配置如“保存最后T秒有价值数据，最多N个版本，但最少约M个版本”(M是最小版本数，M&lt;N)。
 该参数仅在存活时间对列族启用，且必须小于行版本数。</p>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t151" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="supported.datatypes" id="supported.datatypes" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.5.  支持数据类型</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase 通过 <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/Put.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Put</a> 和 <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/Result.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Result</a>支持
 "bytes-in/bytes-out" 接口，所以任何可被转为字节数组的东西可以作为值存入。输入可以是字符串，数字，复杂对象，甚至图像，只要他们能转为字节。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
存在值的实际长度限制 (如 保存 10-50MB 对象到 HBase 可能对查询来说太长); 搜索邮件列表获取本话题的对话。 HBase的所有行都遵循 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#datamodel" rel="nofollow" title="Chapter 5. Data Model" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Chapter 5, <em>数据模型</em></a>,
 包括版本化。 设计时需考虑到这些，以及列族的块大小。</p>
<div title="6.5.1. Counters" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t152" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="counters" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.5.1. 计数器</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
一种支持的数据类型，值得一提的是“计数器”(如, 具有原子递增能力的数值)。参考 HTable的 <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html#increment%28org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Increment%29" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Increment</a> .</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
同步计数器在区域服务器中完成，不是客户端。</p>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t153" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.joins" id="schema.joins" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.6. 联合</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果有多个表，不要在模式设计中忘了 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#joins" rel="nofollow" title="5.11. Joins" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 5.11, “Joins”</a> 的潜在因素。</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t154" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ttl" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.7. 存活时间 (TTL)</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
列族可以设置TTL秒数，HBase 在超时后将自动删除数据。影响 <em>全部</em> 行的全部版本 - 甚至当前版本。HBase里面TTL 时间时区是 UTC.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HColumnDescriptor" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HColumnDescriptor</a> 获取更多信息。</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t155" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="cf.keep.deleted" id="cf.keep.deleted" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.8.  保留删除的单元</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
列族允许是否保留单元。这就是说  <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/Get.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Get</a> 或 <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/Scan.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Scan</a> 操作仍可以获取删除的单元。由于这些操作指定时间范围，结束在删除单元发生效果之前。这甚至允许在删除进行时进行即时查询。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
删除的单元仍然受TTL控制，并永远不会超过“最大版本数”被删除的单元。新 "raw" scan 选项返回所有已删除的行和删除标志。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HColumnDescriptor.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HColumnDescriptor</a> 获取更多信息</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t156" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="secondary.indexes" id="secondary.indexes" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.9.  第二索引和改变路径查询</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
本节标题也可以为"如果表的行键像<em>这样</em> ，但我又想像<em>那样</em>查询该表." A common example on the dist-list is where a row-key is of the format "user-timestamp" but there are are reporting requirements on activity across users for certain time ranges. Thus, selecting by user is
 easy because it is in the lead position of the key, but time is not.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
There is no single answer on the best way to handle this because it depends on...</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ul type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>Number of users</li><li>Data size and data arrival rate</li><li>Flexibility of reporting requirements (e.g., completely ad-hoc date selection vs. pre-configured ranges)</li><li>Desired execution speed of query (e.g., 90 seconds may be reasonable to some for an ad-hoc report, whereas it may be too long for others)</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
... and solutions are also influenced by the size of the cluster and how much processing power you have to throw at the solution. Common techniques are in sub-sections below. This is a comprehensive, but not exhaustive, list of approaches.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
It should not be a surprise that secondary indexes require additional cluster space and processing. This is precisely what happens in an RDBMS because the act of creating an alternate index requires both space and processing cycles to update. RBDMS products
 are more advanced in this regard to handle alternative index management out of the box. However, HBase scales better at larger data volumes, so this is a feature trade-off.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Pay attention to <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#performance" rel="nofollow" title="Chapter 11. Performance Tuning" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Chapter 11, <em>Performance Tuning</em></a> when implementing any
 of these approaches.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Additionally, see the David Butler response in this dist-list thread <a target="_blank" href="http://search-hadoop.com/m/nvbiBp2TDP/Stargate%252Bhbase&amp;subj=Stargate+hbase" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBase, mail # user
 - Stargate+hbase</a></p>
<div title="6.9.1.  Filter Query" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t157" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="secondary.indexes.filter" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.9.1.  过滤查询</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
根据具体应用，可能和 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#client.filter" rel="nofollow" title="9.4. Client Request Filters" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.4, “Client Request Filters”</a> 用法相当。在这种情况下，没有第二索引被创建。然而，不要像这样从应用
 (如单线程客户端)中对大表尝试全表扫描。</p>
</div>
<div title="6.9.2.  Periodic-Update Secondary Index" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t158" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="secondary.indexes.periodic" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.9.2.  定期更新第二索引</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
第二索引可以在另一个表中创建，并通过MapReduce任务定期更新。任务可以在当天执行，但依赖于加载策略，可能会同主表失去同步。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#mapreduce.example.readwrite" rel="nofollow" title="7.2.2. HBase MapReduce Read/Write Example" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 7.2.2, “HBase MapReduce Read/Write Example”</a> 获取更多信息.</p>
</div>
<div title="6.9.3.  Dual-Write Secondary Index" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t159" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="secondary.indexes.dualwrite" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.9.3.  双写第二索引</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
另一个策略是在将数据写到集群的同时创建第二索引(如：写到数据表，同时写到索引表)。如果该方法在数据表存在之后采用，则需要利用MapReduce任务来生成已有数据的第二索引。 (参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#secondary.indexes.periodic" rel="nofollow" title="6.9.2.  Periodic-Update Secondary Index" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 6.9.2,
 “ Periodic-Update Secondary Index ”</a>).</p>
</div>
<div title="6.9.4.  Summary Tables" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t160" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="secondary.indexes.summary" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.9.4.  汇总表(Summary Tables)</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
对时间跨度长 (e.g., 年报) 和数据量巨大，汇总表是通用路径。可通过MapReduce任务生成到另一个表。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#mapreduce.example.summary" rel="nofollow" title="7.2.4. HBase MapReduce Summary to HBase Example" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 7.2.4, “HBase MapReduce Summary to HBase
 Example”</a> 获取更多信息。</p>
</div>
<div title="6.9.5.  Coprocessor Secondary Index" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t161" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="secondary.indexes.coproc" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.9.5.  协处理第二索引</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
协处理动作像 RDBMS 触发器。 这在 0.92中添加. 更多参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#coprocessors" rel="nofollow" title="9.6.3. Coprocessors" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.6.3, “Coprocessors”</a></p>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t162" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="constraints" id="constraints" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.10. 限制</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase currently supports 'constraints' in traditional (SQL) database parlance. The advised usage for Constraints is in enforcing business rules for attributes in the table (eg. make sure values are in the range 1-10). Constraints could also be used to enforce
 referential integrity, but this is strongly discouraged as it will dramatically decrease the write throughput of the tables where integrity checking is enabled. Extensive documentation on using Constraints can be found at: <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/constraint" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Constraint</a> since
 version 0.94.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t163" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.smackdown" id="schema.smackdown" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.11. 模式(schema)设计用例</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div title="6.11.2. Case Study - Log Data and Timeseries Data on Steroids" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
This effectively is the OpenTSDB approach. What OpenTSDB does is re-write data and pack rows into columns for certain time-periods. For a detailed explanation, see:<a target="_blank" href="http://opentsdb.net/schema.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">http://opentsdb.net/schema.html</a>,
 and <a target="_blank" href="http://www.cloudera.com/content/cloudera/en/resources/library/hbasecon/video-hbasecon-2012-lessons-learned-from-opentsdb.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Lessons Learned from OpenTSDB</a> from
 HBaseCon2012.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
But this is how the general concept works: data is ingested, for example, in this manner…</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">[hostname][log-event][timestamp1]  [hostname][log-event][timestamp2]  [hostname][log-event][timestamp3]  </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
… with separate rowkeys for each detailed event, but is re-written like this…</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
[hostname][log-event][timerange]</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
… and each of the above events are converted into columns stored with a time-offset relative to the beginning timerange (e.g., every 5 minutes). This is obviously a very advanced processing technique, but HBase makes this possible.</p>
</div>
<div title="6.11.3. Case Study - Customer/Order" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t164" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.casestudies.custorder" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.11.3. Case Study - Customer/Order</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Assume that HBase is used to store customer and order information. There are two core record-types being ingested: a Customer record type, and Order record type.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The Customer record type would include all the things that you’d typically expect:</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ul type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>Customer number</li><li>Customer name</li><li>Address (e.g., city, state, zip)</li><li>Phone numbers, etc.</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The Order record type would include things like:</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ul type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>Customer number</li><li>Order number</li><li>Sales date</li><li>A series of nested objects for shipping locations and line-items (see <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#schema.casestudies.custorder.obj" rel="nofollow" title="6.11.3.2. Order Object Design" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 6.11.3.2,
 “Order Object Design”</a> for details)</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Assuming that the combination of customer number and sales order uniquely identify an order, these two attributes will compose the rowkey, and specifically a composite key such as:</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
[customer number][order number]</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
… for a ORDER table. However, there are more design decisions to make: are the <em>raw</em> values the best choices for rowkeys?</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The same design questions in the Log Data use-case confront us here. What is the keyspace of the customer number, and what is the format (e.g., numeric? alphanumeric?) As it is advantageous to use fixed-length keys in HBase, as well as keys that can support
 a reasonable spread in the keyspace, similar options appear:</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Composite Rowkey With Hashes:</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ul type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>[MD5 of customer number] = 16 bytes</li><li>[MD5 of order number] = 16 bytes</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Composite Numeric/Hash Combo Rowkey:</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ul type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>[substituted long for customer number] = 8 bytes</li><li>[MD5 of order number] = 16 bytes</li></ul>
</div>
<div title="6.11.3.1. Single Table? Multiple Tables?" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t165" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.casestudies.custorder.tables" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.11.3.1. Single Table? Multiple Tables?</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A traditional design approach would have separate tables for CUSTOMER and SALES. Another option is to pack multiple record types into a single table (e.g., CUSTOMER++).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Customer Record Type Rowkey:</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ul type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>[customer-id]</li><li>[type] = type indicating ‘1’ for customer record type</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Order Record Type Rowkey:</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ul type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>[customer-id]</li><li>[type] = type indicating ‘2’ for order record type</li><li>[order]</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The advantage of this particular CUSTOMER++ approach is that organizes many different record-types by customer-id (e.g., a single scan could get you everything about that customer). The disadvantage is that it’s not as easy to scan for a particular record-type.</p>
</div>
<div title="6.11.3.2. Order Object Design" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t166" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.casestudies.custorder.obj" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.11.3.2. Order Object Design</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Now we need to address how to model the Order object. Assume that the class structure is as follows:</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">Order       ShippingLocation     (an Order can have multiple ShippingLocations)            LineItem               (a ShippingLocation can have multiple LineItems)  </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
... there are multiple options on storing this data.</p>
<div title="6.11.3.2.1. Completely Normalized" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t167" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.casestudies.custorder.obj.norm" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.11.3.2.1. Completely Normalized</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
With this approach, there would be separate tables for ORDER, SHIPPING_LOCATION, and LINE_ITEM.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The ORDER table's rowkey was described above: <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#schema.casestudies.custorder" rel="nofollow" title="6.11.3. Case Study - Customer/Order" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 6.11.3,
 “Case Study - Customer/Order”</a></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The SHIPPING_LOCATION's composite rowkey would be something like this:</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ul type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>[order-rowkey]</li><li>[shipping location number] (e.g., 1st location, 2nd, etc.)</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The LINE_ITEM table's composite rowkey would be something like this:</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ul type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>[order-rowkey]</li><li>[shipping location number] (e.g., 1st location, 2nd, etc.)</li><li>[line item number] (e.g., 1st lineitem, 2nd, etc.)</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Such a normalized model is likely to be the approach with an RDBMS, but that's not your only option with HBase. The cons of such an approach is that to retrieve information about any Order, you will need:</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ul type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>Get on the ORDER table for the Order</li><li>Scan on the SHIPPING_LOCATION table for that order to get the ShippingLocation instances</li><li>Scan on the LINE_ITEM for each ShippingLocation</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
... granted, this is what an RDBMS would do under the covers anyway, but since there are no joins in HBase you're just more aware of this fact.</p>
</div>
<div title="6.11.3.2.2. Single Table With Record Types" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t168" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.casestudies.custorder.obj.rectype" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.11.3.2.2. Single Table With Record Types</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
With this approach, there would exist a single table ORDER that would contain</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The Order rowkey was described above: <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#schema.casestudies.custorder" rel="nofollow" title="6.11.3. Case Study - Customer/Order" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 6.11.3, “Case
 Study - Customer/Order”</a></p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ul type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>[order-rowkey]</li><li>[ORDER record type]</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The ShippingLocation composite rowkey would be something like this:</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ul type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>[order-rowkey]</li><li>[SHIPPING record type]</li><li>[shipping location number] (e.g., 1st location, 2nd, etc.)</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The LineItem composite rowkey would be something like this:</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ul type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>[order-rowkey]</li><li>[LINE record type]</li><li>[shipping location number] (e.g., 1st location, 2nd, etc.)</li><li>[line item number] (e.g., 1st lineitem, 2nd, etc.)</li></ul>
</div>
</div>
<div title="6.11.3.2.3. Denormalized" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t169" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.casestudies.custorder.obj.denorm" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.11.3.2.3. Denormalized</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A variant of the Single Table With Record Types approach is to denormalize and flatten some of the object hierarchy, such as collapsing the ShippingLocation attributes onto each LineItem instance.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The LineItem composite rowkey would be something like this:</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ul type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>[order-rowkey]</li><li>[LINE record type]</li><li>[line item number] (e.g., 1st lineitem, 2nd, etc. - care must be taken that there are unique across the entire order)</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
... and the LineItem columns would be something like this:</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ul type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>itemNumber</li><li>quantity</li><li>price</li><li>shipToLine1 (denormalized from ShippingLocation)</li><li>shipToLine2 (denormalized from ShippingLocation)</li><li>shipToCity (denormalized from ShippingLocation)</li><li>shipToState (denormalized from ShippingLocation)</li><li>shipToZip (denormalized from ShippingLocation)</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The pros of this approach include a less complex object heirarchy, but one of the cons is that updating gets more complicated in case any of this information changes.</p>
</div>
<div title="6.11.3.2.4. Object BLOB" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t170" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.casestudies.custorder.obj.singleobj" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.11.3.2.4. Object BLOB</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
With this approach, the entire Order object graph is treated, in one way or another, as a BLOB. For example, the ORDER table's rowkey was described above: <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#schema.casestudies.custorder" rel="nofollow" title="6.11.3. Case Study - Customer/Order" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 6.11.3,
 “Case Study - Customer/Order”</a>, and a single column called "order" would contain an object that could be deserialized that contained a container Order, ShippingLocations, and LineItems.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
There are many options here: JSON, XML, Java Serialization, Avro, Hadoop Writables, etc. All of them are variants of the same approach: encode the object graph to a byte-array. Care should be taken with this approach to ensure backward compatibilty in case
 the object model changes such that older persisted structures can still be read back out of HBase.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Pros are being able to manage complex object graphs with minimal I/O (e.g., a single HBase Get per Order in this example), but the cons include the aforementioned warning about backward compatiblity of serialization, language dependencies of serialization (e.g.,
 Java Serialization only works with Java clients), the fact that you have to deserialize the entire object to get any piece of information inside the BLOB, and the difficulty in getting frameworks like Hive to work with custom objects like this.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div title="6.11.4. Case Study - 'Tall/Wide/Middle' Schema Design Smackdown" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t171" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.smackdown" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.11.4. Case Study - "Tall/Wide/Middle" Schema Design Smackdown</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
This section will describe additional schema design questions that appear on the dist-list, specifically about tall and wide tables. These are general guidelines and not laws - each application must consider its own needs.</p>
<div title="6.11.4.1. Rows vs. Versions" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t172" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.smackdown.rowsversions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.11.4.1. Rows vs. Versions</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A common question is whether one should prefer rows or HBase's built-in-versioning. The context is typically where there are "a lot" of versions of a row to be retained (e.g., where it is significantly above the HBase default of 3 max versions). The rows-approach
 would require storing a timstamp in some portion of the rowkey so that they would not overwite with each successive update.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Preference: Rows (generally speaking).</p>
</div>
<div title="6.11.4.2. Rows vs. Columns" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t173" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.smackdown.rowscols" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.11.4.2. Rows vs. Columns</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Another common question is whether one should prefer rows or columns. The context is typically in extreme cases of wide tables, such as having 1 row with 1 million attributes, or 1 million rows with 1 columns apiece.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Preference: Rows (generally speaking). To be clear, this guideline is in the context is in extremely wide cases, not in the standard use-case where one needs to store a few dozen or hundred columns. But there is also a middle path between these two options,
 and that is "Rows as Columns."</p>
</div>
<div title="6.11.4.3. Rows as Columns" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t174" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.smackdown.rowsascols" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.11.4.3. Rows as Columns</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The middle path between Rows vs. Columns is packing data that would be a separate row into columns, for certain rows. OpenTSDB is the best example of this case where a single row represents a defined time-range, and then discrete events are treated as columns.
 This approach is often more complex, and may require the additional complexity of re-writing your data, but has the advantage of being I/O efficient. For an overview of this approach, see <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">???</a>.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div title="6.11.5. Case Study - List Data" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t175" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="casestudies.schema.listdata" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.11.5. Case Study - List Data</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The following is an exchange from the user dist-list regarding a fairly common question: how to handle per-user list data in Apache HBase.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
*** QUESTION ***</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
We're looking at how to store a large amount of (per-user) list data in HBase, and we were trying to figure out what kind of access pattern made the most sense. One option is store the majority of the data in a key, so we could have something like:</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">&lt;FixedWidthUserName&gt;&lt;FixedWidthValueId1&gt;:"" (no value)  &lt;FixedWidthUserName&gt;&lt;FixedWidthValueId2&gt;:"" (no value)  &lt;FixedWidthUserName&gt;&lt;FixedWidthValueId3&gt;:"" (no value)  			</pre>
The other option we had was to do this entirely using:
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">&lt;FixedWidthUserName&gt;&lt;FixedWidthPageNum0&gt;:&lt;FixedWidthLength&gt;&lt;FixedIdNextPageNum&gt;&lt;ValueId1&gt;&lt;ValueId2&gt;&lt;ValueId3&gt;...  &lt;FixedWidthUserName&gt;&lt;FixedWidthPageNum1&gt;:&lt;FixedWidthLength&gt;&lt;FixedIdNextPageNum&gt;&lt;ValueId1&gt;&lt;ValueId2&gt;&lt;ValueId3&gt;...      		</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
where each row would contain multiple values. So in one case reading the first thirty values would be:</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">scan { STARTROW =&gt; 'FixedWidthUsername' LIMIT =&gt; 30}      		</pre>
And in the second case it would be
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">get 'FixedWidthUserName\x00\x00\x00\x00'      		</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The general usage pattern would be to read only the first 30 values of these lists, with infrequent access reading deeper into the lists. Some users would have &lt;= 30 total values in these lists, and some users would have millions (i.e. power-law distribution)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The single-value format seems like it would take up more space on HBase, but would offer some improved retrieval / pagination flexibility. Would there be any significant performance advantages to be able to paginate via gets vs paginating with scans?</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
My initial understanding was that doing a scan should be faster if our paging size is unknown (and caching is set appropriately), but that gets should be faster if we'll always need the same page size. I've ended up hearing different people tell me opposite
 things about performance. I assume the page sizes would be relatively consistent, so for most use cases we could guarantee that we only wanted one page of data in the fixed-page-length case. I would also assume that we would have infrequent updates, but may
 have inserts into the middle of these lists (meaning we'd need to update all subsequent rows).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Thanks for help / suggestions / follow-up questions.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
*** ANSWER ***</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If I understand you correctly, you're ultimately trying to store triples in the form "user, valueid, value", right? E.g., something like:</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">"user123, firstname, Paul",  "user234, lastname, Smith"  			</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
(But the usernames are fixed width, and the valueids are fixed width).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
And, your access pattern is along the lines of: "for user X, list the next 30 values, starting with valueid Y". Is that right? And these values should be returned sorted by valueid?</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The tl;dr version is that you should probably go with one row per user+value, and not build a complicated intra-row pagination scheme on your own unless you're really sure it is needed.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Your two options mirror a common question people have when designing HBase schemas: should I go "tall" or "wide"? Your first schema is "tall": each row represents one value for one user, and so there are many rows in the table for each user; the row key is
 user + valueid, and there would be (presumably) a single column qualifier that means "the value". This is great if you want to scan over rows in sorted order by row key (thus my question above, about whether these ids are sorted correctly). You can start a
 scan at any user+valueid, read the next 30, and be done. What you're giving up is the ability to have transactional guarantees around all the rows for one user, but it doesn't sound like you need that. Doing it this way is generally recommended (see here <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#schema.smackdown" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">#schema.smackdown</a>).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Your second option is "wide": you store a bunch of values in one row, using different qualifiers (where the qualifier is the valueid). The simple way to do that would be to just store ALL values for one user in a single row. I'm guessing you jumped to the "paginated"
 version because you're assuming that storing millions of columns in a single row would be bad for performance, which may or may not be true; as long as you're not trying to do too much in a single request, or do things like scanning over and returning all
 of the cells in the row, it shouldn't be fundamentally worse. The client has methods that allow you to get specific slices of columns.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Note that neither case fundamentally uses more disk space than the other; you're just "shifting" part of the identifying information for a value either to the left (into the row key, in option one) or to the right (into the column qualifiers in option 2). Under
 the covers, every key/value still stores the whole row key, and column family name. (If this is a bit confusing, take an hour and watch Lars George's excellent video about understanding HBase schema design: <a target="_blank" href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_HLoH_PgrLk)" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_HLoH_PgrLk)</a>.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A manually paginated version has lots more complexities, as you note, like having to keep track of how many things are in each page, re-shuffling if new values are inserted, etc. That seems significantly more complex. It might have some slight speed advantages
 (or disadvantages!) at extremely high throughput, and the only way to really know that would be to try it out. If you don't have time to build it both ways and compare, my advice would be to start with the simplest option (one row per user+value). Start simple
 and iterate! :)</p>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
<div title="6.10.2. Rows vs. Columns" style="margin:0px"></div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t176" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.ops" id="schema.ops" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>6.12. 业务和性能配置选项</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 the Performance section <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#perf.schema" rel="nofollow" title="11.6. Schema Design" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 11.6, “Schema Design”</a> for more information operational
 and performance schema design options, such as Bloom Filters, Table-configured regionsizes, compression, and blocksizes.</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px"></div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
</div>
</div>
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t177" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a> </h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">

<div style="margin:0px">

<a target="_blank" name="t178" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="mapreduce" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>Chapter 7. HBase 和 MapReduce</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="toc" style="margin:0px">
