<strong>Table of Contents</strong></p>
<dl style="margin:0.8em 0px; line-height:1.2"><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#splitter" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">7.1. 默认 HBase MapReduce 分割器(Splitter)</a></span></dt><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#mapreduce.example" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">7.2. HBase Input MapReduce 例子</a></span></dt><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#mapreduce.htable.access" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">7.3. 在一个MapReduce Job中访问其他的HBase Tables</a></span></dt><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#mapreduce.specex" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">7.4. 预测执行</a></span></dt></dl>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
关于 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/mapreduce/package-summary.html#package_description" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBase 和 MapReduce</a>详见 javadocs. 下面是一些附加的帮助文档.
 MapReduce的更多信息 (如，通用框架), 参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://hadoop.apache.org/common/docs/current/mapred_tutorial.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Hadoop MapReduce Tutorial</a>.</p>
<div class="section" title="7.1. 默认 HBase MapReduce 分割器(Splitter)" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t179" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="splitter" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>7.1. Map-Task 分割</h2>
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t180" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>7.1.1 默认 HBase MapReduce 分割器(Splitter)</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当 MapReduce 任务的HBase 表使用<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/mapreduce/TableInputFormat.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">TableInputFormat</a>为数据源格式的时候,他的splitter会给这个table的每个region一个map。因此，如果一个table有100个region，就有100个map-tasks，不论需需要scan多少个列族
 。</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t181" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>7.1.2. 自定义分割器</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
iv&gt;
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For those interested in implementing custom splitters, see the method getSplits in <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/mapreduce/TableInputFormatBase.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">TableInputFormatBase</a>.
 That is where the logic for map-task assignment resides.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="7.2. HBase Input MapReduce 例子" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t182" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="mapreduce.example" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>7.2. HBase MapReduce 例子</h2>
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t183" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>7.2.1 HBase MapReduce 读取例子</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
下面是使用HBase 作为源的MapReduce读取示例。特别是仅有Mapper实例，没有Reducer。Mapper什么也不产生。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如下所示...</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_40_5249304" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">Configuration config = HBaseConfiguration.create();
Job job = new Job(config, "ExampleRead");
job.setJarByClass(MyReadJob.class);     // class that contains mapper
	
Scan scan = new Scan();
scan.setCaching(500);        // 1 is the default in Scan, which will be bad for MapReduce jobs
scan.setCacheBlocks(false);  // don't set to true for MR jobs
// set other scan attrs
...
  
TableMapReduceUtil.initTableMapperJob(
  tableName,        // input HBase table name
  scan,             // Scan instance to control CF and attribute selection
  MyMapper.class,   // mapper
  null,             // mapper output key 
  null,             // mapper output value
  job);
job.setOutputFormatClass(NullOutputFormat.class);   // because we aren't emitting anything from mapper
	    
boolean b = job.waitForCompletion(true);
if (!b) {
  throw new IOException("error with job!");
}</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
...mapper需要继承于<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/mapreduce/TableMapper.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">TableMapper</a>...</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_41_1958431" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">public class MyMapper extends TableMapper&lt;Text, LongWritable&gt; {
public void map(ImmutableBytesWritable row, Result value, Context context) 
throws InterruptedException, IOException {
// process data for the row from the Result instance.</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="7.2. HBase MapReduce Examples" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px"></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="7.2.2. HBase MapReduce Read/Write Example" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t184" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="mapreduce.example.readwrite" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>7.2.2. HBase MapReduce 读/写 示例</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
下面是使用HBase 作为源和目标的MapReduce示例. 本示例简单从一个表复制到另一个表。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_42_8384933" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">Configuration config = HBaseConfiguration.create();
Job job = new Job(config,"ExampleReadWrite");
job.setJarByClass(MyReadWriteJob.class);    // class that contains mapper
	        	        
Scan scan = new Scan();
scan.setCaching(500);        // 1 is the default in Scan, which will be bad for MapReduce jobs
scan.setCacheBlocks(false);  // don't set to true for MR jobs
// set other scan attrs
	        
TableMapReduceUtil.initTableMapperJob(
	sourceTable,      // input table
	scan,	          // Scan instance to control CF and attribute selection
	MyMapper.class,   // mapper class
	null,	          // mapper output key
	null,	          // mapper output value
	job);
TableMapReduceUtil.initTableReducerJob(
	targetTable,      // output table
	null,             // reducer class
	job);
job.setNumReduceTasks(0);
	        
boolean b = job.waitForCompletion(true);
if (!b) {
    throw new IOException("error with job!");
}
    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="classname">TableMapReduceUtil做了什么需要解释</code>, 特别是对 reducer. <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/mapreduce/TableOutputFormat.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">TableOutputFormat</a> 作为
 outputFormat 类, 几个参数在config中设置(e.g., TableOutputFormat.OUTPUT_TABLE), 同时设置reducer output key 到<code class="classname">ImmutableBytesWritable</code> 和 reducer value到 <code class="classname">Writable</code>. 这可以编程时设置到job和conf，但<code class="classname">TableMapReduceUtil</code> 使其变简单.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
下面是 mapper示例, 创建一个 <code class="classname">Put</code>，匹配输入的 <code class="classname">Result</code> 并提交. Note: 这是 CopyTable 工具做的.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_43_1289426" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">public static class MyMapper extends TableMapper&lt;ImmutableBytesWritable, Put&gt;  {

	public void map(ImmutableBytesWritable row, Result value, Context context) throws IOException, InterruptedException {
		// this example is just copying the data from the source table...
   		context.write(row, resultToPut(row,value));
   	}
        
  	private static Put resultToPut(ImmutableBytesWritable key, Result result) throws IOException {
  		Put put = new Put(key.get());
 		for (KeyValue kv : result.raw()) {
			put.add(kv);
		}
		return put;
   	}
}
    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这不是真正的 reducer 步骤, 所以 <code class="classname">TableOutputFormat</code> 处理发送 <code class="classname">Put</code> 到目标表.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这仅是示例, 开发者可以选择不使用<code class="classname">TableOutputFormat</code>并自己连接到目标表。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="7.2.3. HBase MapReduce Read/Write Example With Multi-Table Output" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t185" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="mapreduce.example.readwrite.multi" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>7.2.3. HBase MapReduce Read/Write 多表输出示例</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
TODO: <code class="classname">MultiTableOutputFormat</code> 示例.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="7.2.4. HBase MapReduce Summary to HBase Example" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t186" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="mapreduce.example.summary" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>7.2.4. HBase MapReduce 汇总到 HBase 示例</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
下面是使用HBase 作为源和目标的MapReduce示例，具有汇总步骤。本示例计算一个表中值的个数，并将汇总的计数输出到另一个表。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_44_2209050" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">Configuration config = HBaseConfiguration.create();
Job job = new Job(config,"ExampleSummary");
job.setJarByClass(MySummaryJob.class);     // class that contains mapper and reducer
	        
Scan scan = new Scan();
scan.setCaching(500);        // 1 is the default in Scan, which will be bad for MapReduce jobs
scan.setCacheBlocks(false);  // don't set to true for MR jobs
// set other scan attrs
	        
TableMapReduceUtil.initTableMapperJob(
	sourceTable,        // input table
	scan,               // Scan instance to control CF and attribute selection
	MyMapper.class,     // mapper class
	Text.class,         // mapper output key
	IntWritable.class,  // mapper output value
	job);
TableMapReduceUtil.initTableReducerJob(
	targetTable,        // output table
	MyTableReducer.class,    // reducer class
	job);
job.setNumReduceTasks(1);   // at least one, adjust as required
	    
boolean b = job.waitForCompletion(true);
if (!b) {
	throw new IOException("error with job!");
}    
    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
本示例mapper，将一个列的一个字符串值作为汇总值。该值作为key在mapper中生成。 <code class="classname">IntWritable</code> 代表一个实例计数。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_45_2506228" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">public static class MyMapper extends TableMapper&lt;Text, IntWritable&gt;  {

	private final IntWritable ONE = new IntWritable(1);
   	private Text text = new Text();
    	
   	public void map(ImmutableBytesWritable row, Result value, Context context) throws IOException, InterruptedException {
        	String val = new String(value.getValue(Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("attr1")));
          	text.set(val);     // we can only emit Writables...

        	context.write(text, ONE);
   	}
}
    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
在 reducer, "ones" 被统计 (和其他 MR 示例一样), 产生一个 <code class="classname">Put</code>.</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_46_7263507" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">public static class MyTableReducer extends TableReducer&lt;Text, IntWritable, ImmutableBytesWritable&gt;  {
        
 	public void reduce(Text key, Iterable&lt;IntWritable&gt; values, Context context) throws IOException, InterruptedException {
    		int i = 0;
    		for (IntWritable val : values) {
    			i += val.get();
    		}
    		Put put = new Put(Bytes.toBytes(key.toString()));
    		put.add(Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("count"), Bytes.toBytes(i));

    		context.write(null, put);
   	}
}
    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="7.2.5. HBase MapReduce Summary to File Example" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t187" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="mapreduce.example.summary.file" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>7.2.5. HBase MapReduce 汇总到文件示例</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
This very similar to the summary example above, with exception that this is using HBase as a MapReduce source but HDFS as the sink. The differences are in the job setup and in the reducer. The mapper remains the same.</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_47_2053807" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">Configuration config = HBaseConfiguration.create();
Job job = new Job(config,"ExampleSummaryToFile");
job.setJarByClass(MySummaryFileJob.class);     // class that contains mapper and reducer
	        
Scan scan = new Scan();
scan.setCaching(500);        // 1 is the default in Scan, which will be bad for MapReduce jobs
scan.setCacheBlocks(false);  // don't set to true for MR jobs
// set other scan attrs
	        
TableMapReduceUtil.initTableMapperJob(
	sourceTable,        // input table
	scan,               // Scan instance to control CF and attribute selection
	MyMapper.class,     // mapper class
	Text.class,         // mapper output key
	IntWritable.class,  // mapper output value
	job);
job.setReducerClass(MyReducer.class);    // reducer class
job.setNumReduceTasks(1);    // at least one, adjust as required
FileOutputFormat.setOutputPath(job, new Path("/tmp/mr/mySummaryFile"));  // adjust directories as required
	    
boolean b = job.waitForCompletion(true);
if (!b) {
	throw new IOException("error with job!");
}    
    </pre>As stated above, the previous Mapper can run unchanged with this example. As for the Reducer, it is a "generic" Reducer instead of extending TableMapper and emitting Puts.<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_48_2940412" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);"> public static class MyReducer extends Reducer&lt;Text, IntWritable, Text, IntWritable&gt;  {
        
	public void reduce(Text key, Iterable&lt;IntWritable&gt; values, Context context) throws IOException, InterruptedException {
		int i = 0;
		for (IntWritable val : values) {
			i += val.get();
		}	
		context.write(key, new IntWritable(i));
	}
}
    </pre></div>
<div class="section" title="7.2.6. HBase MapReduce Summary to HBase Without Reducer" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t188" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="mapreduce.example.summary.noreducer" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>7.2.6. HBase MapReduce 没有Reducer时汇总到 HBase</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
It is also possible to perform summaries without a reducer - if you use HBase as the reducer.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
An HBase target table would need to exist for the job summary. The HTable method <code class="code">incrementColumnValue</code> would be used to atomically increment values. From a performance perspective, it might make sense to keep a Map of values with their
 values to be incremeneted for each map-task, and make one update per key at during the <code class="code">cleanup</code> method of the mapper. However, your milage may vary depending on the number of rows to be processed and unique keys.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
In the end, the summary results are in HBase.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="7.2.7. HBase MapReduce Summary to RDBMS" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t189" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="mapreduce.example.summary.rdbms" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>7.2.7. HBase MapReduce 汇总到 RDBMS</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
有时更合适产生汇总到 RDBMS.这种情况下,可以将汇总直接通过一个自定义的reducer输出到 RDBMS 。 <code class="code">setup</code> 方法可以连接到 RDBMS (连接信息可以通过context的自定义参数传递)， cleanup 可以关闭连接.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
关键需要理解job的多个reducer会影响汇总实现，必须在reducer中进行设计。无论是一个recucer还是多个reducer。不管对错, 依赖于你的用例。认识到多个reducer分配到job，需要创建多个并发的RDBMS连接-可以扩充，但仅在一个点。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_49_7141284" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);"> public static class MyRdbmsReducer extends Reducer&lt;Text, IntWritable, Text, IntWritable&gt;  {

	private Connection c = null;
	
	public void setup(Context context) {
  		// create DB connection...
  	}
        
	public void reduce(Text key, Iterable&lt;IntWritable&gt; values, Context context) throws IOException, InterruptedException {
		// do summarization
		// in this example the keys are Text, but this is just an example
	}
	
	public void cleanup(Context context) {
  		// close db connection
  	}
	
}
    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
最后，汇总的结果被写入到 RDBMS 表.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="7.3. 在一个MapReduce Job中访问其他的HBase Tables" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px"></div>
</div>
</div>
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t190" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="mapreduce.htable.access" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>7.3. 在一个MapReduce Job中访问其他的HBase Tables</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
尽管现有的框架允许一个HBase table作为一个MapReduce job的输入，其他的HBase table可以同时作为普通的表被访问。例如在一个MapReduce的job中，可以在Mapper的setup方法中创建HTable实例。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_50_1582920" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">public class MyMapper extends TableMapper&lt;Text, LongWritable&gt; {
  private HTable myOtherTable;

  @Override
  public void setup(Context context) {
    myOtherTable = new HTable("myOtherTable");
  }</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="7.4. 预测执行" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t191" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="mapreduce.specex" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>7.4. 预测执行</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
通常建议关掉针对HBase的MapReduce job的预测执行(speculative execution)功能。这个功能也可以用每个Job的配置来完成。对于整个集群，使用预测执行意味着双倍的运算量。这可不是你所希望的。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#spec.ex" rel="nofollow" title="2.8.2.9. Speculative Execution" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 2.8.2.9, “Speculative Execution”</a> 获取更多信息。</p>
</div>
</div>

<div class="section" title="8.1. Secure Client Access to HBase" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t193" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.secure.configuration" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>8.1. 安全客户端访问HBase</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
新版 HBase (&gt;= 0.92) 支持客户端可选 SASL 认证.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这里描述如何设置HBase 和 HBase 客户端，以安全连接到HBase 资源.</p>
<div class="section" title="8.1.1. Prerequisites" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t194" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e4347" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>8.1.1. 先决条件</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase 必须使用 安全Hadoop/HBase的新 maven 配置文件： <code class="code">-P security</code>. Secure Hadoop dependent classes are separated under a pseudo-module in the security/ directory and are only included if built with the secure Hadoop profile.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
You need to have a working Kerberos KDC.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A HBase configured for secure client access is expected to be running on top of a secured HDFS cluster. HBase must be able to authenticate to HDFS services. HBase needs Kerberos credentials to interact with the Kerberos-enabled HDFS daemons. Authenticating
 a service should be done using a keytab file. The procedure for creating keytabs for HBase service is the same as for creating keytabs for Hadoop. Those steps are omitted here. Copy the resulting keytab files to wherever HBase Master and RegionServer processes
 are deployed and make them readable only to the user account under which the HBase daemons will run.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A Kerberos principal has three parts, with the form <code class="code">username/fully.qualified.domain.name@YOUR-REALM.COM</code>. We recommend using <code class="code">hbase</code> as the username portion.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The following is an example of the configuration properties for Kerberos operation that must be added to the <code class="code">hbase-site.xml</code> file on every server machine in the cluster. Required for even the most basic interactions with a secure Hadoop
 configuration, independent of HBase security.</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_51_4737016" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">      &lt;property&gt;
        &lt;name&gt;hbase.regionserver.kerberos.principal&lt;/name&gt;
        &lt;value&gt;hbase/_HOST@YOUR-REALM.COM&lt;/value&gt;
      &lt;/property&gt;
      &lt;property&gt;
        &lt;name&gt;hbase.regionserver.keytab.file&lt;/name&gt;
        &lt;value&gt;/etc/hbase/conf/keytab.krb5&lt;/value&gt;
      &lt;/property&gt;
      &lt;property&gt;
        &lt;name&gt;hbase.master.kerberos.principal&lt;/name&gt;
        &lt;value&gt;hbase/_HOST@YOUR-REALM.COM&lt;/value&gt;
      &lt;/property&gt;
      &lt;property&gt;
        &lt;name&gt;hbase.master.keytab.file&lt;/name&gt;
        &lt;value&gt;/etc/hbase/conf/keytab.krb5&lt;/value&gt;
      &lt;/property&gt;
    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Each HBase client user should also be given a Kerberos principal. This principal should have a password assigned to it (as opposed to a keytab file). The client principal's <code class="code">maxrenewlife</code> should be set so that it can be renewed enough
 times for the HBase client process to complete. For example, if a user runs a long-running HBase client process that takes at most 3 days, we might create this user's principal within <code class="code">kadmin</code> with: <code class="code">addprinc -maxrenewlife
 3days</code></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Long running daemons with indefinite lifetimes that require client access to HBase can instead be configured to log in from a keytab. For each host running such daemons, create a keytab with<code class="code">kadmin</code> or <code class="code">kadmin.local</code>.
 The procedure for creating keytabs for HBase service is the same as for creating keytabs for Hadoop. Those steps are omitted here. Copy the resulting keytab files to where the client daemon will execute and make them readable only to the user account under
 which the daemon will run.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="8.1.2. Server-side Configuration for Secure Operation" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t195" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e4393" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>8.1.2. 安全操作的服务器端配置</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
增加下列内容到 <code class="code">hbase-site.xml</code> file on every server machine in the cluster:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_52_3082347" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">      &lt;property&gt;
        &lt;name&gt;hbase.security.authentication&lt;/name&gt;
        &lt;value&gt;kerberos&lt;/value&gt; 
      &lt;/property&gt; 
      &lt;property&gt;
        &lt;name&gt;hbase.security.authorization&lt;/name&gt;
        &lt;value&gt;true&lt;/value&gt;
      &lt;/property&gt;
      &lt;property&gt;
        &lt;name&gt;hbase.rpc.engine&lt;/name&gt;
        &lt;value&gt;org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.SecureRpcEngine&lt;/value&gt;
      &lt;/property&gt;
      &lt;property&gt;
      &lt;name&gt;hbase.coprocessor.region.classes&lt;/name&gt;
        &lt;value&gt;org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.token.TokenProvider&lt;/value&gt;
      &lt;/property&gt;
    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A full shutdown and restart of HBase service is required when deploying these configuration changes.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="8.1.3. Client-side Configuration for Secure Operation" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t196" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e4405" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>8.1.3. 客户端安全操作配置</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
每个客户端增加下列内容到 <code class="code">hbase-site.xml</code>:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_53_3379524" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">      &lt;property&gt;
        &lt;name&gt;hbase.security.authentication&lt;/name&gt;
        &lt;value&gt;kerberos&lt;/value&gt;
      &lt;/property&gt; 
      &lt;property&gt;
        &lt;name&gt;hbase.rpc.engine&lt;/name&gt;
        &lt;value&gt;org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.SecureRpcEngine&lt;/value&gt;
      &lt;/property&gt;
    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The client environment must be logged in to Kerberos from KDC or keytab via the <code class="code">kinit</code> command before communication with the HBase cluster will be possible.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Be advised that if the <code class="code">hbase.security.authentication</code> and <code class="code">hbase.rpc.engine</code> properties in the client- and server-side site files do not match, the client will not be able to communicate with the cluster.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Once HBase is configured for secure RPC it is possible to optionally configure encrypted communication. To do so, 增加下列内容到 <code class="code">hbase-site.xml</code> file on every client:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_54_6708344" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">      &lt;property&gt;
        &lt;name&gt;hbase.rpc.protection&lt;/name&gt;
        &lt;value&gt;privacy&lt;/value&gt;
      &lt;/property&gt;
    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
This configuration property can also be set on a per connection basis. Set it in the <code class="code">Configuration</code> supplied to <code class="code">HTable</code>:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_55_451869" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">      Configuration conf = HBaseConfiguration.create();
      conf.set("hbase.rpc.protection", "privacy");
      HTable table = new HTable(conf, tablename);
    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Expect a ~10% performance penalty for encrypted communication.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="8.1.4. Client-side Configuration for Secure Operation - Thrift Gateway" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t197" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e4447" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>8.1.4. 客户端安全操作配置 - Thrift 网关</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
每个Thrift网关增加下列内容到 <code class="code">hbase-site.xml</code>:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_56_782066" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">    &lt;property&gt;
      &lt;name&gt;hbase.thrift.keytab.file&lt;/name&gt;
      &lt;value&gt;/etc/hbase/conf/hbase.keytab&lt;/value&gt;
    &lt;/property&gt;
    &lt;property&gt;
      &lt;name&gt;hbase.thrift.kerberos.principal&lt;/name&gt;
      &lt;value&gt;$USER/_HOST@HADOOP.LOCALDOMAIN&lt;/value&gt;
    &lt;/property&gt;
    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Substitute the appropriate credential and keytab for $USER and $KEYTAB respectively.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The Thrift gateway will authenticate with HBase using the supplied credential. No authentication will be performed by the Thrift gateway itself. All client access via the Thrift gateway will use the Thrift gateway's credential and have its privilege.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="8.1.5. Client-side Configuration for Secure Operation - REST Gateway" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t198" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e4462" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>8.1.5. 客户端安全操作配置 - REST 网关</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
每个REST网关增加下列内容到 <code class="code">hbase-site.xml</code>:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_57_2159039" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">    &lt;property&gt;
      &lt;name&gt;hbase.rest.keytab.file&lt;/name&gt;
      &lt;value&gt;$KEYTAB&lt;/value&gt;
    &lt;/property&gt;
    &lt;property&gt;
      &lt;name&gt;hbase.rest.kerberos.principal&lt;/name&gt;
      &lt;value&gt;$USER/_HOST@HADOOP.LOCALDOMAIN&lt;/value&gt;
    &lt;/property&gt;
    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Substitute the appropriate credential and keytab for $USER and $KEYTAB respectively.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The REST gateway will authenticate with HBase using the supplied credential. No authentication will be performed by the REST gateway itself. All client access via the REST gateway will use the REST gateway's credential and have its privilege.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
It should be possible for clients to authenticate with the HBase cluster through the REST gateway in a pass-through manner via SPEGNO HTTP authentication. This is future work.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="8.2. Access Control" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t199" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.accesscontrol.configuration" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>8.2. 访问控制</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Newer releases of HBase (&gt;= 0.92) support optional access control list (ACL-) based protection of resources on a column family and/or table basis.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
This describes how to set up Secure HBase for access control, with an example of granting and revoking user permission on table resources provided.</p>
<div class="section" title="8.2.1. Prerequisites" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t200" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e4487" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>8.2.1. 先决条件</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
You must configure HBase for secure operation. Refer to the section "安全客户端访问HBase" and complete all of the steps described there.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
You must also configure ZooKeeper for secure operation. Changes to ACLs are synchronized throughout the cluster using ZooKeeper. Secure authentication to ZooKeeper must be enabled or otherwise it will be possible to subvert HBase access control via direct client
 access to ZooKeeper. Refer to the section on secure ZooKeeper configuration and complete all of the steps described there.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="8.2.2. Overview" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t201" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e4494" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>8.2.2. 概述</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
With Secure RPC and Access Control enabled, client access to HBase is authenticated and user data is private unless access has been explicitly granted. Access to data can be granted at a table or per column family basis.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
However, the following items have been left out of the initial implementation for simplicity:</p>
<div class="orderedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ol class="orderedlist" type="1" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Row-level or per value (cell): This would require broader changes for storing the ACLs inline with rows. It is a future goal.</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Push down of file ownership to HDFS: HBase is not designed for the case where files may have different permissions than the HBase system principal. Pushing file ownership down into HDFS would necessitate changes to core code. Also, while HDFS file ownership
 would make applying quotas easy, and possibly make bulk imports more straightforward, it is not clear that it would offer a more secure setup.</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase managed "roles" as collections of permissions: We will not model "roles" internally in HBase to begin with. We instead allow group names to be granted permissions, which allows external modeling of roles via group membership. Groups are created and manipulated
 externally to HBase, via the Hadoop group mapping service.</p>
</li></ol>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Access control mechanisms are mature and fairly standardized in the relational database world. The HBase implementation approximates current convention, but HBase has a simpler feature set than relational databases, especially in terms of client operations.
 We don't distinguish between an insert (new record) and update (of existing record), for example, as both collapse down into a Put. Accordingly, the important operations condense to four permissions: READ, WRITE, CREATE, and ADMIN.</p>
Operation To Permission MappingPermissionOperationReadGetExistsScanWritePutDeleteLock/UnlockRowIncrementColumnValueCheckAndDelete/PutFlushCompactCreateCreateAlterDropAdminEnable/DisableSplitMajor CompactGrantRevokeShutdown
<table id="d1934e4513">
<thead>
</thead>
<tbody>
</tbody>
</table>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Permissions can be granted in any of the following scopes, though CREATE and ADMIN permissions are effective only at table scope.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Table</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="circle" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 72.109375px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Read: User can read from any column family in table</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Write: User can write to any column family in table</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Create: User can alter table attributes; add, alter, or drop column families; and drop the table.</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Admin: User can alter table attributes; add, alter, or drop column families; and enable, disable, or drop the table. User can also trigger region (re)assignments or relocation.</p>
</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Column Family</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="circle" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 72.109375px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Read: User can read from the column family</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Write: User can write to the column family</p>
</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
There is also an implicit global scope for the superuser.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The superuser is a principal, specified in the HBase site configuration file, that has equivalent access to HBase as the 'root' user would on a UNIX derived system. Normally this is the principal that the HBase processes themselves authenticate as. Although
 future versions of HBase Access Control may support multiple superusers, the superuser privilege will always include the principal used to run the HMaster process. Only the superuser is allowed to create tables, switch the balancer on or off, or take other
 actions with global consequence. Furthermore, the superuser has an implicit grant of all permissions to all resources.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Tables have a new metadata attribute: OWNER, the user principal who owns the table. By default this will be set to the user principal who creates the table, though it may be changed at table creation time or during an alter operation by setting or changing
 the OWNER table attribute. Only a single user principal can own a table at a given time. A table owner will have all permissions over a given table.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="8.2.3. Server-side Configuration for Access Control" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t202" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e4651" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>8.2.3. Server-side Configuration for Access Control</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Enable the AccessController coprocessor in the cluster configuration and restart HBase. The restart can be a rolling one. Complete the restart of all Master and RegionServer processes before setting up ACLs.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
To enable the AccessController, modify the <code class="code">hbase-site.xml</code> file on every server machine in the cluster to look like:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_58_6916318" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">      &lt;property&gt;
        &lt;name&gt;hbase.coprocessor.master.classes&lt;/name&gt;
        &lt;value&gt;org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.access.AccessController&lt;/value&gt;
      &lt;/property&gt;
      &lt;property&gt;
      &lt;name&gt;hbase.coprocessor.region.classes&lt;/name&gt;
        &lt;value&gt;org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.token.TokenProvider,
        org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.access.AccessController&lt;/value&gt;
      &lt;/property&gt;
    </pre></div>
<div class="section" title="8.2.4. Shell Enhancements for Access Control" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t203" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e4663" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>8.2.4. Shell Enhancements for Access Control</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The HBase shell has been extended to provide simple commands for editing and updating user permissions. The following commands have been added for access control list management:</p>
Grant
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_59_5294668" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">    grant &lt;user&gt; &lt;permissions&gt; &lt;table&gt; [ &lt;column family&gt; [ &lt;column qualifier&gt; ] ]
    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">&lt;permissions&gt;</code> is zero or more letters from the set "RWCA": READ('R'), WRITE('W'), CREATE('C'), ADMIN('A').</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Note: Grants and revocations of individual permissions on a resource are both accomplished using the <code class="code">grant</code> command. A separate <code class="code">revoke</code> command is also provided by the shell, but this is for fast revocation
 of all of a user's access rights to a given resource only.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Revoke</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_60_3639999" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">    revoke &lt;user&gt; &lt;table&gt; [ &lt;column family&gt; [ &lt;column qualifier&gt; ] ]
    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Alter</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The <code class="code">alter</code> command has been extended to allow ownership assignment:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_61_7873890" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">      alter 'tablename', {OWNER =&gt; 'username'}
    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
User Permission</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The <code class="code">user_permission</code> command shows all access permissions for the current user for a given table:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_62_1235731" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">      user_permission &lt;table&gt;
    </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<div title="8.3. Secure Bulk Load" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t204" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>8.3. Secure Bulk Load</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Bulk loading in secure mode is a bit more involved than normal setup, since the client has to transfer the ownership of the files generated from the mapreduce job to HBase. Secure bulk loading is implemented by a coprocessor, named <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/security/access/SecureBulkLoadEndpoint.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">SecureBulkLoadEndpoint</a>.
 SecureBulkLoadEndpoint uses a staging directory "hbase.bulkload.staging.dir", which defaults to /tmp/hbase-staging/. The algorithm is as follows.</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ul type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>Create an hbase owned staging directory which is world traversable (-rwx--x--x, 711) /tmp/hbase-staging.</li><li>A user writes out data to his secure output directory: /user/foo/data</li><li>A call is made to hbase to create a secret staging directory which is globally readable/writable (-rwxrwxrwx, 777): /tmp/hbase-staging/averylongandrandomdirectoryname</li><li>The user makes the data world readable and writable, then moves it into the random staging directory, then calls bulkLoadHFiles()</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Like delegation tokens the strength of the security lies in the length and randomness of the secret directory.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
You have to enable the secure bulk load to work properly. You can modify the hbase-site.xml file on every server machine in the cluster and add the SecureBulkLoadEndpoint class to the list of regionserver coprocessors:</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">      &lt;property&gt;          &lt;name&gt;hbase.bulkload.staging.dir&lt;/name&gt;          &lt;value&gt;/tmp/hbase-staging&lt;/value&gt;        &lt;/property&gt;        &lt;property&gt;          &lt;name&gt;hbase.coprocessor.region.classes&lt;/name&gt;          &lt;value&gt;org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.token.TokenProvider,          org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.access.AccessController,org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.access.SecureBulkLoadEndpoint&lt;/value&gt;        &lt;/property&gt;      </pre>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px"><br>
</div>
<br>
</div>
</div>

<strong>Table of Contents</strong></p>

Client</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#client.filter" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">9.4. 客户端请求过滤器</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#master" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">9.5. <div class="section" title="9.1. Overview" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t206" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.overview" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.1. 概述</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.1.1. NoSQL?" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t207" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.overview.nosql" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.1.1. NoSQL?</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase是一种 "NoSQL" 数据库. "NoSQL"是一个通用词表示数据库不是RDBMS ，后者支持 SQL 作为主要访问手段。有许多种 NoSQL 数据库: BerkeleyDB 是本地 NoSQL 数据库例子, 而 HBase 是大型分布式数据库。 技术上来说, HBase 更像是"数据存储(Data Store)" 多于 "数据库(Data Base)"。因为缺少很多RDBMS特性, 如列类型，第二索引，触发器，高级查询语言等.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
然而, HBase 有许多特征同时支持线性化和模块化扩充。 HBase 集群通过增加RegionServers进行扩充。 它可以放在普通的服务器中。例如，如果集群从10个扩充到20个RegionServer，存储空间和处理容量都同时翻倍。 RDBMS 也能很好扩充， 但仅对一个点 - 特别是对一个单独数据库服务器的大小 - 同时，为了更好的性能，需要特殊的硬件和存储设备。 HBase 特性：</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">强一致性读写: HBase 不是 "最终一致性(eventually consistent)" 数据存储. 这让它很适合高速计数聚合类任务。</li><li class="listitem">自动分片(Automatic sharding): HBase 表通过region分布在集群中。数据增长时，region会自动分割并重新分布。</li><li class="listitem">RegionServer 自动故障转移</li><li class="listitem">Hadoop/HDFS 集成: HBase 支持本机外HDFS 作为它的分布式文件系统。</li><li class="listitem">MapReduce: HBase 通过MapReduce支持大并发处理， HBase 可以同时做源和目标.</li><li class="listitem">Java 客户端 API: HBase 支持易于使用的 Java API 进行编程访问.</li><li class="listitem">Thrift/REST API: HBase 也支持Thrift 和 REST 作为非Java 前端.</li><li class="listitem">Block Cache 和 Bloom Filters: 对于大容量查询优化， HBase支持 Block Cache 和 Bloom Filters。</li><li class="listitem">运维管理: HBase提供内置网页用于运维视角和JMX 度量.</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.1.2. When Should I Use HBase?" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t208" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.overview.when" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.1.2. 什么时候用 HBase?</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase不适合所有问题.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
首先，确信有足够多数据，如果有上亿或上千亿行数据，HBase是很好的备选。 如果只有上千或上百万行，则用传统的RDBMS可能是更好的选择。因为所有数据可以在一两个节点保存，集群其他节点可能闲置。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
其次，确信可以不依赖所有RDBMS的额外特性 (e.g., 列数据类型, 第二索引, 事物,高级查询语言等.) 一个建立在RDBMS上应用，如不能仅通过改变一个JDBC驱动移植到HBase。相对于移植， 需考虑从RDBMS 到 HBase是一次完全的重新设计。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
第三， 确信你有足够硬件。甚至 HDFS 在小于5个数据节点时，干不好什么事情 (根据如 HDFS 块复制具有缺省值 3), 还要加上一个 NameNode.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase 能在单独的笔记本上运行良好。但这应仅当成开发配置。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.1.3. What Is The Difference Between HBase and Hadoop/HDFS?" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t209" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.overview.hbasehdfs" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.1.3.  HBase 和 Hadoop/HDFS 的区别?</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hadoop.apache.org/hdfs/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HDFS</a> 是分布式文件系统，适合保存大文件。官方宣称它并非普通用途文件系统，不提供文件的个别记录的快速查询。 另一方面，HBase基于HDFS且提供大表的记录快速查找(和更新)。这有时可能引起概念混乱。 HBase 内部将数据放到索引好的
 "存储文件(StoreFiles)" ，以便高速查询。存储文件位于 HDFS中。参考<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#datamodel" rel="nofollow" title="Chapter 5. Data Model" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Chapter 5, <em>数据模型</em></a> 和该章其他内容获取更多HBase如何归档的信息。</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.2. Catalog Tables" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t210" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.catalog" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.2. 目录表(Catalog Tables)</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
目录表 -ROOT- 和 .META. 作为 HBase 表存在。他们被HBase shell的 <code class="code">list 命令过滤掉了，</code> 但他们和其他表一样存在。</p>
<div class="section" title="9.2.1. ROOT" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t211" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.catalog.root" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.2.1. ROOT</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
-ROOT- 保存 .META. 表存在哪里的踪迹. -ROOT- 表结构如下:</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Key:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">.META. region key (<code class="code">.META.,,1</code>)</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Values:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem"><code class="code">info:regioninfo</code> (序列化.META.的 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HRegionInfo.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HRegionInfo</a> 实例
 )</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">info:server</code> ( 保存 .META.的RegionServer的server:port)</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">info:serverstartcode</code> ( 保存 .META.的RegionServer进程的启动时间)</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.2.2. META" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t212" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.catalog.meta" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.2.2. META</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
.META. 保存系统中所有region列表。 .META.表结构如下:</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Key:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">Region key 格式 (<code class="code">[table],[region start key],[region id]</code>)</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Values:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem"><code class="code">info:regioninfo</code> (序列化.META.的 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HRegionInfo.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HRegionInfo</a> 实例
 )</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">info:server</code> ( 保存 .META.的RegionServer的server:port)</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">info:serverstartcode</code> ( 保存 .META.的RegionServer进程的启动时间)</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当表在分割过程中，会创建额外的两列, <code class="code">info:splitA</code> 和 <code class="code">info:splitB</code> 代表两个女儿 region. 这两列的值同样是序列化HRegionInfo 实例. region最终分割完毕后，这行会删除。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HRegionInfo的备注: 空 key 用于指示表的开始和结束。具有空开始键值的region是表内的首region。 如果 region 同时有空起始和结束key，说明它是表内的唯一region。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
在需要编程访问(希望不要)目录元数据时，参考 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/util/Writables.html#getHRegionInfo%28byte%5B%5D%29" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Writables</a> 工具.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.2.3. Startup Sequencing" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t213" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.catalog.startup" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.2.3. 启动时序</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
META 地址首先在ROOT 中设置。META 会更新 server 和 startcode 的值.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
需要 region-RegionServer 分配信息, 参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#regions.arch.assignment" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.2. Region-RegionServer Assignment" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.2, “Region-RegionServer
 分配”</a>.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.1. 客户端" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t214" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.3. 客户端</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase客户端的 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HTable</a>类负责寻找相应的RegionServers来处理行。他是先查询 <code class="code">.META.</code> 和 <code class="code">-ROOT</code> 目录表。然后再确定region的位置。定位到所需要的区域后，客户端会<span class="emphasis"><em>直接</em></span> 去访问相应的region(不经过master)，发起读写请求。这些信息会缓存在客户端，这样就不用每发起一个请求就去查一下。如果一个region已经废弃(原因可能是master
 load balance或者RegionServer死了)，客户端就会重新进行这个步骤，决定要去访问的新的地址。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#master.runtime" rel="nofollow" title="9.5.2. Runtime Impact" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.5.2, “Runtime Impact”</a> for more information about the impact of the Master
 on HBase Client communication.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
管理集群操作是经由<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HBaseAdmin.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBaseAdmin</a>发起的</p>
<div class="section" title="12.1.1. 连接" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t215" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.connections" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.3.1. 连接</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
关于连接的配置信息，参见<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#client_dependencies" rel="nofollow" title="3.7. 连接HBase集群的客户端配置和依赖" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 3.7, “连接HBase集群的客户端配置和依赖”</a>.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HTable</a>不是线程安全的。建议使用同一个<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HBaseConfiguration" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBaseConfiguration</a>实例来创建HTable实例。这样可以共享ZooKeeper和socket实例。例如，最好这样做：</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_63_4630591" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">HBaseConfiguration conf = HBaseConfiguration.create();
HTable table1 = new HTable(conf, "myTable");
HTable table2 = new HTable(conf, "myTable");</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
而不是这样：</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_64_5276432" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">HBaseConfiguration conf1 = HBaseConfiguration.create();
HTable table1 = new HTable(conf1, "myTable");
HBaseConfiguration conf2 = HBaseConfiguration.create();
HTable table2 = new HTable(conf2, "myTable");</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果你想知道的更多的关于HBase客户端connection的知识，可以参照： <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HConnectionManager.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HConnectionManager</a>.</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t216" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.3.1.1. 连接池</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
对需要高端多线程访问的应用 (如网页服务器或应用服务器需要在一个JVM服务很多应用线程)，参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTablePool.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HTablePool</a>.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.1.2. 写缓冲和批量操作" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t217" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.writebuffer" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.3.2. 写缓冲和批量操作</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
若关闭了<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HTable</a>中的 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#perf.hbase.client.autoflush" rel="nofollow" title="13.6.1. AutoFlush" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 11.10.4,
 “AutoFlush”</a>，<code class="classname">Put</code>操作会在写缓冲填满的时候向RegionServer发起请求。默认情况下，写缓冲是2MB.在Htable被废弃之前，要调用<code class="methodname">close()</code>, <code class="methodname">flushCommits()</code>操作，这样写缓冲就不会丢失。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
要想更好的细粒度控制 <code class="classname">Put</code>或<code class="classname">Delete</code>的批量操作，可以参考Htable中的<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html#batch%28java.util.List%29" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">batch</a> 方法.</p>
<div title="9.3.3. External Clients" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t218" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.3.3. 外部客户端</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
关于非Java客户端和定制协议信息，在 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#external_apis" rel="nofollow" title="Chapter 10. External APIs" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Chapter 10, <em>外部 API</em></a></p>
</div>
<div title="9.3.4. RowLocks" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t219" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.rowlocks" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.3.4. 行锁</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html#lockRow%28byte%5B%5D%29" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">行锁</a> 在客户端 API中仍然存在， <em>但是</em> 不鼓励使用，因为管理不好，会锁定整个RegionServer.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这里是优秀ticket <a target="_blank" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-2332" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBASE-2332</a> 从终端移除该特性。</p>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.4. Client Request Filters" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t220" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4. 客户端请求过滤器</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/Get.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Get</a> 和 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/Scan.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Scan</a> 实例可以用 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/Filter.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">filters</a> 配置，以应用于
 RegionServer.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
过滤器可能会搞混，因为有很多类型的过滤器， 最好通过理解过滤器功能组来了解他们。</p>
<div class="section" title="9.4.1. Structural" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t221" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.structural" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.1. 结构(Structural)过滤器</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
结构过滤器包含其他过滤器</p>
<div class="section" title="9.4.1.1. FilterList" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
