<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t222" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.structural.fl" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.1.1. FilterList</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/FilterList.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">FilterList</a> 代表一个过滤器列表，过滤器间具有 <code class="code">FilterList.Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL</code> 或 <code class="code">FilterList.Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE</code> 关系。下面示例展示两个过滤器的'或'关系(检查同一属性的'my
 value' 或'my other value' ).</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_65_5606630" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">FilterList list = new FilterList(FilterList.Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE);
SingleColumnValueFilter filter1 = new SingleColumnValueFilter(
	cf,
	column,
	CompareOp.EQUAL,
	Bytes.toBytes("my value")
	);
list.add(filter1);
SingleColumnValueFilter filter2 = new SingleColumnValueFilter(
	cf,
	column,
	CompareOp.EQUAL,
	Bytes.toBytes("my other value")
	);
list.add(filter2);
scan.setFilter(list);
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.4.2. Column Value" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t223" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.cv" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.2. 列值</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.4.2.1. SingleColumnValueFilter" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t224" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.cv.scvf" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.2.1. SingleColumnValueFilter</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/SingleColumnValueFilter.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">SingleColumnValueFilter</a> 用于测试列值相等 (<code class="code"><a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/CompareFilter.CompareOp.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">CompareOp.EQUAL</a> </code>),
 不等 (<code class="code">CompareOp.NOT_EQUAL</code>),或范围 (e.g., <code class="code">CompareOp.GREATER</code>). 下面示例检查列值和字符串'my value' 相等...</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_66_8412062" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">SingleColumnValueFilter filter = new SingleColumnValueFilter(
	cf,
	column,
	CompareOp.EQUAL,
	Bytes.toBytes("my value")
	);
scan.setFilter(filter);
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.4.3. Column Value Comparators" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t225" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.cvp" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.3. 列值比较器</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
过滤器包内有好几种比较器类需要特别提及。这些比较器和其他过滤器一起使用, 如 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#client.filter.cv.scvf" rel="nofollow" title="9.4.2.1. SingleColumnValueFilter" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.4.2.1,
 “SingleColumnValueFilter”</a>.</p>
<div class="section" title="9.4.3.1. RegexStringComparator" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t226" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.cvp.rcs" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.3.1. RegexStringComparator</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/RegexStringComparator.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">RegexStringComparator</a> 支持值比较的正则表达式 。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_67_345443" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">RegexStringComparator comp = new RegexStringComparator("my.");   // any value that starts with 'my'
SingleColumnValueFilter filter = new SingleColumnValueFilter(
	cf,
	column,
	CompareOp.EQUAL,
	comp
	);
scan.setFilter(filter);
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 Oracle JavaDoc 了解 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://download.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/util/regex/Pattern.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">supported RegEx patterns in Java</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.4.3.2. SubstringComparator" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t227" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.cvp.rcs" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.3.2. SubstringComparator</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/SubstringComparator.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">SubstringComparator</a> 用于检测一个子串是否存在于值中。大小写不敏感。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_68_8134365" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">SubstringComparator comp = new SubstringComparator("y val");   // looking for 'my value'
SingleColumnValueFilter filter = new SingleColumnValueFilter(
	cf,
	column,
	CompareOp.EQUAL,
	comp
	);
scan.setFilter(filter);
</pre></div>
<div class="section" title="9.4.3.3. BinaryPrefixComparator" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t228" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.cvp.bfp" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.3.3. BinaryPrefixComparator</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/BinaryPrefixComparator.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">BinaryPrefixComparator</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.4.3.4. BinaryComparator" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t229" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.cvp.bc" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.3.4. BinaryComparator</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/BinaryComparator.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">BinaryComparator</a>.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.4.4. KeyValue Metadata" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t230" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.kvm" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.4. 键值元数据</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
由于HBase 采用键值对保存内部数据，键值元数据过滤器评估一行的键是否存在(如 ColumnFamily:Column qualifiers) , 对应前节所述值的情况。</p>
<div class="section" title="9.4.4.1. FamilyFilter" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t231" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.kvm.ff" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.4.1. FamilyFilter</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/FamilyFilter.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">FamilyFilter</a> 用于过滤列族。 通常，在Scan中选择ColumnFamilie优于在过滤器中做。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.4.4.2. QualifierFilter" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t232" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.kvm.qf" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.4.2. QualifierFilter</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/QualifierFilter.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">QualifierFilter</a> 用于基于列名(即 Qualifier)过滤.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.4.4.3. ColumnPrefixFilter" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t233" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.kvm.cpf" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.4.3. ColumnPrefixFilter</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/ColumnPrefixFilter.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">ColumnPrefixFilter</a> 可基于列名(即Qualifier)前缀过滤。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A ColumnPrefixFilter seeks ahead to the first column matching the prefix in each row and for each involved column family. It can be used to efficiently get a subset of the columns in very wide rows.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Note: The same column qualifier can be used in different column families. This filter returns all matching columns.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Example: Find all columns in a row and family that start with "abc"</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_69_2924665" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">HTableInterface t = ...;
byte[] row = ...;
byte[] family = ...;
byte[] prefix = Bytes.toBytes("abc");
Scan scan = new Scan(row, row); // (optional) limit to one row
scan.addFamily(family); // (optional) limit to one family
Filter f = new ColumnPrefixFilter(prefix);
scan.setFilter(f);
scan.setBatch(10); // set this if there could be many columns returned
ResultScanner rs = t.getScanner(scan);
for (Result r = rs.next(); r != null; r = rs.next()) {
  for (KeyValue kv : r.raw()) {
    // each kv represents a column
  }
}
rs.close();
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.4.4.4. MultipleColumnPrefixFilter" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t234" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.kvm.mcpf" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.4.4. MultipleColumnPrefixFilter</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/MultipleColumnPrefixFilter.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">MultipleColumnPrefixFilter</a> 和 ColumnPrefixFilter 行为差不多，但可以指定多个前缀。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Like ColumnPrefixFilter, MultipleColumnPrefixFilter efficiently seeks ahead to the first column matching the lowest prefix and also seeks past ranges of columns between prefixes. It can be used to efficiently get discontinuous sets of columns from very wide
 rows.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Example: Find all columns in a row and family that start with "abc" or "xyz"</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_70_8761740" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">HTableInterface t = ...;
byte[] row = ...;
byte[] family = ...;
byte[][] prefixes = new byte[][] {Bytes.toBytes("abc"), Bytes.toBytes("xyz")};
Scan scan = new Scan(row, row); // (optional) limit to one row
scan.addFamily(family); // (optional) limit to one family
Filter f = new MultipleColumnPrefixFilter(prefixes);
scan.setFilter(f);
scan.setBatch(10); // set this if there could be many columns returned
ResultScanner rs = t.getScanner(scan);
for (Result r = rs.next(); r != null; r = rs.next()) {
  for (KeyValue kv : r.raw()) {
    // each kv represents a column
  }
}
rs.close();
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.4.4.5. ColumnRangeFilter" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t235" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.kvm.crf%20" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.4.5. ColumnRangeFilter</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/ColumnRangeFilter.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">ColumnRangeFilter</a> 可以进行高效内部扫描。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A ColumnRangeFilter can seek ahead to the first matching column for each involved column family. It can be used to efficiently get a 'slice' of the columns of a very wide row. i.e. you have a million columns in a row but you only want to look at columns bbbb-bbdd.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Note: The same column qualifier can be used in different column families. This filter returns all matching columns.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Example: Find all columns in a row and family between "bbbb" (inclusive) and "bbdd" (inclusive)</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_71_6550663" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">HTableInterface t = ...;
byte[] row = ...;
byte[] family = ...;
byte[] startColumn = Bytes.toBytes("bbbb");
byte[] endColumn = Bytes.toBytes("bbdd");
Scan scan = new Scan(row, row); // (optional) limit to one row
scan.addFamily(family); // (optional) limit to one family
Filter f = new ColumnRangeFilter(startColumn, true, endColumn, true);
scan.setFilter(f);
scan.setBatch(10); // set this if there could be many columns returned
ResultScanner rs = t.getScanner(scan);
for (Result r = rs.next(); r != null; r = rs.next()) {
  for (KeyValue kv : r.raw()) {
    // each kv represents a column
  }
}
rs.close();
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Note: HBase 0.92 引入</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.4.5. RowKey" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t236" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.row" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.5. RowKey</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.4.5.1. RowFilter" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t237" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.row.rf" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.5.1. RowFilter</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
通常认为行选择时Scan采用 startRow/stopRow 方法比较好。然而 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/RowFilter.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">RowFilter</a> 也可以用。</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.4.6. Utility" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t238" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.utility" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.6. Utility</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.4.6.1. FirstKeyOnlyFilter" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t239" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="client.filter.utility.fkof" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.4.6.1. FirstKeyOnlyFilter</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
This is primarily used for rowcount jobs. 参考 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/FirstKeyOnlyFilter.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">FirstKeyOnlyFilter</a>.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.5. Master" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t240" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="master" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.5. 主服务器</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">HMaster</code> is the implementation of the Master Server. The Master server is responsible for monitoring all RegionServer instances in the cluster, and is the interface for all metadata changes. In a distributed cluster, the Master typically
 runs on the <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#arch.hdfs.nn" rel="nofollow" title="9.9.1. NameNode" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.9.1, “NameNode”</a>.</p>
<div class="section" title="9.5.1. Startup Behavior" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t241" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="master.startup" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.5.1. Startup Behavior</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If run in a multi-Master environment, all Masters compete to run the cluster. If the active Master loses it's lease in ZooKeeper (or the Master shuts down), then then the remaining Masters jostle to take over the Master role.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.5.2. Runtime Impact" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t242" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="master.runtime" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.5.2. Runtime Impact</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A common dist-list question is what happens to an HBase cluster when the Master goes down. Because the HBase client talks directly to the RegionServers, the cluster can still function in a "steady state." Additionally, per <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#arch.catalog" rel="nofollow" title="9.2. Catalog Tables" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.2,
 “Catalog Tables”</a> ROOT and META exist as HBase tables (i.e., are not resident in the Master). However, the Master controls critical functions such as RegionServer failover and completing region splits. So while the cluster can still run <span class="emphasis"><em>for
 a time</em></span> without the Master, the Master should be restarted as soon as possible.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.5.3. Interface" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t243" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="master.api" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.5.3. Interface</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The methods exposed by <code class="code">HMasterInterface</code> are primarily metadata-oriented methods:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">Table (createTable, modifyTable, removeTable, enable, disable)</li><li class="listitem">ColumnFamily (addColumn, modifyColumn, removeColumn)</li><li class="listitem">Region (move, assign, unassign)</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For example, when the <code class="code">HBaseAdmin</code> method <code class="code">disableTable</code> is invoked, it is serviced by the Master server.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.5.4. Processes" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t244" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="master.processes" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.5.4. 进程</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Master 后台运行几种线程:</p>
<div class="section" title="9.5.4.1. LoadBalancer" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t245" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="master.processes.loadbalancer" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.5.4.1. LoadBalancer</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Periodically, and when there are not any regions in transition, a load balancer will run and move regions around to balance cluster load. 参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#balancer_config" rel="nofollow" title="2.8.3.1. Balancer" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 2.8.3.1,
 “Balancer”</a> for configuring this property.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#regions.arch.assignment" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.2. Region-RegionServer Assignment" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.2, “Region-RegionServer Assignment”</a> for
 more information on region assignment.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.5.4.2. CatalogJanitor" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t246" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="master.processes.catalog" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.5.4.2. CatalogJanitor</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Periodically checks and cleans up the .META. table. 参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#arch.catalog.meta" rel="nofollow" title="9.2.2. META" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.2.2, “META”</a> for
 more information on META.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.6. RegionServer" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t247" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="regionserver.arch" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6. RegionServer</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">HRegionServer</code> is the RegionServer implementation. It is responsible for serving and managing regions. In a distributed cluster, a RegionServer runs on a <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#arch.hdfs.dn" rel="nofollow" title="9.9.2. DataNode" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.9.2,
 “DataNode”</a>.</p>
<div class="section" title="9.6.1. Interface" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t248" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="regionserver.arch.api" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6.1. 接口</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The methods exposed by <code class="code">HRegionRegionInterface</code> contain both data-oriented and region-maintenance methods:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">Data (get, put, delete, next, etc.)</li><li class="listitem">Region (splitRegion, compactRegion, etc.)</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For example, when the <code class="code">HBaseAdmin</code> method <code class="code">majorCompact</code> is invoked on a table, the client is actually iterating through all regions for the specified table and requesting a major compaction directly to each region.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.6.2. Processes" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t249" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="regionserver.arch.processes" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6.2. 进程</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
RegionServer 后台运行几种线程:</p>
<div class="section" title="9.6.2.1. CompactSplitThread" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t250" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="regionserver.arch.processes.compactsplit" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6.2.1. CompactSplitThread</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
检查分割并处理最小紧缩。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.6.2.2. MajorCompactionChecker" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t251" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="regionserver.arch.processes.majorcompact" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6.2.2. MajorCompactionChecker</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
检查主紧缩。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.6.2.3. MemStoreFlusher" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t252" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="regionserver.arch.processes.memstore" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6.2.3. MemStoreFlusher</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
周期将写到内存存储的内容刷到文件存储。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.6.2.4. LogRoller" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t253" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="regionserver.arch.processes.log" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6.2.4. LogRoller</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
周期检查RegionServer 的 HLog.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.6.3. Coprocessors" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t254" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="coprocessors" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6.3. 协处理器</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
协处理器在0.92版添加。 有一个详细帖子 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="https://blogs.apache.org/hbase/entry/coprocessor_introduction" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Blog Overview of CoProcessors</a> 供参考。文档最终会放到本参考手册，但该blog是当前能获取的大部分信息。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.6.4. Block Cache" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t255" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="block.cache" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6.4. 块缓存</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.6.4.1. Design" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t256" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="block.cache.design" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6.4.1. 设计</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The Block Cache is an LRU cache that contains three levels of block priority to allow for scan-resistance and in-memory ColumnFamilies:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">Single access priority: The first time a block is loaded from HDFS it normally has this priority and it will be part of the first group to be considered during evictions. The advantage is that scanned blocks are more likely to get evicted
 than blocks that are getting more usage.</li><li class="listitem">Mutli access priority: If a block in the previous priority group is accessed again, it upgrades to this priority. It is thus part of the second group considered during evictions.</li><li class="listitem">In-memory access priority: If the block's family was configured to be "in-memory", it will be part of this priority disregarding the number of times it was accessed. Catalog tables are configured like this. This group is the last one considered
 during evictions.</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For more information, see the <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/xref/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/io/hfile/LruBlockCache.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">LruBlockCache source</a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.6.4.2. Usage" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t257" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="block.cache.usage" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6.4.2. 使用</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Block caching is enabled by default for all the user tables which means that any read operation will load the LRU cache. This might be good for a large number of use cases, but further tunings are usually required in order to achieve better performance. An
 important concept is the <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Working_set_size" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">working set size</a>, or WSS, which is: "the amount of memory needed to compute
 the answer to a problem". For a website, this would be the data that's needed to answer the queries over a short amount of time.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The way to calculate how much memory is available in HBase for caching is:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_72_5244657" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">            number of region servers * heap size * hfile.block.cache.size * 0.85
        </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The default value for the block cache is 0.25 which represents 25% of the available heap. The last value (85%) is the default acceptable loading factor in the LRU cache after which eviction is started. The reason it is included in this equation is that it would
 be unrealistic to say that it is possible to use 100% of the available memory since this would make the process blocking from the point where it loads new blocks. Here are some examples:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">One region server with the default heap size (1GB) and the default block cache size will have 217MB of block cache available.</li><li class="listitem">20 region servers with the heap size set to 8GB and a default block cache size will have 34GB of block cache.</li><li class="listitem">100 region servers with the heap size set to 24GB and a block cache size of 0.5 will have about 1TB of block cache.</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Your data isn't the only resident of the block cache, here are others that you may have to take into account:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">Catalog tables: The -ROOT- and .META. tables are forced into the block cache and have the in-memory priority which means that they are harder to evict. The former never uses more than a few hundreds of bytes while the latter can occupy
 a few MBs (depending on the number of regions).</li><li class="listitem">HFiles indexes: HFile is the file format that HBase uses to store data in HDFS and it contains a multi-layered index in order seek to the data without having to read the whole file. The size of those indexes is a factor of the block size
 (64KB by default), the size of your keys and the amount of data you are storing. For big data sets it's not unusual to see numbers around 1GB per region server, although not all of it will be in cache because the LRU will evict indexes that aren't used.</li><li class="listitem">Keys: Taking into account only the values that are being stored is missing half the picture since every value is stored along with its keys (row key, family, qualifier, and timestamp). 参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#keysize" rel="nofollow" title="6.3.2. Try to minimize row and column sizes" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 6.3.2,
 “Try to minimize row and column sizes”</a>.</li><li class="listitem">Bloom filters: Just like the HFile indexes, those data structures (when enabled) are stored in the LRU.</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Currently the recommended way to measure HFile indexes and bloom filters sizes is to look at the region server web UI and checkout the relevant metrics. For keys, sampling can be done by using the HFile command line tool and look for the average key size metric.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
It's generally bad to use block caching when the WSS doesn't fit in memory. This is the case when you have for example 40GB available across all your region servers' block caches but you need to process 1TB of data. One of the reasons is that the churn generated
 by the evictions will trigger more garbage collections unnecessarily. Here are two use cases:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">Fully random reading pattern: This is a case where you almost never access the same row twice within a short amount of time such that the chance of hitting a cached block is close to 0. Setting block caching on such a table is a waste of
 memory and CPU cycles, more so that it will generate more garbage to pick up by the JVM. For more information on monitoring GC, see <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#trouble.log.gc" rel="nofollow" title="12.2.3. JVM Garbage Collection Logs" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 12.2.3,
 “JVM Garbage Collection Logs”</a>.</li><li class="listitem">Mapping a table: In a typical MapReduce job that takes a table in input, every row will be read only once so there's no need to put them into the block cache. The Scan object has the option of turning this off via the setCaching method
 (set it to false). You can still keep block caching turned on on this table if you need fast random read access. An example would be counting the number of rows in a table that serves live traffic, caching every block of that table would create massive churn
 and would surely evict data that's currently in use.</li></ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.6.5. Write Ahead Log (WAL)" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t258" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="wal" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6.5. 预写日志 (WAL)</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.6.5.1. Purpose" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t259" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="purpose.wal" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6.5.1. Purpose</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
每个RegionServer会将更新(Puts, Deletes) 先记录到预写日志中(WAL)，然后将其更新在<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#store" rel="nofollow" title="12.3.4. Store" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5, “Store”</a>的<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#store.memstore" rel="nofollow" title="12.3.4.1. MemStore" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5.1,
 “MemStore”</a>里面。这样就保证了HBase的写的可靠性。如果没有WAL,当RegionServer宕掉的时候，MemStore还没有flush，StoreFile还没有保存，数据就会丢失。<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/regionserver/wal/HLog.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HLog</a> 是HBase的一个WAL实现，一个RegionServer有一个HLog实例。</p>
WAL 保存在HDFS 的 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">/hbase/.logs/</code> 里面，每个region一个文件。
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
要想知道更多的信息，可以访问维基百科 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Write-ahead_logging" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Write-Ahead Log</a> 的文章.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.6.5.2. WAL Flushing" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t260" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="wal_flush" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6.5.2. WAL Flushing</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
TODO (describe).</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.6.5.3. WAL Splitting" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t261" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="wal_splitting" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6.5.3. WAL Splitting</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.6.5.3.1. How edits are recovered from a crashed RegionServer" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 class="title" style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t262" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e5412" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6.5.3.1. 当RegionServer宕掉的时候，如何恢复</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
When a RegionServer crashes, it will lose its ephemeral lease in ZooKeeper...TODO</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.6.5.3.2. hbase.hlog.split.skip.errors" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 class="title" style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t263" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e5417" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6.5.3.2. <code class="varname">hbase.hlog.split.skip.errors</code></h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认设置为 <code class="constant">true</code>,在split执行中发生的任何错误会被记录，有问题的WAL会被移动到HBase <code class="varname">rootdir</code>目录下的<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">.corrupt</code>目录，接着进行处理。如果设置为 <code class="constant">false</code>，异常会被抛出，split会记录错误。<sup>[<a target="_blank" name="d613e3262" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d1934e5435" rel="nofollow" class="footnote" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">23</a>]</sup></p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.6.5.3.3. How EOFExceptions are treated when splitting a crashed RegionServers' WALs" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 class="title" style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t264" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e5441" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.6.5.3.3. 如何处理一个发生在当RegionServers' WALs 分割时候的EOFExceptions异常</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果我们在分割日志的时候发生EOF,就是<code class="varname">hbase.hlog.split.skip.errors</code>设置为 <code class="constant">false</code>，我们也会进行处理。一个EOF会发生在一行一行读取Log，但是Log中最后一行似乎只写了一半就停止了。如果在处理过程中发生了EOF，我们还会继续处理，除非这个文件是要处理的最后一个文件。<sup>[<a target="_blank" name="d1934e5452" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d1934e5452" rel="nofollow" class="footnote" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">24</a>]</sup></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="footnotes" style="margin:0px"><br>
<hr width="100" align="left" style="margin:0.6em; border-top-width:0px; border-right-width:0px; border-left-width:0px; border-style:solid; border-color:rgb(206,206,206)">
<div class="footnote" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<sup>[<a target="_blank" id="ftn.d1934e5435" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d1934e5435" rel="nofollow" class="para" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">23</a>] </sup>参考 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-2958" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBASE-2958
 When hbase.hlog.split.skip.errors is set to false, we fail the split but thats it</a>. We need to do more than just fail split if this flag is set.</p>
</div>
<div class="footnote" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<sup>[<a target="_blank" id="ftn.d1934e5452" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d1934e5452" rel="nofollow" class="para" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">24</a>] </sup>要想知道背景知识, 参见<a target="_blank" class="link" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-2643" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBASE-2643
 Figure how to deal with eof splitting logs</a></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7. Regions" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t265" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="regions.arch" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7. 区域</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
区域是表获取和分布的基本元素，由每个列族的一个库(Store)组成。对象层级图如下：</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_73_9129885" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">&lt;code class="filename" style="color: rgb(0, 122, 0);"&gt;Table&lt;/code&gt;       (HBase table)      
    &lt;code class="filename" style="color: rgb(0, 122, 0);"&gt;Region&lt;/code&gt;       (Regions for the table)
         &lt;code class="filename" style="color: rgb(0, 122, 0);"&gt;Store&lt;/code&gt;          (Store per ColumnFamily for each Region for the table)
              &lt;code class="filename" style="color: rgb(0, 122, 0);"&gt;MemStore&lt;/code&gt;           (MemStore for each Store for each Region for the table)
              &lt;code class="filename" style="color: rgb(0, 122, 0);"&gt;StoreFile&lt;/code&gt;          (StoreFiles for each Store for each Region for the table)
                    &lt;code class="filename" style="color: rgb(0, 122, 0);"&gt;Block&lt;/code&gt;             (Blocks within a StoreFile within a Store for each Region for the table)
 </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
关于HBase文件写到HDFS的描述，参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#trouble.namenode.hbase.objects" rel="nofollow" title="12.7.2. Browsing HDFS for HBase Objects" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 12.7.2, “浏览
 HDFS的 HBase 对象”</a>.</p>
<div class="section" title="9.7.1. Region Size" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t266" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.regions.size" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.1. Region 大小</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Region的大小是一个棘手的问题，需要考量如下几个因素。</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Regions是可用性和分布式的最基本单位</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase通过将region切分在许多机器上实现分布式。也就是说，你如果有16GB的数据，只分了2个region， 你却有20台机器，有18台就浪费了。</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
region数目太多就会造成性能下降，现在比以前好多了。但是对于同样大小的数据，700个region比3000个要好。</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
region数目太少就会妨碍可扩展性，降低并行能力。有的时候导致压力不够分散。这就是为什么，你向一个10节点的HBase集群导入200MB的数据，大部分的节点是idle的。</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
RegionServer中1个region和10个region索引需要的内存量没有太多的差别。</p>
</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
最好是使用默认的配置，可以把热的表配小一点(或者受到split热点的region把压力分散到集群中)。如果你的cell的大小比较大(100KB或更大)，就可以把region的大小调到1GB。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#bigger.regions" rel="nofollow" title="2.8.2.6. Bigger Regions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 2.5.2.6, “更大区域”</a> 获取配置更多信息.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.2. Region-RegionServer Assignment" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t267" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="regions.arch.assignment" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.2. 区域-区域服务器分配</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
本节描述区域如何分配到区域服务器。</p>
<div class="section" title="9.7.2.1. Startup" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t268" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="regions.arch.assignment.startup" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.2.1. 启动</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当HBase启动时，区域分配如下(短版本):</p>
<div class="orderedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ol class="orderedlist" type="1" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">启动时主服务器调用<code class="code">AssignmentManager</code>.</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">AssignmentManager</code> 在META 中查找已经存在的区域分配。</li><li class="listitem">如果区域分配还有效(如 RegionServer 还在线) ，那么分配继续保持。</li><li class="listitem">如果区域分配失效，<code class="code">LoadBalancerFactory</code> 被调用来分配区域。 <code class="code">DefaultLoadBalancer</code> 将随机分配区域到RegionServer.</li><li class="listitem">META 随 RegionServer 分配更新(如果需要) ， RegionServer 启动区域开启代码(RegionServer 启动时进程)</li></ol>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.2.2. Failover" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t269" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="regions.arch.assignment.failover" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.2.2. 故障转移</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当区域服务器出故障退出时 (短版本):</p>
<div class="orderedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ol class="orderedlist" type="1" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">区域立即不可获取，因为区域服务器退出。</li><li class="listitem">主服务器会检测到区域服务器退出。</li><li class="listitem">区域分配会失效并被重新分配，如同启动时序。</li></ol>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.2.3. Region Load Balancing" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t270" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="regions.arch.balancer" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.2.3. 区域负载均衡</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
区域可以定期移动，见<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#master.processes.loadbalancer" rel="nofollow" title="9.5.4.1. LoadBalancer" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none"> Section 9.5.4.1, “LoadBalancer”</a>.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.3. Region-RegionServer Locality" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t271" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="regions.arch.locality" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.3. 区域-区域服务器本地化</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Over time, Region-RegionServer locality is achieved via HDFS block replication. The HDFS client does the following by default when choosing locations to write replicas:</p>
<div class="orderedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ol class="orderedlist" type="1" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">First replica is written to local node</li><li class="listitem">Second replica is written to another node in same rack</li><li class="listitem">Third replica is written to a node in another rack (if sufficient nodes)</li></ol>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Thus, HBase eventually achieves locality for a region after a flush or a compaction. In a RegionServer failover situation a RegionServer may be assigned regions with non-local StoreFiles (because none of the replicas are local), however as new data is written
 in the region, or the table is compacted and StoreFiles are re-written, they will become "local" to the RegionServer.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For more information, see <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hadoop.apache.org/common/docs/r0.20.205.0/hdfs_design.html#Replica+Placement%3A+The+First+Baby+Steps" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HDFS Design on Replica
 Placement</a> and also Lars George's blog on <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://www.larsgeorge.com/2010/05/hbase-file-locality-in-hdfs.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBase and HDFS locality</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.4. Region Splits" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t272" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e5583" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.4. 区域分割</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
区域服务器的分割操作是不可见的，因为Master不会参与其中。区域服务器切割region的步骤是，先将该region下线，然后切割，将其子region加入到META元信息中，再将他们加入到原本的区域服务器中，最后汇报Master.参见<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#disable.splitting" rel="nofollow" title="3.6.6. 管理 Splitting" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 2.8.2.7,
 “管理 Splitting”</a>来手动管理切割操作(以及为何这么做)。</p>
<div class="section" title="9.7.4.1. Custom Split Policies" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t273" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e5590" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.4.1. 自定义分割策略</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
缺省分割策略可以被重写，采用自定义<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/regionserver/RegionSplitPolicy.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">RegionSplitPolicy</a> (HBase 0.94+).一般自定义分割策略应该扩展HBase的缺省分割策略: <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/regionserver/ConstantSizeRegionSplitPolicy.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">ConstantSizeRegionSplitPolicy</a>.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
策略可以HBaseConfiguration 全局使用，或基于每张表：</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_74_8380287" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">HTableDescriptor myHtd = ...;
myHtd.setValue(HTableDescriptor.SPLIT_POLICY, MyCustomSplitPolicy.class.getName());
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.5. Store" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t274" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="store" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.5. 存储</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
一个存储包含了一个内存存储(MemStore)和若干个文件存储(StoreFile--HFile).一个存储可以定位到一个列族中的一个区.</p>
<div class="section" title="9.7.5.1. MemStore" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t275" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="store.memstore" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.5.1. MemStore</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
MemStores是Store中的内存Store,可以进行修改操作。修改的内容是KeyValues。当flush的是，现有的memstore会生成快照，然后清空。在执行快照的时候，HBase会继续接收修改操作，保存在memstore外面，直到快照完成。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.5.2. StoreFile (HFile)" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t276" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hfile" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.5.2. StoreFile (HFile)</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
文件存储是数据存在的地方。</p>
<div class="section" title="9.7.5.2.1. HFile Format" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 class="title" style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t277" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e5621" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.5.2.1. HFile Format</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="emphasis"><em>hfile</em></span>文件格式是基于<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://labs.google.com/papers/bigtable.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">BigTable [2006]</a>论文中的SSTable。构建在Hadoop的<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hadoop.apache.org/common/docs/current/api/org/apache/hadoop/io/file/tfile/TFile.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">tfile</a>上面(直接使用了tfile的单元测试和压缩工具)。
 Schubert Zhang 的博客<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://cloudepr.blogspot.com/2009/09/hfile-block-indexed-file-format-to.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HFile: A Block-Indexed File Format to Store Sorted Key-Value
 Pairs</a>详细介绍了HBases的hfile。Matteo Bertozzi也做了详细的介绍<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://th30z.blogspot.com/2011/02/hbase-io-hfile.html?spref=tw" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBase I/O: HFile</a>。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For more information, see the <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/xref/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/io/hfile/HFile.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HFile source code</a>. Also see <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hfilev2" rel="nofollow" title="Appendix E. HFile format version 2" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Appendix E, <em>HFile
 format version 2</em></a> for information about the HFile v2 format that was included in 0.92.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.5.2.2. HFile Tool" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 class="title" style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t278" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hfile_tool" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.5.2.2. HFile 工具</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
要想看到hfile内容的文本化版本，你可以使用<code class="classname">org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.HFile </code>工具。可以这样用：</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_75_2821923" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">&lt;code class="code"&gt;$ ${HBASE_HOME}/bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.HFile &lt;/code&gt; </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
例如，你想看文件 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hdfs://10.81.47.41:9000/hbase/TEST/1418428042/DSMP/4759508618286845475</code>的内容, 就执行如下的命令:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_76_959510" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);"> &lt;code class="code"&gt;$ ${HBASE_HOME}/bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.HFile -v -f hdfs://10.81.47.41:9000/hbase/TEST/1418428042/DSMP/4759508618286845475 &lt;/code&gt; </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果你没有输入-v,就仅仅能看到一个hfile的汇总信息。其他功能的用法可以看<code class="classname">HFile</code>的文档。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.5.2.3. StoreFile Directory Structure on HDFS" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 class="title" style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t279" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="store.file.dir" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.5.2.3. StoreFile Directory Structure on HDFS</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For more information of what StoreFiles look like on HDFS with respect to the directory structure, see <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#trouble.namenode.hbase.objects" rel="nofollow" title="12.7.2. Browsing HDFS for HBase Objects" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 12.7.2,
 “Browsing HDFS for HBase Objects”</a>.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.5.3. Blocks" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t280" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hfile.blocks" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.5.3. Blocks</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
StoreFiles are composed of blocks. The blocksize is configured on a per-ColumnFamily basis.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Compression happens at the block level within StoreFiles. For more information on compression, see <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#compression" rel="nofollow" title="Appendix C. Compression In HBase" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Appendix C, <em>Compression
 In HBase</em></a>.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For more information on blocks, see the <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/xref/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/io/hfile/HFileBlock.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HFileBlock source code</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.5.4. KeyValue" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t281" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="keyvalue" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.5.4. KeyValue</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The KeyValue class is the heart of data storage in HBase. KeyValue wraps a byte array and takes offsets and lengths into passed array at where to start interpreting the content as KeyValue.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The KeyValue format inside a byte array is:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">keylength</li><li class="listitem">valuelength</li><li class="listitem">key</li><li class="listitem">value</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The Key is further decomposed as:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">rowlength</li><li class="listitem">row (i.e., the rowkey)</li><li class="listitem">columnfamilylength</li><li class="listitem">columnfamily</li><li class="listitem">columnqualifier</li><li class="listitem">timestamp</li><li class="listitem">keytype (e.g., Put, Delete, DeleteColumn, DeleteFamily)</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
KeyValue instances are <span class="emphasis"><em>not</em></span> split across blocks. For example, if there is an 8 MB KeyValue, even if the block-size is 64kb this KeyValue will be read in as a coherent block. For more information, see the <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/xref/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/KeyValue.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">KeyValue
 source code</a>.</p>
<div class="section" title="9.7.5.4.1. Example" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 class="title" style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t282" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="keyvalue.example" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.5.4.1. Example</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
To emphasize the points above, examine what happens with two Puts for two different columns for the same row:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">Put #1: <code class="code">rowkey=row1, cf:attr1=value1</code></li><li class="listitem">Put #2: <code class="code">rowkey=row1, cf:attr2=value2</code></li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Even though these are for the same row, a KeyValue is created for each column:</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Key portion for Put #1:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">rowlength <code class="code">------------&gt; 4</code></li><li class="listitem">row <code class="code">-----------------&gt; row1</code></li><li class="listitem">columnfamilylength <code class="code">---&gt; 2</code></li><li class="listitem">columnfamily <code class="code">--------&gt; cf</code></li><li class="listitem">columnqualifier <code class="code">------&gt; attr1</code></li><li class="listitem">timestamp <code class="code">-----------&gt; server time of Put</code></li><li class="listitem">keytype <code class="code">-------------&gt; Put</code></li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Key portion for Put #2:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">rowlength <code class="code">------------&gt; 4</code></li><li class="listitem">row <code class="code">-----------------&gt; row1</code></li><li class="listitem">columnfamilylength <code class="code">---&gt; 2</code></li><li class="listitem">columnfamily <code class="code">--------&gt; cf</code></li><li class="listitem">columnqualifier <code class="code">------&gt; attr2</code></li><li class="listitem">timestamp <code class="code">-----------&gt; server time of Put</code></li><li class="listitem">keytype <code class="code">-------------&gt; Put</code></li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
It is critical to understand that the rowkey, ColumnFamily, and column (aka columnqualifier) are embedded within the KeyValue instance. The longer these identifiers are, the bigger the KeyValue is.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.5.5. Compaction" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t283" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="compaction" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.5.5. 紧缩</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
有两种类型的紧缩：次紧缩和主紧缩。minor紧缩通常会将数个小的相邻的文件合并成一个大的。Minor不会删除打上删除标记的数据，也不会删除过期的数据，Major紧缩会删除过期的数据。有些时候minor紧缩就会将一个store中的全部文件紧缩，实际上这个时候他本身就是一个major压‹缩。对于一个minor紧缩是如何紧缩的，可以参见<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/xref/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/regionserver/Store.html#836" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">ascii
