 diagram in the Store source code.</a></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
在执行一个major紧缩之后，一个store只会有一个sotrefile,通常情况下这样可以提供性能。注意：major紧缩将会将store中的数据全部重写，在一个负载很大的系统中，这个操作是很伤的。所以在大型系统中，通常会自己<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#disable.splitting" rel="nofollow" title="3.6.6. 管理 Splitting" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 2.8.2.8,
 “管理 Splitting”</a>。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
紧缩 <span class="emphasis"><em>不会</em></span> 进行分区合并。参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ops.regionmgt.merge" rel="nofollow" title="14.2.2. Merge" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 14.2.2, “Merge”</a> 获取更多合并的信息。</p>
<div class="section" title="9.7.5.5.1. Compaction File Selection" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 class="title" style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t284" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="compaction.file.selection" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.5.5.1. Compaction File Selection</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
To understand the core algorithm for StoreFile selection, there is some ASCII-art in the <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/xref/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/regionserver/Store.html#836" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Store
 source code</a> that will serve as useful reference. It has been copied below:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_77_1813095" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">/* normal skew:
 *
 *         older ----&gt; newer
 *     _
 *    | |   _
 *    | |  | |   _
 *  --|-|- |-|- |-|---_-------_-------  minCompactSize
 *    | |  | |  | |  | |  _  | |
 *    | |  | |  | |  | | | | | |
 *    | |  | |  | |  | | | | | |
 */
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Important knobs:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.store.compaction.ratio</code> Ratio used in compaction file selection algorithm (default 1.2f).</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.min</code> (.90 hbase.hstore.compactionThreshold) (files) Minimum number of StoreFiles per Store to be selected for a compaction to occur (default 2).</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.max</code> (files) Maximum number of StoreFiles to compact per minor compaction (default 10).</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.min.size</code> (bytes) Any StoreFile smaller than this setting with automatically be a candidate for compaction. Defaults to <code class="code">hbase.hregion.memstore.flush.size</code> (128 mb).</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.max.size</code> (.92) (bytes) Any StoreFile larger than this setting with automatically be excluded from compaction (default Long.MAX_VALUE).</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The minor compaction StoreFile selection logic is size based, and selects a file for compaction when the file &lt;= sum(smaller_files) * <code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.ratio</code>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.5.5.2. Minor Compaction File Selection - Example #1 (Basic Example)" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 class="title" style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t285" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="compaction.file.selection.example1" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.5.5.2. Minor Compaction File Selection - Example #1 (Basic Example)</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
This example mirrors an example from the unit test <code class="code">TestCompactSelection</code>.</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.store.compaction.ratio</code> = 1.0f</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.min</code> = 3 (files)</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.max</code> = 5 (files)</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.min.size</code> = 10 (bytes)</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.max.size</code> = 1000 (bytes)</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The following StoreFiles exist: 100, 50, 23, 12, and 12 bytes apiece (oldest to newest). With the above parameters, the files that would be selected for minor compaction are 23, 12, and 12.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Why?</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">100 --&gt; No, because sum(50, 23, 12, 12) * 1.0 = 97.</li><li class="listitem">50 --&gt; No, because sum(23, 12, 12) * 1.0 = 47.</li><li class="listitem">23 --&gt; Yes, because sum(12, 12) * 1.0 = 24.</li><li class="listitem">12 --&gt; Yes, because the previous file has been included, and because this does not exceed the the max-file limit of 5</li><li class="listitem">12 --&gt; Yes, because the previous file had been included, and because this does not exceed the the max-file limit of 5.</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.5.5.3. Minor Compaction File Selection - Example #2 (Not Enough Files To Compact)" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 class="title" style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t286" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="compaction.file.selection.example2" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.5.5.3. Minor Compaction File Selection - Example #2 (Not Enough Files To Compact)</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
This example mirrors an example from the unit test <code class="code">TestCompactSelection</code>.</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.store.compaction.ratio</code> = 1.0f</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.min</code> = 3 (files)</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.max</code> = 5 (files)</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.min.size</code> = 10 (bytes)</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.max.size</code> = 1000 (bytes)</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The following StoreFiles exist: 100, 25, 12, and 12 bytes apiece (oldest to newest). With the above parameters, the files that would be selected for minor compaction are 23, 12, and 12.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Why?</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">100 --&gt; No, because sum(25, 12, 12) * 1.0 = 47</li><li class="listitem">25 --&gt; No, because sum(12, 12) * 1.0 = 24</li><li class="listitem">12 --&gt; No. Candidate because sum(12) * 1.0 = 12, there are only 2 files to compact and that is less than the threshold of 3</li><li class="listitem">12 --&gt; No. Candidate because the previous StoreFile was, but there are not enough files to compact</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.5.5.4. Minor Compaction File Selection - Example #3 (Limiting Files To Compact)" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 class="title" style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t287" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="compaction.file.selection.example2" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.5.5.4. Minor Compaction File Selection - Example #3 (Limiting Files To Compact)</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
This example mirrors an example from the unit test <code class="code">TestCompactSelection</code>.</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.store.compaction.ratio</code> = 1.0f</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.min</code> = 3 (files)</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.max</code> = 5 (files)</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.min.size</code> = 10 (bytes)</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.max.size</code> = 1000 (bytes)</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The following StoreFiles exist: 7, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2, and 1 bytes apiece (oldest to newest). With the above parameters, the files that would be selected for minor compaction are 7, 6, 5, 4, 3.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Why?</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">7 --&gt; Yes, because sum(6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1) * 1.0 = 21. Also, 7 is less than the min-size</li><li class="listitem">6 --&gt; Yes, because sum(5, 4, 3, 2, 1) * 1.0 = 15. Also, 6 is less than the min-size.</li><li class="listitem">5 --&gt; Yes, because sum(4, 3, 2, 1) * 1.0 = 10. Also, 5 is less than the min-size.</li><li class="listitem">4 --&gt; Yes, because sum(3, 2, 1) * 1.0 = 6. Also, 4 is less than the min-size.</li><li class="listitem">3 --&gt; Yes, because sum(2, 1) * 1.0 = 3. Also, 3 is less than the min-size.</li><li class="listitem">2 --&gt; No. Candidate because previous file was selected and 2 is less than the min-size, but the max-number of files to compact has been reached.</li><li class="listitem">1 --&gt; No. Candidate because previous file was selected and 1 is less than the min-size, but max-number of files to compact has been reached.</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.5.5.5. Impact of Key Configuration Options" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 class="title" style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t288" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="compaction.config.impact" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.7.5.5.5. Impact of Key Configuration Options</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">hbase.store.compaction.ratio</code>. A large ratio (e.g., 10) will produce a single giant file. Conversely, a value of .25 will produce behavior similar to the BigTable compaction algorithm - resulting in 4 StoreFiles.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">hbase.hstore.compaction.min.size</code>. Because this limit represents the "automatic include" limit for all StoreFiles smaller than this value, this value may need to be adjusted downwards in write-heavy environments where many 1 or 2 mb
 StoreFiles are being flushed, because every file will be targeted for compaction and the resulting files may still be under the min-size and require further compaction, etc.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.6. Bloom Filters" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px"></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.7.6.1. Bloom StoreFile footprint" style="margin:0px">
</div>
</div>
<div class="footnotes" style="margin:0px"><br>
<hr width="100" align="left" style="margin:0.6em; border-top-width:0px; border-right-width:0px; border-left-width:0px; border-style:solid; border-color:rgb(206,206,206)">
<div class="footnote" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<sup>[<a target="_blank" id="ftn.d1934e6050" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d1934e6050" rel="nofollow" class="para" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">25</a>] </sup>For description of the development process -- why static blooms rather
 than dynamic -- and for an overview of the unique properties that pertain to blooms in HBase, as well as possible future directions, see the <span class="emphasis"><em>Development Process</em></span> section of the document <a target="_blank" class="link" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12444007/Bloom_Filters_in_HBase.pdf" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">BloomFilters
 in HBase</a> attached to <a target="_blank" class="link" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-1200" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBase-1200</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="footnote" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<sup>[<a target="_blank" id="ftn.d1934e6062" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d1934e6062" rel="nofollow" class="para" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">26</a>] </sup>The bloom filters described here are actually version two of blooms

<div class="section" title="9.8. Bulk Loading" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t289" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.bulk.load" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.8. 批量装载(Bulk Loading)</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.8.1. Overview" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t290" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.bulk.load.overview" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.8.1. 概述</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase 有好几种方法将数据装载到表。最直接的方式即可以通过MapReduce任务，也可以通过普通客户端API。但是这都不是高效方法。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
批量装载特性采用 MapReduce 任务，将表数据输出为HBase的内部数据格式，然后可以将产生的存储文件直接装载到运行的集群中。批量装载比简单使用 HBase API 消耗更少的CPU和网络资源。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.8.2. Bulk Load Architecture" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t291" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.bulk.load.arch" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.8.2. 批量装载架构</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase 批量装载过程包含两个主要步骤。</p>
<div class="section" title="9.8.2.1. Preparing data via a MapReduce job" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t292" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.bulk.load.prep" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.8.2.1. 通过MapReduce 任务准备数据</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
批量装载第一步，从MapReduce任务通过<code class="code">HFileOutputFormat</code>产生HBase数据文件(StoreFiles) 。输出数据为HBase的内部数据格式，以便随后装载到集群更高效。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
为了处理高效， <code class="code">HFileOutputFormat</code> 必须比配置为每个HFile适合在一个分区内。为了做到这一点，输出将被批量装载到HBase的任务，使用Hadoop 的<code class="code">TotalOrderPartitioner</code> 类来分开map输出为分开的键空间区间。对应于表内每个分区(region)的键空间。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">HFileOutputFormat</code> 包含一个方便的函数, <code class="code">configureIncrementalLoad()</code>, 可以基于表当前分区边界自动设置<code class="code">TotalOrderPartitioner</code>。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.8.2.2. Completing the data load" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t293" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.bulk.load.complete" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.8.2.2. 完成数据装载</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
After the data has been prepared using <code class="code">HFileOutputFormat</code>, it is loaded into the cluster using <code class="code">completebulkload</code>. This command line tool iterates through the prepared data files, and for each one determines
 the region the file belongs to. It then contacts the appropriate Region Server which adopts the HFile, moving it into its storage directory and making the data available to clients.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If the region boundaries have changed during the course of bulk load preparation, or between the preparation and completion steps, the <code class="code">completebulkloads</code> utility will automatically split the data files into pieces corresponding to the
 new boundaries. This process is not optimally efficient, so users should take care to minimize the delay between preparing a bulk load and importing it into the cluster, especially if other clients are simultaneously loading data through other means.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.8.3. Importing the prepared data using the completebulkload tool" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t294" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.bulk.load.import" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.8.3. 采用completebulkload 工具导入准备的数据</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
After a data import has been prepared, either by using the <code class="code">importtsv</code> tool with the "<code class="code">importtsv.bulk.output</code>" option or by some other MapReduce job using the <code class="code">HFileOutputFormat</code>, the <code class="code">completebulkload</code> tool
 is used to import the data into the running cluster.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The <code class="code">completebulkload</code> tool simply takes the output path where <code class="code">importtsv</code> or your MapReduce job put its results, and the table name to import into. For example:</p>
<code class="code">$ hadoop jar hbase-VERSION.jar completebulkload [-c /path/to/hbase/config/hbase-site.xml] /user/todd/myoutput mytable</code>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The <code class="code">-c config-file</code> option can be used to specify a file containing the appropriate hbase parameters (e.g., hbase-site.xml) if not supplied already on the CLASSPATH (In addition, the CLASSPATH must contain the directory that has the
 zookeeper configuration file if zookeeper is NOT managed by HBase).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Note: If the target table does not already exist in HBase, this tool will create the table automatically.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
This tool will run quickly, after which point the new data will be visible in the cluster.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.8.4. See Also" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t295" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.bulk.load.also" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.8.4. 参考</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For more information about the referenced utilities, see <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#importtsv" rel="nofollow" title="14.1.9. ImportTsv" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 14.1.9, “ImportTsv”</a> and <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#completebulkload" rel="nofollow" title="14.1.10. CompleteBulkLoad" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 14.1.10,
 “CompleteBulkLoad”</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.8.5. Advanced Usage" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t296" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.bulk.load.adv" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.8.5. 高级使用</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Although the <code class="code">importtsv</code> tool is useful in many cases, advanced users may want to generate data programatically, or import data from other formats. To get started doing so, dig into <code class="code">ImportTsv.java</code> and check
 the JavaDoc for HFileOutputFormat.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The import step of the bulk load can also be done programatically. 参考 the <code class="code">LoadIncrementalHFiles</code> class 获取更多信息。</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.9. HDFS" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t297" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.hdfs" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.9. HDFS</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
由于 HBase 在 HDFS 上运行(每个存储文件也被写为HDFS的文件)，必须理解 HDFS 结构，特别是它如何存储文件，处理故障转移，备份块。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 Hadoop 文档 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hadoop.apache.org/common/docs/current/hdfs_design.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HDFS Architecture</a> 获取更多信息。</p>
<div class="section" title="9.9.1. NameNode" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t298" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.hdfs.nn" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.9.1. NameNode</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
NameNode 负责维护文件系统元数据。参考上述HDFS结构链接获取更多信息。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="9.9.2. DataNode" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t299" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="arch.hdfs.dn" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>9.9.2. DataNode</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
DataNode 负责存储HDFS 块。 参考上述HDFS结构链接获取更多信息。</p>
</div>
</div>

</div>

<a target="_blank" name="t303" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="rest" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>10.2. REST</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<a target="_blank" name="t304" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="thrift" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>10.3. Thrift</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当前 Thrift大部分文档在 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://wiki.apache.org/hadoop/HBase/ThriftApi" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBase Wiki on Thrift</a>.</p>
<div class="section" title="10.3.1. Filter Language" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t305" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="thrift.filter-language" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>10.3.1. 过滤器语言</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="10.3.1.1. Use Case" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t306" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="use-case" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>10.3.1.1. 用例</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
注意: 本特性在 HBase 0.92 中加入。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
This allows the user to perform server-side filtering when accessing HBase over Thrift. The user specifies a filter via a string. The string is parsed on the server to construct the filter</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="10.3.1.2. General Filter String Syntax" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t307" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="general-syntax" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>10.3.1.2. 通用过滤字符串语法</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A simple filter expression is expressed as: <code class="code">“FilterName (argument, argument, ... , argument)”</code></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
You must specify the name of the filter followed by the argument list in parenthesis. Commas separate the individual arguments</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If the argument represents a string, it should be enclosed in single quotes.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If it represents a boolean, an integer or a comparison operator like &lt;, &gt;, != etc. it should not be enclosed in quotes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The filter name must be one word. All ASCII characters are allowed except for whitespace, single quotes and parenthesis.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The filter’s arguments can contain any ASCII character. <code class="code">If single quotes are present in the argument, they must be escaped by a preceding single quote</code></p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="10.3.1.3. Compound Filters and Operators" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t308" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="compound-filters-and-operators" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>10.3.1.3. Compound Filters and Operators</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Currently, two binary operators – AND/OR and two unary operators – WHILE/SKIP are supported.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Note: the operators are all in uppercase</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>AND</strong></span> – as the name suggests, if this operator is used, the key-value must pass both the filters</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>OR</strong></span> – as the name suggests, if this operator is used, the key-value must pass at least one of the filters</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>SKIP</strong></span> – For a particular row, if any of the key-values don’t pass the filter condition, the entire row is skipped</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>WHILE</strong></span> - For a particular row, it continues to emit key-values until a key-value is reached that fails the filter condition</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Compound Filters:</strong></span> Using these operators, a hierarchy of filters can be created. For example: <code class="code">“(Filter1 AND Filter2) OR (Filter3 AND Filter4)”</code></p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="10.3.1.4. Order of Evaluation" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t309" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="order-of-evaluation" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>10.3.1.4. Order of Evaluation</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Parenthesis have the highest precedence. The SKIP and WHILE operators are next and have the same precedence.The AND operator has the next highest precedence followed by the OR operator.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For example:</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A filter string of the form:<code class="code">“Filter1 AND Filter2 OR Filter3”</code> will be evaluated as:<code class="code">“(Filter1 AND Filter2) OR Filter3”</code></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A filter string of the form:<code class="code">“Filter1 AND SKIP Filter2 OR Filter3”</code> will be evaluated as:<code class="code">“(Filter1 AND (SKIP Filter2)) OR Filter3”</code></p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="10.3.1.5. Compare Operator" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t310" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="compare-operator" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>10.3.1.5. 比较运算符</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
比较运算符可以是下面之一:</p>
<div class="orderedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ol class="orderedlist" type="1" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
LESS (&lt;)</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
LESS_OR_EQUAL (&lt;=)</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
EQUAL (=)</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
NOT_EQUAL (!=)</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
GREATER_OR_EQUAL (&gt;=)</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
GREATER (&gt;)</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
NO_OP (no operation)</p>
</li></ol>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
客户端应该使用 (&lt;, &lt;=, =, !=, &gt;, &gt;=) 来表达比较操作.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="10.3.1.6. Comparator" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t311" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="comparator" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>10.3.1.6. 比较器(Comparator)</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
比较器可以是下面之一:</p>
<div class="orderedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ol class="orderedlist" type="1" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>BinaryComparator</strong></span> - This lexicographically compares against the specified byte array using Bytes.compareTo(byte[], byte[])</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>BinaryPrefixComparator</strong></span> - This lexicographically compares against a specified byte array. It only compares up to the length of this byte array.</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>RegexStringComparator</strong></span> - This compares against the specified byte array using the given regular expression. Only EQUAL and NOT_EQUAL comparisons are valid with this comparator</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>SubStringComparator</strong></span> - This tests if the given substring appears in a specified byte array. The comparison is case insensitive. Only EQUAL and NOT_EQUAL comparisons are valid with this comparator</p>
</li></ol>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The general syntax of a comparator is:<code class="code"> ComparatorType:ComparatorValue</code></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The ComparatorType for the various comparators is as follows:</p>
<div class="orderedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ol class="orderedlist" type="1" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>BinaryComparator</strong></span> - binary</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>BinaryPrefixComparator</strong></span> - binaryprefix</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>RegexStringComparator</strong></span> - regexstring</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>SubStringComparator</strong></span> - substring</p>
</li></ol>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The ComparatorValue can be any value.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Example1:<code class="code"> &gt;, 'binary:abc' </code>will match everything that is lexicographically greater than "abc"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Example2:<code class="code"> =, 'binaryprefix:abc' </code>will match everything whose first 3 characters are lexicographically equal to "abc"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Example3:<code class="code"> !=, 'regexstring:ab*yz' </code>will match everything that doesn't begin with "ab" and ends with "yz"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Example4:<code class="code"> =, 'substring:abc123' </code>will match everything that begins with the substring "abc123"</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="10.3.1.7. Example PHP Client Program that uses the Filter Language" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t312" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="example%20PHP%20Client%20Program" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>10.3.1.7.  PHP 客户端编程使用过滤器示例</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_78_5174934" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">&lt;? $_SERVER['PHP_ROOT'] = realpath(dirname(__FILE__).'/..');
   require_once $_SERVER['PHP_ROOT'].'/flib/__flib.php';
   flib_init(FLIB_CONTEXT_SCRIPT);
   require_module('storage/hbase');
   $hbase = new HBase('&lt;server_name_running_thrift_server&gt;', &lt;port on which thrift server is running&gt;);
   $hbase-&gt;open();
   $client = $hbase-&gt;getClient();
   $result = $client-&gt;scannerOpenWithFilterString('table_name', "(PrefixFilter ('row2') AND (QualifierFilter (&gt;=, 'binary:xyz'))) AND (TimestampsFilter ( 123, 456))");
   $to_print = $client-&gt;scannerGetList($result,1);
   while ($to_print) {
      print_r($to_print);
      $to_print = $client-&gt;scannerGetList($result,1);
    }
   $client-&gt;scannerClose($result);
?&gt;
        </pre></div>
<div class="section" title="10.3.1.8. Example Filter Strings" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t313" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="example-filter-strings" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>10.3.1.8. 过滤字符串示例</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">“PrefixFilter (‘Row’) AND PageFilter (1) AND FirstKeyOnlyFilter ()”</code> will return all key-value pairs that match the following conditions:</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
1) The row containing the key-value should have prefix “Row”</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
2) The key-value must be located in the first row of the table</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
3) The key-value pair must be the first key-value in the row</p>
</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<div class="orderedlist" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">“(RowFilter (=, ‘binary:Row 1’) AND TimeStampsFilter (74689, 89734)) OR ColumnRangeFilter (‘abc’, true, ‘xyz’, false))”</code> will return all key-value pairs that match both the following conditions:</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
1) The key-value is in a row having row key “Row 1”</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
2) The key-value must have a timestamp of either 74689 or 89734.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Or it must match the following condition:</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
1) The key-value pair must be in a column that is lexicographically &gt;= abc and &lt; xyz </p>
</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<ol class="orderedlist" type="1" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
</ol>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">“SKIP ValueFilter (0)”</code> will skip the entire row if any of the values in the row is not 0</p>
</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="10.3.1.9. Individual Filter Syntax" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t314" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="Individual%20Filter%20Syntax" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>10.3.1.9. 独有过滤器语法</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="orderedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ol class="orderedlist" type="1" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>KeyOnlyFilter</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter doesn’t take any arguments. It returns only the key component of each key-value.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> KeyOnlyFilter ()</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "KeyOnlyFilter ()"</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>FirstKeyOnlyFilter</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter doesn’t take any arguments. It returns only the first key-value from each row.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> FirstKeyOnlyFilter ()</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "FirstKeyOnlyFilter ()"</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>PrefixFilter</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter takes one argument – a prefix of a row key. It returns only those key-values present in a row that starts with the specified row prefix</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> PrefixFilter (‘&lt;row_prefix&gt;’)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "PrefixFilter (‘Row’)"</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>ColumnPrefixFilter</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter takes one argument – a column prefix. It returns only those key-values present in a column that starts with the specified column prefix. The column prefix must be of the form: <code class="code">“qualifier”</code></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span>ColumnPrefixFilter(‘&lt;column_prefix&gt;’)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "ColumnPrefixFilter(‘Col’)"</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="underline"><span class="bold"><strong>MultipleColumnPrefixFilter</strong></span></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter takes a list of column prefixes. It returns key-values that are present in a column that starts with any of the specified column prefixes. Each of the column prefixes must be of the form: <code class="code">“qualifier”</code></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span>MultipleColumnPrefixFilter(‘&lt;column_prefix&gt;’, ‘&lt;column_prefix&gt;’, …, ‘&lt;column_prefix&gt;’)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "MultipleColumnPrefixFilter(‘Col1’, ‘Col2’)"</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>ColumnCountGetFilter</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter takes one argument – a limit. It returns the first limit number of columns in the table</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> ColumnCountGetFilter (‘&lt;limit&gt;’)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "ColumnCountGetFilter (4)"</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>PageFilter</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter takes one argument – a page size. It returns page size number of rows from the table.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> PageFilter (‘&lt;page_size&gt;’)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "PageFilter (2)"</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>ColumnPaginationFilter</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter takes two arguments – a limit and offset. It returns limit number of columns after offset number of columns. It does this for all the rows</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> ColumnPaginationFilter(‘&lt;limit&gt;’, ‘&lt;offest&gt;’)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "ColumnPaginationFilter (3, 5)"</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>InclusiveStopFilter</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter takes one argument – a row key on which to stop scanning. It returns all key-values present in rows up to and including the specified row</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> InclusiveStopFilter(‘&lt;stop_row_key&gt;’)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "InclusiveStopFilter ('Row2')"</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>TimeStampsFilter</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter takes a list of timestamps. It returns those key-values whose timestamps matches any of the specified timestamps</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> TimeStampsFilter (&lt;timestamp&gt;, &lt;timestamp&gt;, ... ,&lt;timestamp&gt;)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "TimeStampsFilter (5985489, 48895495, 58489845945)"</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>RowFilter</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter takes a compare operator and a comparator. It compares each row key with the comparator using the compare operator and if the comparison returns true, it returns all the key-values in that
 row</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> RowFilter (&lt;compareOp&gt;, ‘&lt;row_comparator&gt;’)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example: </strong></span>"RowFilter (&lt;=, ‘xyz)"</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Family Filter</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter takes a compare operator and a comparator. It compares each qualifier name with the comparator using the compare operator and if the comparison returns true, it returns all the key-values in
 that column</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> QualifierFilter (&lt;compareOp&gt;, ‘&lt;qualifier_comparator&gt;’)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "QualifierFilter (=, ‘Column1’)"</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>QualifierFilter</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter takes a compare operator and a comparator. It compares each qualifier name with the comparator using the compare operator and if the comparison returns true, it returns all the key-values in
 that column</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> QualifierFilter (&lt;compareOp&gt;,‘&lt;qualifier_comparator&gt;’)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "QualifierFilter (=,‘Column1’)"</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>ValueFilter</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter takes a compare operator and a comparator. It compares each value with the comparator using the compare operator and if the comparison returns true, it returns that key-value</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> ValueFilter (&lt;compareOp&gt;,‘&lt;value_comparator&gt;’)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "ValueFilter (!=, ‘Value’)"</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>DependentColumnFilter</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter takes two arguments – a family and a qualifier. It tries to locate this column in each row and returns all key-values in that row that have the same timestamp. If the row doesn’t contain the
 specified column – none of the key-values in that row will be returned.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The filter can also take an optional boolean argument – dropDependentColumn. If set to true, the column we were depending on doesn’t get returned.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The filter can also take two more additional optional arguments – a compare operator and a value comparator, which are further checks in addition to the family and qualifier. If the dependent column is found, its value should also pass the value check and then
 only is its timestamp taken into consideration</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> DependentColumnFilter (‘&lt;family&gt;’, ‘&lt;qualifier&gt;’, &lt;boolean&gt;, &lt;compare operator&gt;, ‘&lt;value comparator’)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> DependentColumnFilter (‘&lt;family&gt;’, ‘&lt;qualifier&gt;’, &lt;boolean&gt;)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> DependentColumnFilter (‘&lt;family&gt;’, ‘&lt;qualifier&gt;’)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "DependentColumnFilter (‘conf’, ‘blacklist’, false, &gt;=, ‘zebra’)"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "DependentColumnFilter (‘conf’, 'blacklist', true)"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "DependentColumnFilter (‘conf’, 'blacklist')"</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>SingleColumnValueFilter</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter takes a column family, a qualifier, a compare operator and a comparator. If the specified column is not found – all the columns of that row will be emitted. If the column is found and the comparison
 with the comparator returns true, all the columns of the row will be emitted. If the condition fails, the row will not be emitted.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
This filter also takes two additional optional boolean arguments – filterIfColumnMissing and setLatestVersionOnly</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If the filterIfColumnMissing flag is set to true the columns of the row will not be emitted if the specified column to check is not found in the row. The default value is false.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If the setLatestVersionOnly flag is set to false, it will test previous versions (timestamps) too. The default value is true.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
These flags are optional and if you must set neither or both</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> SingleColumnValueFilter(&lt;compare operator&gt;, ‘&lt;comparator&gt;’, ‘&lt;family&gt;’, ‘&lt;qualifier&gt;’,&lt;filterIfColumnMissing_boolean&gt;, &lt;latest_version_boolean&gt;)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> SingleColumnValueFilter(&lt;compare operator&gt;, ‘&lt;comparator&gt;’, ‘&lt;family&gt;’, ‘&lt;qualifier&gt;)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "SingleColumnValueFilter (&lt;=, ‘abc’,‘FamilyA’, ‘Column1’, true, false)"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "SingleColumnValueFilter (&lt;=, ‘abc’,‘FamilyA’, ‘Column1’)"</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>SingleColumnValueExcludeFilter</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter takes the same arguments and behaves same as SingleColumnValueFilter – however, if the column is found and the condition passes, all the columns of the row will be emitted except for the tested
 column value.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> SingleColumnValueExcludeFilter(&lt;compare operator&gt;, '&lt;comparator&gt;', '&lt;family&gt;', '&lt;qualifier&gt;',&lt;latest_version_boolean&gt;, &lt;filterIfColumnMissing_boolean&gt;)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> SingleColumnValueExcludeFilter(&lt;compare operator&gt;, '&lt;comparator&gt;', '&lt;family&gt;', '&lt;qualifier&gt;')</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "SingleColumnValueExcludeFilter (‘&lt;=’, ‘abc’,‘FamilyA’, ‘Column1’, ‘false’, ‘true’)"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "SingleColumnValueExcludeFilter (‘&lt;=’, ‘abc’, ‘FamilyA’, ‘Column1’)"</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>ColumnRangeFilter</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Description:</strong></span> This filter is used for selecting only those keys with columns that are between minColumn and maxColumn. It also takes two boolean variables to indicate whether to include the minColumn and maxColumn or
 not.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If you don’t want to set the minColumn or the maxColumn – you can pass in an empty argument.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Syntax:</strong></span> ColumnRangeFilter (‘&lt;minColumn&gt;’, &lt;minColumnInclusive_bool&gt;, ‘&lt;maxColumn&gt;’, &lt;maxColumnInclusive_bool&gt;)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<span class="bold"><strong>Example:</strong></span> "ColumnRangeFilter (‘abc’, true, ‘xyz’, false)"</p>
</li></ol>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t315" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>10.4. C/C++ Apache HBase Client</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Facebook的 Chip Turner 写了个纯 C/C++ 客户端。 <a target="_blank" href="https://github.com/facebook/native-cpp-hbase-client" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Check it out</a>.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="section" title="11.1. Operating System" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t317" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.os" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.1. 操作系统</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.1.1. Memory" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t318" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.os.ram" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.1.1. 内存</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
RAM, RAM, RAM. 不要饿着 HBase.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.1.2. 64-bit" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t319" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.os.64" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.1.2. 64-bit</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
使用 64-bit 平台(和64-bit JVM).</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.1.3. Swapping" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t320" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.os.swap" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.1.3. 交换区</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
小心交换，将交换区设为0。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.2. Network" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t321" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.network" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.2. 网络</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
也许，避免网络问题降低Hadoop和HBase性能的最重要因素就是所使用的交换机硬件。在项目范围内，集群大小翻倍或三倍甚至更多时，早期的决定可能导致主要的问题。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
要考虑的重要事项：</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">设备交换机容量</li><li class="listitem">系统连接数量</li><li class="listitem">上行容量</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<div class="section" title="11.2.1. Single Switch" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t322" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.network.1switch" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.2.1. 单交换机</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
单交换机配置最重要的因素，是硬件交换容量，所有系统连接到交换机产生的流量的处理能力。一些低价硬件商品，相对全交换机，具有较低交换能力。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.2.2. Multiple Switches" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t323" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.network.2switch" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.2.2. 多交换机</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
多交换机在系统结构中是潜在陷阱。低价硬件的最常用配置是1Gbps上行连接到另一个交换机。 该常被忽略的窄点很容易成为集群通讯的瓶颈。特别是MapReduce任务通过该上行连接同时读写大量数据时，会导致饱和。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
缓解该问题很简单，可以通过多种途径完成：</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">针对要创建的集群容量，采用合适硬件。</li><li class="listitem">采用更大单交换机配置，如单48 端口相较2x 24 端口为优。</li><li class="listitem">配置上行端口聚合(port trunking)来利用多网络接口增加交换机带宽。(译者注：port trunk：
<pre id="best-content-432716237" style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">将交换机上的多个端口在物理上连接起来，在逻辑上捆绑在一起，形成一个拥有较大带宽的端口，组成一个干路，以达到平衡负载和提供备份线路，扩充带宽的目的。
)        </pre>
</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.2.3. Multiple Racks" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t324" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.network.multirack" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.2.3. 多机架</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
多机架配置带来多交换机同样的潜在问题。导致性能降低的原因主要来自两个方面：</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">较低的交换机容量性能</li><li class="listitem">到其他机架的上行链路不足</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果机架上的交换机有合适交换容量，可以处理所有主机全速通信，那么下一个问题就是如何自动导航更多的交错在机架中的集群。最简单的避免横跨多机架问题的办法，是采用端口聚合来创建到其他机架的捆绑的上行的连接。然而该方法下行侧，是潜在被使用的端口开销。举例：从机架A到机架B创建 8Gbps 端口通道，采用24端口中的8个来和其他机架互通，ROI(投资回报率)很低。采用太少端口意味着不能从集群中传出最多的东西。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
机架间采用10Gbe 链接将极大增加性能，确保交换机都支持10Gbe 上行连接或支持扩展卡，后者相对上行连接，允许你节省机器端口。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.2.4. Network Interfaces" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t325" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.network.ints" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.2.4. 网络接口</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
所有网络接口功能正常吗？你确定？参考故障诊断用例：<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#casestudies.slownode" rel="nofollow" title="13.3.1. Case Study #1 (Performance Issue On A Single Node)" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 13.3.1,
 “Case Study #1 (Performance Issue On A Single Node)”</a>.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.2. Daemons" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div class="toc" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
可以从 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://wiki.apache.org/hadoop/PerformanceTuning" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">wiki Performance Tuning</a>看起。这个文档讲了一些主要的影响性能的方面:RAM, 压缩, JVM 设置, 等等。然后，可以看看下面的补充内容。</p>
<div class="note" title="打开RPC-level日志" style="margin:0px 0.5in">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -43.921875px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t326" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="rpc.logging" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>打开RPC-level日志</h3>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
在区域服务器打开RPC-level的日志对于深度的优化是有好处的。一旦打开，日志将喷涌而出。所以不建议长时间打开，只能看一小段时间。要想启用RPC-level的职责，可以使用区域服务器 UI点击<span class="emphasis"><em>Log Level</em></span>。将 <code class="classname">org.apache.hadoop.ipc</code> 的日志级别设为<code class="varname">DEBUG</code>。然后tail 区域服务器的日志，进行分析。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
要想关闭，只要把日志级别设为<code class="varname">INFO</code>就可以了.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="13.1. Java" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t327" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="jvm" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.3. Java</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="13.1.1. 垃圾收集和HBase" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t328" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="gc" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.3.1. 垃圾收集和Apache HBase</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="13.1.1.1. 长时间GC停顿" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t329" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="gcpause" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.3.1.1. 长时间GC停顿</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
在这个PPT <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://www.slideshare.net/cloudera/hbase-hug-presentation" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Avoiding Full GCs with MemStore-Local Allocation Buffers</a>, Todd Lipcon描述了在HBase中常见的两种“世界停止”式的GC操作，尤其是在加载的时候。一种是CMS失败的模式(译者注:CMS是一种GC的算法)，另一种是老一代的堆碎片导致的。要想定位第一种，只要将CMS执行的时间提前就可以了，加入<code class="code">-XX:CMSInitiatingOccupancyFraction</code>参数，把值调低。可以先从60%和70%开始(这个值调的越低，触发的GC次数就越多，消耗的CPU时间就越长)。要想定位第二种错误，Todd加入了一个实验性的功能，在HBase
 0.90.x中这个是要明确指定的(在0.92.x中，这个是默认项)，将你的<code class="classname">Configuration</code>中的<code class="code">hbase.hregion.memstore.mslab.enabled</code>设置为true。详细信息，可以看这个PPT. [<a target="_blank" name="d352e6660" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d352e6660" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">27</a>]. Be
 aware that when enabled, each MemStore instance will occupy at least an MSLAB instance of memory. If you have thousands of regions or lots of regions each with many column families, this allocation of MSLAB may be responsible for a good portion of your heap
 allocation and in an extreme case cause you to OOME. Disable MSLAB in this case, or lower the amount of memory it uses or float less regions per server.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
GC日志的更多信息，参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#trouble.log.gc" rel="nofollow" title="12.2.3. JVM Garbage Collection Logs" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 12.2.3, “JVM <span class="title">垃圾收集日志</span>”</a>.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>

 “Region大小”</a></p>

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参见<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hbase.regionserver.handler.count" rel="nofollow" title="hbase.regionserver.handler.count" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none"><code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.handler.count</code></a>.这个参数的本质是设置一个RegsionServer可以同时处理多少请求。
 如果定的太高，吞吐量反而会降低;如果定的太低，请求会被阻塞，得不到响应。你可以<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#rpc.logging" rel="nofollow" title="打开RPC-level日志" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">打开RPC-level日志</a>读Log，来决定对于你的集群什么值是合适的。(请求队列也是会消耗内存的)</p>

<div class="section" title="13.3. Column Families的数目" style="margin:0px">
