<a target="_blank" name="t339" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.zookeeper" id="perf.zookeeper" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.5. ZooKeeper</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
配置ZooKeeper信息，请参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#zookeeper" rel="nofollow" title="2.5. ZooKeeper" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 2.5, “ZooKeeper”</a>  , 参看关于使用专用磁盘部分。</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t340" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.schema" id="perf.schema" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.6. 模式设计</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div title="11.6.1. Number of Column Families" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t341" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.number.of.cfs" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.6.1.  列族<span class="title" style="clear:both">的数目</span></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参见 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#number.of.cfs" rel="nofollow" title="6.2.  On the number of column families" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 6.2, “ On the number of column families ”</a>.</p>
</div>
<div title="11.6.2. Key and Attribute Lengths" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t342" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.schema.keys" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.6.2. 键和属性长度</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#keysize" rel="nofollow" title="6.3.2. Try to minimize row and column sizes" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 6.3.2, “Try to minimize row and column sizes”</a>. 参考  <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#perf.compression.however" rel="nofollow" title="11.6.7.1. However..." style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 11.6.7.1,
 “However...”</a> 获取压缩申请终止( compression caveats)</p>
</div>
<div title="11.6.3. Table RegionSize" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t343" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.regionsize" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.6.3. 表的区域大小</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
区域大小可以通过基于每张表设置，当某些表需要与缺省设置的区域大小不同时，通过 <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HTableDescriptor.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HTableDescriptor</a> 的setFileSize 的事件设置。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#perf.number.of.regions" rel="nofollow" title="11.4.1. Number of Regions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 11.4.1, “Number of Regions”</a> 获取更多信息。</p>
</div>
<div title="11.6.4. Bloom Filters" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t344" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.bloom" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.6.4. 布隆过滤(Bloom Filters)</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
布隆过滤可以每列族单独启用。使用 HColumnDescriptor.setBloomFilterType(NONE | ROW | ROWCOL) 对列族单独启用布隆。 Default = NONE 没有布隆过滤。对 ROW，行键的哈希在每次插入行时将被添加到布隆。对 ROWCOL，行键 + 列族 + 列族修饰的哈希将在每次插入行时添加到布隆。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HColumnDescriptor.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HColumnDescriptor</a> 和 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#blooms" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.6. Bloom Filters" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.6,
 “布隆过滤(Bloom Filters)”</a> 获取更多信息。</p>
</div>
<div title="11.6.5. ColumnFamily BlockSize" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t345" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="schema.cf.blocksize" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.6.5. 列族块大小</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The blocksize can be configured for each ColumnFamily in a table, and this defaults to 64k. Larger cell values require larger blocksizes. There is an inverse relationship between blocksize and the resulting StoreFile indexes (i.e., if the blocksize is doubled
 then the resulting indexes should be roughly halved).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HColumnDescriptor.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HColumnDescriptor</a> and <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#store" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.5. Store" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5,
 “Store”</a>获取更多信息。</p>
</div>
<div title="11.6.6. In-Memory ColumnFamilies" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t346" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="cf.in.memory" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.6.6. 内存中的列族</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
ColumnFamilies can optionally be defined as in-memory. Data is still persisted to disk, just like any other ColumnFamily. In-memory blocks have the highest priority in the <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#block.cache" rel="nofollow" title="9.6.4. Block Cache" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.6.4,
 “Block Cache”</a>, but it is not a guarantee that the entire table will be in memory.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HColumnDescriptor.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HColumnDescriptor</a> 获取更多信息。</p>
</div>
<div title="11.6.7. Compression" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t347" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.compression" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.6.7. 压缩</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
生产系统应该采用列族压缩定义。 参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#compression" rel="nofollow" title="Appendix C. Compression In HBase" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Appendix C, <em>Compression In HBase</em></a> 获取更多信息。</p>
<div title="11.6.7.1. However..." style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t348" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.compression.however" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.6.7.1. 然而...</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Compression deflates data <em>on disk</em>. When it's in-memory (e.g., in the MemStore) or on the wire (e.g., transferring between RegionServer and Client) it's inflated. So while using ColumnFamily compression is a best practice, but it's not going to completely
 eliminate the impact of over-sized Keys, over-sized ColumnFamily names, or over-sized Column names.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#keysize" rel="nofollow" title="6.3.2. Try to minimize row and column sizes" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 6.3.2, “Try to minimize row and column sizes”</a> on for schema
 design tips, and <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#keyvalue" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.5.4. KeyValue" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5.4, “KeyValue”</a> for more information on HBase stores data internally.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div title="11.7. HBase General Patterns" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t349" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.7. HBase 通用模式</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div title="11.7.1. Constants" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t350" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.general.constants" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.7.1. 常量</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
人们刚开始使用HBase时，趋向于写如下的代码：</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">Get get = new Get(rowkey);  Result r = htable.get(get);  byte[] b = r.getValue(Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("attr"));  // returns current version of value  </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
然而，特别是在循环内(和 MapReduce 工作内), 将列族和列名转为字节数组代价昂贵。最好使用字节数组常量，如下：</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">public static final byte[] CF = "cf".getBytes();  public static final byte[] ATTR = "attr".getBytes();  ...  Get get = new Get(rowkey);  Result r = htable.get(get);  byte[] b = r.getValue(CF, ATTR);  // returns current version of value  </pre>
</div>
</div>
<div title="11.8. Writing to HBase" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px"><br>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
<div class="section" title="11.7. Writing to HBase" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t351" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.writing" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.8. 写到 HBase</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.7.1. Batch Loading" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t352" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.batch.loading" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.8.1. <span class="title" style="clear:both">批量</span>装载</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果可以的话，尽量使用批量导入工具，参见 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#arch.bulk.load" rel="nofollow" title="9.8. Bulk Loading" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.8, “批量装载”</a><a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/bulk-loads.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none"></a>.否则就要详细看看下面的内容。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.7.2.  Table Creation: Pre-Creating Regions" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t353" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="precreate.regions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.8.2. 表创建: 预创建区域(Region)</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认情况下HBase创建表会新建一个区域。执行批量导入，意味着所有的client会写入这个区域，直到这个区域足够大，以至于分裂。一个有效的提高批量导入的性能的方式，是预创建空的区域。最好稍保守一点，因为过多的区域会实实在在的降低性能。下面是一个预创建区域的例子。 (注意：这个例子里需要根据应用的key进行调整。):</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_79_6028519" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">public static boolean createTable(HBaseAdmin admin, HTableDescriptor table, byte[][] splits)
throws IOException {
  try {
    admin.createTable( table, splits );
    return true;
  } catch (TableExistsException e) {
    logger.info("table " + table.getNameAsString() + " already exists");
    // the table already exists...
    return false;  
  }
}

public static byte[][] getHexSplits(String startKey, String endKey, int numRegions) {
  byte[][] splits = new byte[numRegions-1][];
  BigInteger lowestKey = new BigInteger(startKey, 16);
  BigInteger highestKey = new BigInteger(endKey, 16);
  BigInteger range = highestKey.subtract(lowestKey);
  BigInteger regionIncrement = range.divide(BigInteger.valueOf(numRegions));
  lowestKey = lowestKey.add(regionIncrement);
  for(int i=0; i &lt; numRegions-1;i++) {
    BigInteger key = lowestKey.add(regionIncrement.multiply(BigInteger.valueOf(i)));
    byte[] b = String.format("%016x", key).getBytes();
    splits[i] = b;
  }
  return splits;
}</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.7.3.  Table Creation: Deferred Log Flush" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t354" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="def.log.flush" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.8.3.  表创建: 延迟log刷写</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Puts的缺省行为使用 Write Ahead Log (WAL)，会导致 <code class="classname">HLog</code> 编辑立即写盘。如果采用延迟刷写，WAL编辑会保留在内存中，直到刷写周期来临。好处是集中和异步写HLog，潜在问题是如果RegionServer退出，没有刷写的日志将丢失。但这也比Puts时不使用WAL安全多了。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
延迟log刷写可以通过 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HTableDescriptor.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HTableDescriptor</a> 在表上设置，<code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.optionallogflushinterval</code>缺省值是1000ms.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.7.4. HBase Client: AutoFlush" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t355" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.hbase.client.autoflush" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.8.4. HBase 客户端: 自动刷写</h3>
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t356" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a> </h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当你进行大量的Put的时候，要确认你的<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HTable</a>的setAutoFlush是关闭着的。否则的话，每执行一个Put就要想区域服务器发一个请求。通过<code class="code"> htable.add(Put)</code> 和 <code class="code">htable.add(
 &lt;List&gt; Put)</code>来将Put添加到写缓冲中。如果 <code class="code">autoFlush = false</code>，要等到写缓冲都填满的时候才会发起请求。要想显式的发起请求，可以调用<code class="methodname">flushCommits</code>。在<code class="classname">HTable</code>实例上进行的<code class="methodname">close</code>操作也会发起<code class="methodname">flushCommits</code></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.7.5. HBase Client: Turn off WAL on Puts" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t357" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.hbase.client.putwal" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.8.5. HBase 客户端: 在Puts上关闭WAL</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
一个经常讨论的在<code class="classname">Put</code>s上增加吞吐量的选项是调用 <code class="code">writeToWAL(false)</code>。关闭它意味着 RegionServer 不再将 <code class="classname">Put</code> 写到 Write Ahead Log, 仅写到内存。<strong>然而</strong>后果是如果出现 RegionServer 失败，将<em>导致数据丢失</em>。如果调用<code class="code">writeToWAL(false)</code> ，需保持高度警惕。你会发现实际上基本没有不同，如果你的负载很好的分布到集群中。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
通常而言，最好对Puts使用WAL， 而增加负载吞吐量与使用 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#perf.batch.loading" rel="nofollow" title="11.7.1. Batch Loading" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">bulk loading</a> 替代技术有关。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.7.6. HBase Client: Group Puts by RegionServer" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t358" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.hbase.client.regiongroup" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.8.6. HBase 客户端: RegionServer 成组写入</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
In addition to using the writeBuffer, grouping <code class="classname">Put</code>s by RegionServer can reduce the number of client RPC calls per writeBuffer flush. There is a utility <code class="classname">HTableUtil</code> currently on TRUNK that does this,
 but you can either copy that or implement your own verison for those still on 0.90.x or earlier.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.7.7. MapReduce: Skip The Reducer" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t359" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.hbase.write.mr.reducer" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.8.7. MapReduce: 跳过 Reducer</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
When writing a lot of data to an HBase table from a MR job (e.g., with <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/mapreduce/TableOutputFormat.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">TableOutputFormat</a>),
 and specifically where Puts are being emitted from the Mapper, skip the Reducer step. When a Reducer step is used, all of the output (Puts) from the Mapper will get spooled to disk, then sorted/shuffled to other Reducers that will most likely be off-node.
 It's far more efficient to just write directly to HBase.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For summary jobs where HBase is used as a source and a sink, then writes will be coming from the Reducer step (e.g., summarize values then write out result). This is a different processing problem than from the the above case.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.7.8. Anti-Pattern: One Hot Region" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t360" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.one.region" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.8.8. Anti-Pattern: One Hot Region</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If all your data is being written to one region at a time, then re-read the section on processing <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#timeseries" rel="nofollow" title="6.3.1.  Monotonically Increasing Row Keys/Timeseries Data" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">timeseries</a> data.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Also, if you are pre-splitting regions and all your data is <span class="emphasis"><em>still</em></span> winding up in a single region even though your keys aren't monotonically increasing, confirm that your keyspace actually works with the split strategy.
 There are a variety of reasons that regions may appear "well split" but won't work with your data. As the HBase client communicates directly with the RegionServers, this can be obtained via <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html#getRegionLocation(byte%5B%5D)" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HTable.getRegionLocation</a>.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#precreate.regions" rel="nofollow" title="11.7.2.  Table Creation: Pre-Creating Regions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 11.8.2, “ Table Creation: Pre-Creating
 Regions ”</a>, as well as <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#perf.configurations" rel="nofollow" title="11.4. HBase Configurations" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 11.4, “HBase Configurations”</a></p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.8. Reading from HBase" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t361" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.reading" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.9. 从HBase读</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.8.1. Scan Caching" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t362" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.hbase.client.caching" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.9.1. Scan 缓存</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果HBase的输入源是一个MapReduce Job，要确保输入的<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/Scan.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Scan</a>的<code class="methodname">setCaching</code>值要比默认值0要大。使用默认值就意味着map-task每一行都会去请求一下region-server。可以把这个值设为500，这样就可以一次传输500行。当然这也是需要权衡的，过大的值会同时消耗客户端和服务端很大的内存，不是越大越好。</p>
<div class="section" title="11.8.1.1. Scan Caching in MapReduce Jobs" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t363" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.hbase.client.caching.mr" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.9.1.1. Scan Caching in MapReduce Jobs</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Scan settings in MapReduce jobs deserve special attention. Timeouts can result (e.g., UnknownScannerException) in Map tasks if it takes longer to process a batch of records before the client goes back to the RegionServer for the next set of data. This problem
 can occur because there is non-trivial processing occuring per row. If you process rows quickly, set caching higher. If you process rows more slowly (e.g., lots of transformations per row, writes), then set caching lower.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Timeouts can also happen in a non-MapReduce use case (i.e., single threaded HBase client doing a Scan), but the processing that is often performed in MapReduce jobs tends to exacerbate this issue.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.8.2. Scan Attribute Selection" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t364" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.hbase.client.selection" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.9.2. Scan 属性选择</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当Scan用来处理大量的行的时候(尤其是作为MapReduce的输入)，要注意的是选择了什么字段。如果调用了 <code class="code">scan.addFamily</code>，这个列族的所有属性都会返回。如果只是想过滤其中的一小部分，就指定那几个column，否则就会造成很大浪费，影响性能。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.8.3. MapReduce - Input Splits" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t365" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.hbase.mr.input" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.9.3. MapReduce - 输入分割</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For MapReduce jobs that use HBase tables as a source, if there a pattern where the "slow" map tasks seem to have the same Input Split (i.e., the RegionServer serving the data), see the Troubleshooting Case Study in <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#casestudies.slownode" rel="nofollow" title="13.3.1. Case Study #1 (Performance Issue On A Single Node)" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 13.3.1,
 “Case Study #1 (Performance Issue On A Single Node)”</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.8.4. Close ResultScanners" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t366" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.hbase.client.scannerclose" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.9.4. 关闭 ResultScanners</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这与其说是提高性能，倒不如说是避免发生性能问题。如果你忘记了关闭<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/ResultScanner.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">ResultScanners</a>，会导致RegionServer出现问题。所以一定要把ResultScanner包含在try/catch
 块中...</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_80_5769289" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">Scan scan = new Scan();
// set attrs...
ResultScanner rs = htable.getScanner(scan);
try {
  for (Result r = rs.next(); r != null; r = rs.next()) {
  // process result...
} finally {
  rs.close();  // always close the ResultScanner!
}
htable.close();</pre></div>
<div class="section" title="11.8.5. Block Cache" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t367" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.hbase.client.blockcache" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.9.5. 块缓存</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/Scan.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Scan</a>实例可以在RegionServer中使用块缓存，可以由<code class="methodname">setCacheBlocks</code>方法控制。如果Scan是MapReduce的输入源，要将这个值设置为 <code class="varname">false</code>。对于经常读到的行，就建议使用块缓冲。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.8.6. Optimal Loading of Row Keys" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t368" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.hbase.client.rowkeyonly" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.9.6.  行键的负载优化</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/Scan.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">scan</a>一个表的时候， 如果仅仅需要行键（不需要no families, qualifiers, values 和 timestamps）,在加入FilterList的时候，要使用Scanner的<code class="methodname">setFilter</code>方法的时候，要填上<code class="varname">MUST_PASS_ALL</code>操作参数(译者注：相当于And操作符)。一个FilterList要包含一个 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/FirstKeyOnlyFilter.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">FirstKeyOnlyFilter</a> 和一个 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/KeyOnlyFilter.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">KeyOnlyFilter</a>.通过这样的filter组合，就算在最坏的情况下，RegionServer只会从磁盘读一个值，同时最小化客户端的网络带宽占用。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="11.8.7. Concurrency: Monitor Data Spread" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t369" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.hbase.read.dist" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.9.7. 并发: 监测数据扩散</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当优化大量读取时，监测数据扩散到目标表。如果目标表含区域太少，读取时感觉像只有很少节点提供服务一样。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#precreate.regions" rel="nofollow" title="11.7.2.  Table Creation: Pre-Creating Regions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 11.9.2, “ Table Creation: Pre-Creating
 Regions ”</a>, 及 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#perf.configurations" rel="nofollow" title="11.4. HBase Configurations" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 11.4, “HBase Configurations”</a></p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t370" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.9.8. 布隆过滤(Bloom Filters)</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
启用布隆过滤可以节省必须读磁盘过程，可以有助于改进读取延迟。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bloom_filter" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Bloom filters</a> 在 <a target="_blank" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-1200" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBase-1200
 Add bloomfilters</a>中开发。[<a target="_blank" name="d352e7127" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d352e7127" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">28</a>][<a target="_blank" name="d352e7139" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d352e7139" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">29</a>]</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#schema.bloom" rel="nofollow" title="11.6.4. Bloom Filters" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 11.6.4, “布隆过滤(Bloom Filters)”</a>.</p>
<div title="11.8.8.1. Bloom StoreFile footprint" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t371" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="bloom_footprint" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.9.8.1. Bloom StoreFile footprint</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Bloom filters add an entry to the StoreFile general FileInfo data structure and then two extra entries to the StoreFilemetadata section.</p>
<div title="11.8.8.1.1. BloomFilter in the StoreFile FileInfo data structure" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t372" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d352e7163" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.9.8.1.1. BloomFilter in the StoreFile FileInfo data structure</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
FileInfo has a BLOOM_FILTER_TYPE entry which is set to NONE, ROW or ROWCOL.</p>
</div>
<div title="11.8.8.1.2. BloomFilter entries in StoreFile metadata" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t373" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d352e7187" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.9.8.1.2. BloomFilter entries in StoreFile metadata</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
BLOOM_FILTER_META holds Bloom Size, Hash Function used, etc. Its small in size and is cached on StoreFile.Reader load</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
BLOOM_FILTER_DATA is the actual bloomfilter data. Obtained on-demand. Stored in the LRU cache, if it is enabled (Its enabled by default).</p>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
<div class="section" title="3.5. 必须的配置" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t374" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="config.bloom" id="config.bloom" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.9.8.2. 布隆过滤(Bloom Filter) 配置</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div title="2.9.1. io.hfile.bloom.enabled global kill switch" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t375" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e2830" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.9.8.2.1. io.hfile.bloom.enabled 全局杀死开关</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
配置文件的io.hfile.bloom.enabled 是一个当出错时的杀死开关。Default = true.</p>
</div>
<div title="2.9.2. io.hfile.bloom.error.rate" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t376" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e2845" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.9.8.2.2. io.hfile.bloom.error.rate</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
io.hfile.bloom.error.rate = 平均误报率( average false positive rate ). 缺省 = 1%. 降低率为 ½ (如 .5%) == +1 位每布隆入口。</p>
</div>
<div title="2.9.3. io.hfile.bloom.max.fold" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t377" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e2853" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.9.8.2.3. io.hfile.bloom.max.fold</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
io.hfile.bloom.max.fold = 保证最小折叠速率(guaranteed minimum fold rate). 大多时候不要管. Default = 7, 或压缩到原来大小的至少 1/128. 想获取更多本选项的意义，参看本文档 <em>开发进程</em> 节 <a target="_blank" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12444007/Bloom_Filters_in_HBase.pdf" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">BloomFilters
 in HBase</a> </p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="3.6. 推荐的配置" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div class="footnote" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
</div>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t378" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.deleting" id="perf.deleting" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.10. 从HBase删除</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div title="11.9.1. Using HBase Tables as Queues" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t379" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.deleting.queue" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.10.1. 将 HBase 表当 Queues用</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase tables are sometimes used as queues. In this case, special care must be taken to regularly perform major compactions on tables used in this manner. As is documented in <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#datamodel" rel="nofollow" title="Chapter 5. Data Model" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Chapter 5, <em>Data
 Model</em></a>, marking rows as deleted creates additional StoreFiles which then need to be processed on reads. Tombstones only get cleaned up with major compactions.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考  <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#compaction" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.5.5. Compaction" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5.5, “Compaction”</a> 和 <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HBaseAdmin.html#majorCompact(java.lang.String)" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBaseAdmin.majorCompact</a>.</p>
</div>
<div title="11.9.2. Delete RPC Behavior" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t380" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.deleting.rpc" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.10.2. 删除的 RPC 行为</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Be aware that htable.delete(Delete) doesn't use the writeBuffer. It will execute an RegionServer RPC with each invocation. For a large number of deletes, consider htable.delete(List).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html#delete%28org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Delete%29" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html#delete%28org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Delete%29</a></p>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t381" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.hdfs" id="perf.hdfs" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.11. HDFS</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
由于 HBase 在 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#arch.hdfs" rel="nofollow" title="9.9. HDFS" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.9, “HDFS”</a> 上运行，it is important to understand how it works and how it affects HBase.</p>
<div title="11.10.1. Current Issues With Low-Latency Reads" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t382" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.hdfs.curr" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.11.1. Current Issues With Low-Latency Reads</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The original use-case for HDFS was batch processing. As such, there low-latency reads were historically not a priority. With the increased adoption of HBase this is changing, and several improvements are already in development. 参考 the <a target="_blank" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDFS-1599" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Umbrella
 Jira Ticket for HDFS Improvements for HBase</a>.</p>
</div>
<div title="11.10.2. Performance Comparisons of HBase vs. HDFS" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div title="11.10.2. Leveraging local data" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t383" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><br>
11.11.2. Leveraging local data</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Since Hadoop 1.0.0 (also 0.22.1, 0.23.1, CDH3u3 and HDP 1.0) via <a target="_blank" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDFS-2246" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HDFS-2246</a>, it is possible for the DFSClient to
 take a "short circuit" and read directly from disk instead of going through the DataNode when the data is local. What this means for HBase is that the RegionServers can read directly off their machine's disks instead of having to open a socket to talk to the
 DataNode, the former being generally much faster[<a target="_blank" name="d352e7302" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d352e7302" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">30</a>]. Also see <a target="_blank" href="http://search-hadoop.com/m/zV6dKrLCVh1" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBase,
 mail # dev - read short circuit</a> thread for more discussion around short circuit reads.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
To enable "short circuit" reads, you must set two configurations. First, the hdfs-site.xml needs to be amended. Set the property dfs.block.local-path-access.user to be the <em>only</em> user that can use the shortcut. This has to be the user that started HBase.
 Then in hbase-site.xml, set dfs.client.read.shortcircuit to be true</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For optimal performance when short-circuit reads are enabled, it is recommended that HDFS checksums are disabled. To maintain data integrity with HDFS checksums disabled, HBase can be configured to write its own checksums into its datablocks and verify against
 these. See <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hbase.regionserver.checksum.verify" rel="nofollow" title="11.4.9. hbase.regionserver.checksum.verify" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 11.4.9, “hbase.regionserver.checksum.verify”</a>.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The DataNodes need to be restarted in order to pick up the new configuration. Be aware that if a process started under another username than the one configured here also has the shortcircuit enabled, it will get an Exception regarding an unauthorized access
 but the data will still be read.</p>
</div>
<div title="11.10.3. Performance Comparisons of HBase vs. HDFS" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t384" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.hdfs.comp" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.11.3. Performance Comparisons of HBase vs. HDFS</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A fairly common question on the dist-list is why HBase isn't as performant as HDFS files in a batch context (e.g., as a MapReduce source or sink). The short answer is that HBase is doing a lot more than HDFS (e.g., reading the KeyValues, returning the most
 current row or specified timestamps, etc.), and as such HBase is 4-5 times slower than HDFS in this processing context. Not that there isn't room for improvement (and this gap will, over time, be reduced), but HDFS will always be faster in this use-case.</p>
</div>
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t385" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a> </h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t386" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.ec2" id="perf.ec2" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.12. Amazon EC2</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Performance questions are common on Amazon EC2 environments because it is a shared environment. You will not see the same throughput as a dedicated server. In terms of running tests on EC2, run them several times for the same reason (i.e., it's a shared environment
 and you don't know what else is happening on the server).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If you are running on EC2 and post performance questions on the dist-list, please state this fact up-front that because EC2 issues are practically a separate class of performance issues.</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t387" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="perf.casestudy" id="perf.casestudy" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>11.13. Case Studies</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For Performance and Troubleshooting Case Studies, see <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#casestudies" rel="nofollow" title="Chapter 13. Case Studies" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Chapter 13, <em>Case Studies</em></a>.</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
[<a target="_blank" id="ftn.d352e6660" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d352e6660" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">27</a>] The latest jvms do better regards fragmentation so make sure you are running a recent release.
 Read down in the message,<a target="_blank" href="http://osdir.com/ml/hotspot-gc-use/2011-11/msg00002.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Identifying concurrent mode failures caused by fragmentation</a>.</p>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
[<a target="_blank" id="ftn.d352e7127" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d352e7127" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">28</a>] For description of the development process -- why static blooms rather than dynamic -- and for
 an overview of the unique properties that pertain to blooms in HBase, as well as possible future directions, see the <em>Development Process</em> section of the document <a target="_blank" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12444007/Bloom_Filters_in_HBase.pdf" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">BloomFilters
 in HBase</a> attached to <a target="_blank" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-1200" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBase-1200</a>.</p>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
[<a target="_blank" id="ftn.d352e7139" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d352e7139" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">29</a>] The bloom filters described here are actually version two of blooms in HBase. In versions up
 to 0.19.x, HBase had a dynamic bloom option based on work done by the <a target="_blank" href="http://www.one-lab.org/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">European Commission One-Lab Project 034819</a>. The core of the HBase
 bloom work was later pulled up into Hadoop to implement org.apache.hadoop.io.BloomMapFile. Version 1 of HBase blooms never worked that well. Version 2 is a rewrite from scratch though again it starts with the one-lab work.</p>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
[<a target="_blank" id="ftn.d352e7302" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d352e7302" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">30</a>] See JD's <a target="_blank" href="http://files.meetup.com/1350427/hug_ebay_jdcryans.pdf" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Performance
 Talk</a></p>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>

<div class="section" title="15.1. 一般准则" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t389" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.general" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.1. 一般准则</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
总是先从主服务器的日志开始(TODO: 哪些行?)。通常情况下，他总是一行一行的重复信息。如果不是这样，说明有问题，可以Google或是用<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://search-hadoop.com/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">search-hadoop.com</a>来搜索遇到的异常。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
错误很少仅仅单独出现在HBase中，通常是某一个地方出了问题，引起各处大量异常和调用栈跟踪信息。遇到这样的错误，最好的办法是往上查日志，找到最初的异常。例如区域服务器会在退出的时候打印一些度量信息。Grep这个<span class="emphasis"><em>转储</em></span> 应该可以找到最初的异常信息。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
区域服务器的自杀是很“正常”的。当一些事情发生错误的，他们就会自杀。如果ulimit和xcievers(最重要的两个设定，详见<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ulimit" rel="nofollow" title="1.3.1.6.  ulimit 和 nproc" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 2.2.5,
 “ <code class="varname">ulimit</code> 和 <code class="varname">nproc</code> ”</a>)没有修改，HDFS将无法运转正常，在HBase看来，HDFS死掉了。假想一下，你的MySQL突然无法访问它的文件系统，他会怎么做。同样的事情会发生在HBase和HDFS上。还有一个造成区域服务器切腹自杀的常见的原因是，他们执行了一个长时间的GC操作，这个时间超过了ZooKeeper的会话时长。关于GC停顿的详细信息，参见Todd Lipcon的 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://www.cloudera.com/blog/2011/02/avoiding-full-gcs-in-hbase-with-memstore-local-allocation-buffers-part-1/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">3
 part blog post</a> by Todd Lipcon 和上面的 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#gcpause" rel="nofollow" title="13.1.1.1. 长时间GC停顿" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 11.3.1.1, “长时间GC停顿”</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.2. Logs" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t390" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.log" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.2. Logs</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
重要日志的位置( &lt;user&gt;是启动服务的用户，&lt;hostname&gt; 是机器的名字)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
NameNode: <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$HADOOP_HOME/logs/hadoop-&lt;user&gt;-namenode-&lt;hostname&gt;.log</code></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
DataNode: <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$HADOOP_HOME/logs/hadoop-&lt;user&gt;-datanode-&lt;hostname&gt;.log</code></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
JobTracker: <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$HADOOP_HOME/logs/hadoop-&lt;user&gt;-jobtracker-&lt;hostname&gt;.log</code></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
TaskTracker: <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$HADOOP_HOME/logs/hadoop-&lt;user&gt;-jobtracker-&lt;hostname&gt;.log</code></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HMaster: <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$HBASE_HOME/logs/hbase-&lt;user&gt;-master-&lt;hostname&gt;.log</code></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
RegionServer: <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$HBASE_HOME/logs/hbase-&lt;user&gt;-regionserver-&lt;hostname&gt;.log</code></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
ZooKeeper: <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">TODO</code></p>
<div class="section" title="15.2.1. Log 位置" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t391" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.log.locations" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.2.1. Log 位置</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
对于单节点模式，Log都会在一台机器上，但是对于生产环境，都会运行在一个集群上。</p>
<div class="section" title="15.2.1.1. NameNode" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t392" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.log.locations.namenode" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.2.1.1. NameNode</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
NameNode的日志在NameNode server上。HBase Master 通常也运行在NameNode server上，ZooKeeper通常也是这样。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
对于小一点的机器，JobTracker也通常运行在NameNode server上面。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.2.1.2. DataNode" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t393" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.log.locations.datanode" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.2.1.2. DataNode</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
每一台DataNode server有一个HDFS的日志，Region有一个HBase日志。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
每个DataNode server还有一份TaskTracker的日志，来记录MapReduce的Task信息。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.2.2. Log Levels" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t394" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.log.levels" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.2.2. 日志级别</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.2.2.1. Enabling RPC-level logging" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t395" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="rpc.logging" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.2.2.1. 启用 RPC级别日志</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Enabling the RPC-level logging on a RegionServer can often given insight on timings at the server. Once enabled, the amount of log spewed is voluminous. It is not recommended that you leave this logging on for more than short bursts of time. To enable RPC-level
 logging, browse to the RegionServer UI and click on <span class="emphasis"><em>Log Level</em></span>. Set the log level to <code class="varname">DEBUG</code> for the package <code class="classname">org.apache.hadoop.ipc</code>(Thats right, for <code class="classname">hadoop.ipc</code>,
 NOT, <code class="classname">hbase.ipc</code>). Then tail the RegionServers log. Analyze.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
To disable, set the logging level back to <code class="varname">INFO</code> level.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.2.3. JVM Garbage Collection Logs" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t396" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.log.gc" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.2.3. JVM 垃圾收集日志</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase is memory intensive, and using the default GC you can see long pauses in all threads including the <span class="emphasis"><em>Juliet Pause</em></span> aka "GC of Death". To help debug this or confirm this is happening GC logging can be turned on in the
 Java virtual machine.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
To enable, in <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-env.sh</code> add:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_81_2544456" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);"> 
export HBASE_OPTS="-XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -verbose:gc -XX:+PrintGCDetails -XX:+PrintGCTimeStamps -Xloggc:/home/hadoop/hbase/logs/gc-hbase.log"
          </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Adjust the log directory to wherever you log. Note: The GC log does NOT roll automatically, so you'll have to keep an eye on it so it doesn't fill up the disk.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
At this point you should see logs like so:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_82_4477837" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">64898.952: [GC [1 CMS-initial-mark: 2811538K(3055704K)] 2812179K(3061272K), 0.0007360 secs] [Times: user=0.00 sys=0.00, real=0.00 secs] 
64898.953: [CMS-concurrent-mark-start]
64898.971: [GC 64898.971: [ParNew: 5567K-&gt;576K(5568K), 0.0101110 secs] 2817105K-&gt;2812715K(3061272K), 0.0102200 secs] [Times: user=0.07 sys=0.00, real=0.01 secs] 
          </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
In this section, the first line indicates a 0.0007360 second pause for the CMS to initially mark. This pauses the entire VM, all threads for that period of time.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The third line indicates a "minor GC", which pauses the VM for 0.0101110 seconds - aka 10 milliseconds. It has reduced the "ParNew" from about 5.5m to 576k. Later on in this cycle we see:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_83_4284646" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);"> 
64901.445: [CMS-concurrent-mark: 1.542/2.492 secs] [Times: user=10.49 sys=0.33, real=2.49 secs] 
64901.445: [CMS-concurrent-preclean-start]
64901.453: [GC 64901.453: [ParNew: 5505K-&gt;573K(5568K), 0.0062440 secs] 2868746K-&gt;2864292K(3061272K), 0.0063360 secs] [Times: user=0.05 sys=0.00, real=0.01 secs] 
64901.476: [GC 64901.476: [ParNew: 5563K-&gt;575K(5568K), 0.0072510 secs] 2869283K-&gt;2864837K(3061272K), 0.0073320 secs] [Times: user=0.05 sys=0.01, real=0.01 secs] 
64901.500: [GC 64901.500: [ParNew: 5517K-&gt;573K(5568K), 0.0120390 secs] 2869780K-&gt;2865267K(3061272K), 0.0121150 secs] [Times: user=0.09 sys=0.00, real=0.01 secs] 
64901.529: [GC 64901.529: [ParNew: 5507K-&gt;569K(5568K), 0.0086240 secs] 2870200K-&gt;2865742K(3061272K), 0.0087180 secs] [Times: user=0.05 sys=0.00, real=0.01 secs] 
64901.554: [GC 64901.555: [ParNew: 5516K-&gt;575K(5568K), 0.0107130 secs] 2870689K-&gt;2866291K(3061272K), 0.0107820 secs] [Times: user=0.06 sys=0.00, real=0.01 secs] 
64901.578: [CMS-concurrent-preclean: 0.070/0.133 secs] [Times: user=0.48 sys=0.01, real=0.14 secs] 
64901.578: [CMS-concurrent-abortable-preclean-start]
64901.584: [GC 64901.584: [ParNew: 5504K-&gt;571K(5568K), 0.0087270 secs] 2871220K-&gt;2866830K(3061272K), 0.0088220 secs] [Times: user=0.05 sys=0.00, real=0.01 secs] 
64901.609: [GC 64901.609: [ParNew: 5512K-&gt;569K(5568K), 0.0063370 secs] 2871771K-&gt;2867322K(3061272K), 0.0064230 secs] [Times: user=0.06 sys=0.00, real=0.01 secs] 
64901.615: [CMS-concurrent-abortable-preclean: 0.007/0.037 secs] [Times: user=0.13 sys=0.00, real=0.03 secs] 
64901.616: [GC[YG occupancy: 645 K (5568 K)]64901.616: [Rescan (parallel) , 0.0020210 secs]64901.618: [weak refs processing, 0.0027950 secs] [1 CMS-remark: 2866753K(3055704K)] 2867399K(3061272K), 0.0049380 secs] [Times: user=0.00 sys=0.01, real=0.01 secs] 
64901.621: [CMS-concurrent-sweep-start]
            </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The first line indicates that the CMS concurrent mark (finding garbage) has taken 2.4 seconds. But this is a _concurrent_ 2.4 seconds, Java has not been paused at any point in time.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
There are a few more minor GCs, then there is a pause at the 2nd last line:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_84_6010283" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">  
64901.616: [GC[YG occupancy: 645 K (5568 K)]64901.616: [Rescan (parallel) , 0.0020210 secs]64901.618: [weak refs processing, 0.0027950 secs] [1 CMS-remark: 2866753K(3055704K)] 2867399K(3061272K), 0.0049380 secs] [Times: user=0.00 sys=0.01, real=0.01 secs] 
            </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The pause here is 0.0049380 seconds (aka 4.9 milliseconds) to 'remark' the heap.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
At this point the sweep starts, and you can watch the heap size go down:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_85_4912021" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">64901.637: [GC 64901.637: [ParNew: 5501K-&gt;569K(5568K), 0.0097350 secs] 2871958K-&gt;2867441K(3061272K), 0.0098370 secs] [Times: user=0.05 sys=0.00, real=0.01 secs] 
...  lines removed ...
64904.936: [GC 64904.936: [ParNew: 5532K-&gt;568K(5568K), 0.0070720 secs] 1365024K-&gt;1360689K(3061272K), 0.0071930 secs] [Times: user=0.05 sys=0.00, real=0.01 secs] 
64904.953: [CMS-concurrent-sweep: 2.030/3.332 secs] [Times: user=9.57 sys=0.26, real=3.33 secs] 
            </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
At this point, the CMS sweep took 3.332 seconds, and heap went from about ~ 2.8 GB to 1.3 GB (approximate).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The key points here is to keep all these pauses low. CMS pauses are always low, but if your ParNew starts growing, you can see minor GC pauses approach 100ms, exceed 100ms and hit as high at 400ms.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
This can be due to the size of the ParNew, which should be relatively small. If your ParNew is very large after running HBase for a while, in one example a ParNew was about 150MB, then you might have to constrain the size of ParNew (The larger it is, the longer
 the collections take but if its too small, objects are promoted to old gen too quickly). In the below we constrain new gen size to 64m.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Add this to HBASE_OPTS:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_86_2210576" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);"> 
export HBASE_OPTS="-XX:NewSize=64m -XX:MaxNewSize=64m &lt;cms options from above&gt; &lt;gc logging options from above&gt;"
            </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For more information on GC pauses, see the <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://www.cloudera.com/blog/2011/02/avoiding-full-gcs-in-hbase-with-memstore-local-allocation-buffers-part-1/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">3
 part blog post</a> by Todd Lipcon and <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#gcpause" rel="nofollow" title="11.3.1.1. Long GC pauses" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 11.3.1.1, “Long GC pauses”</a> above.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.3. 工具" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t397" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.resources" id="trouble.resources" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.3. 资源</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div title="12.3.1. search-hadoop.com" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t398" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.resources.searchhadoop" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.3.1. search-hadoop.com</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" href="http://search-hadoop.com/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">search-hadoop.com</a> 索引了全部邮件列表，很适合做历史检索。有问题时先在这里查询，因为别人可能已经遇到过你的问题。</p>
</div>
<div title="12.3.2. Mailing Lists" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t399" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.resources.lists" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.3.2. 邮件列表</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Ask a question on the <a target="_blank" href="http://hbase.apache.org/mail-lists.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBase mailing lists</a>. The 'dev' mailing list is aimed at the community of developers actually building
 HBase and for features currently under development, and 'user' is generally used for questions on released versions of HBase. Before going to the mailing list, make sure your question has not already been answered by searching the mailing list archives first.
 Use <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#trouble.resources.searchhadoop" rel="nofollow" title="12.3.1. search-hadoop.com" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 12.3.1, “search-hadoop.com”</a>. Take some time crafting
 your question[<a target="_blank" name="d352e7542" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d352e7542" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">31</a>]; a quality question that includes all context and exhibits evidence the author
 has tried to find answers in the manual and out on lists is more likely to get a prompt response.</p>
</div>
<div title="12.3.3. IRC" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">

<a target="_blank" name="t400" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.resources.irc" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.3.3. IRC</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
#hbase on irc.freenode.net</p>
</div>
<div title="12.3.4. JIRA" style="margin:0px">
