<a target="_blank" name="t401" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.resources.jira" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.3.4. JIRA</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">JIRA</a> 在处理 Hadoop/HBase相关问题时也很有帮助。</p>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px"><br>
<div style="margin:0px"></div>
</div>
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t402" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.tools" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.4. 工具</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.3.1. search-hadoop.com" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t403" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.4.1. 内置工具</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div title="12.4.1.1. Master Web Interface" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t404" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.tools.builtin.webmaster" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.4.1.1. 主服务器Web接口</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
主服务器启动了一个缺省端口是 60010的web接口。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The Master web UI lists created tables and their definition (e.g., ColumnFamilies, blocksize, etc.). Additionally, the available RegionServers in the cluster are listed along with selected high-level metrics (requests, number of regions, usedHeap, maxHeap).
 The Master web UI allows navigation to each RegionServer's web UI.</p>
</div>
<div title="12.4.1.2. RegionServer Web Interface" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t405" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.tools.builtin.webregion" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.4.1.2. 区域服务器Web接口</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
区域服务器启动了一个缺省端口是 60030的web接口。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The RegionServer web UI lists online regions and their start/end keys, as well as point-in-time RegionServer metrics (requests, regions, storeFileIndexSize, compactionQueueSize, etc.).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hbase_metrics" rel="nofollow" title="14.4. HBase Metrics" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 14.4, “HBase Metrics”</a> 获取更多度量信息。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.4.1.3. zkcli" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t406" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.tools.builtin.zkcli" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.4.1.3. zkcli</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">zkcli</code>是一个研究 ZooKeeper相关问题的有用工具。调用：</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_87_2540773" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">./hbase zkcli -server host:port &lt;cmd&gt; &lt;args&gt;
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
命令 (和参数) ：</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_88_8410868" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">	connect host:port
	get path [watch]
	ls path [watch]
	set path data [version]
	delquota [-n|-b] path
	quit 
	printwatches on|off
	create [-s] [-e] path data acl
	stat path [watch]
	close 
	ls2 path [watch]
	history 
	listquota path
	setAcl path acl
	getAcl path
	sync path
	redo cmdno
	addauth scheme auth
	delete path [version]
	setquota -n|-b val path
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t407" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.4.2. 外部工具</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.3.2. tail" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t408" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.tools.tail" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.4.2.1 tail</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">tail</code>是一个命令行工具，可以用来看日志的尾巴。加入的"-f"参数后，就会在数据更新的时候自己刷新。用它来看日志很方便。例如，一个机器需要花很多时间来启动或关闭，你可以tail他的master log(也可以是region server的log)。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.3.3. top" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t409" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.tools.top" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.4.2.2 top</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">top</code>是一个很重要的工具来看你的机器各个进程的资源占用情况。下面是一个生产环境的例子：</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_89_9580097" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">top - 14:46:59 up 39 days, 11:55,  1 user,  load average: 3.75, 3.57, 3.84
Tasks: 309 total,   1 running, 308 sleeping,   0 stopped,   0 zombie
Cpu(s):  4.5%us,  1.6%sy,  0.0%ni, 91.7%id,  1.4%wa,  0.1%hi,  0.6%si,  0.0%st
Mem:  24414432k total, 24296956k used,   117476k free,     7196k buffers
Swap: 16008732k total,	14348k used, 15994384k free, 11106908k cached
 
  PID USER  	PR  NI  VIRT  RES  SHR S %CPU %MEM	TIME+  COMMAND                                                                                                                                                                      
15558 hadoop	18  -2 3292m 2.4g 3556 S   79 10.4   6523:52 java                                                                                                                                                                          
13268 hadoop	18  -2 8967m 8.2g 4104 S   21 35.1   5170:30 java                                                                                                                                                                          
 8895 hadoop	18  -2 1581m 497m 3420 S   11  2.1   4002:32 java
…
                     </pre>这里你可以看到系统的load average在最近5分钟是3.75，意思就是说这5分钟里面平均有3.75个线程在CPU时间的等待队列里面。通常来说，最完美的情况是这个值和CPU和核数相等，比这个值低意味着资源闲置，比这个值高就是过载了。这是一个重要的概念，要想理解的更多，可以看这篇文章 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://www.linuxjournal.com/article/9001" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">http://www.linuxjournal.com/article/9001</a>.
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
处理负载，我们可以看到系统已经几乎使用了他的全部RAM，其中大部分都是用于OS cache(这是一件好事).Swap只使用了一点点KB,这正是我们期望的，如果数值很高的话，就意味着在进行交换，这对Java程序的性能是致命的。另一种检测交换的方法是看Load average是否过高(load average过高还可能是磁盘损坏或者其它什么原因导致的)。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
默认情况下进程列表不是很有用，我们可以看到3个Java进程使用了111%的CPU。要想知道哪个进程是什么，可以输入"c"，每一行就会扩展信息。输入“1”可以显示CPU的每个核的具体状况。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.3.4. jps" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t410" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.tools.jps" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.4.2.3  jps</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">jps</code>是JDK集成的一个工具，可以用来看当前用户的Java进程id。(如果是root,可以看到所有用户的id)，例如:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_90_4021733" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">hadoop@sv4borg12:~$ jps
1322 TaskTracker
17789 HRegionServer
27862 Child
1158 DataNode
25115 HQuorumPeer
2950 Jps
19750 ThriftServer
18776 jmx
                     </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
按顺序看</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">Hadoop TaskTracker,管理本地的Task</li><li class="listitem">HBase RegionServer,提供region的服务</li><li class="listitem">Child, 一个 MapReduce task,无法看出详细类型</li><li class="listitem">Hadoop DataNode, 管理blocks</li><li class="listitem">HQuorumPeer, ZooKeeper集群的成员</li><li class="listitem">Jps, 就是这个进程</li><li class="listitem">ThriftServer, 当thrif启动后，就会有这个进程</li><li class="listitem">jmx, 这个是本地监控平台的进程。你可以不用这个。</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
你可以看到这个进程启动是全部命令行信息。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_91_1353308" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">hadoop@sv4borg12:~$ ps aux | grep HRegionServer
hadoop   17789  155 35.2 9067824 8604364 ?     S&lt;l  Mar04 9855:48 /usr/java/jdk1.6.0_14/bin/java -Xmx8000m -XX:+DoEscapeAnalysis -XX:+AggressiveOpts -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:NewSize=64m -XX:MaxNewSize=64m -XX:CMSInitiatingOccupancyFraction=88 -verbose:gc -XX:+PrintGCDetails -XX:+PrintGCTimeStamps -Xloggc:/export1/hadoop/logs/gc-hbase.log -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.port=10102 -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.authenticate=true -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.ssl=false -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.password.file=/home/hadoop/hbase/conf/jmxremote.password -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote -Dhbase.log.dir=/export1/hadoop/logs -Dhbase.log.file=hbase-hadoop-regionserver-sv4borg12.log -Dhbase.home.dir=/home/hadoop/hbase -Dhbase.id.str=hadoop -Dhbase.root.logger=INFO,DRFA -Djava.library.path=/home/hadoop/hbase/lib/native/Linux-amd64-64 -classpath /home/hadoop/hbase/bin/../conf:[many jars]:/home/hadoop/hadoop/conf org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.HRegionServer start
                     </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.3.5. jstack" style="margin:0px">

<div style="margin:0px">

</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">jstack</code> 是一个最重要(除了看Log)的java工具，可以看到具体的Java进程的在做什么。可以先用Jps看到进程的Id,然后就可以用jstack。他会按线程的创建顺序显示线程的列表，还有这个线程在做什么。下面是例子：</p>

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这里是一个RegionServer死了，master正在试着恢复。</p>

<div class="section" title="15.3.6. OpenTSDB" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t412" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.tools.opentsdb" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.4.2.5  OpenTSDB</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://opentsdb.net/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">OpenTSDB</a>是一个Ganglia的很好的替代品，因为他使用HBase来存储所有的时序而不需要采样。使用OpenTSDB来监控你的HBase是一个很好的实践</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这里有一个例子，集群正在同时进行上百个紧缩，严重影响了IO性能。(TODO: 在这里插入compactionQueueSize的图片)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
给集群构建一个图表监控是一个很好的实践。包括集群和每台机器。这样就可以快速定位到问题。例如，在StumbleUpon，每个机器有一个图表监控，包括OS和HBase，涵盖所有的重要的信息。你也可以登录到机器上，获取更多的信息。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.3.7. clusterssh+top" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t413" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.tools.clustersshtop" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.4.2.6  clusterssh+top</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
clusterssh+top,感觉是一个穷人用的监控系统，但是他确实很有效，当你只有几台机器的是，很好设置。启动clusterssh后，你就会每台机器有个终端，还有一个终端，你在这个终端的操作都会反应到其他的每一个终端上。 这就意味着，你在一天机器执行“top”,集群中的所有机器都会给你全部的top信息。你还可以这样tail全部的log，等等。</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.5. Client" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t414" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.client" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.5. 客户端</h2>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; clear:both">
 </p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase 客户端的更多信息， 参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#client" rel="nofollow" title="9.3. Client" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.3, “Client”</a>.</p>
<div class="section" title="12.5.1. ScannerTimeoutException or UnknownScannerException" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t415" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.client.scantimeout" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.5.1. ScannerTimeoutException 或 UnknownScannerException</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当从客户端到RegionServer的RPC请求超时。例如如果Scan.setCacheing的值设置为500，RPC请求就要去获取500行的数据，每500次<code class="code">.next()</code>操作获取一次。因为数据是以大块的形式传到客户端的，就可能造成超时。将这个 serCacheing的值调小是一个解决办法，但是这个值要是设的太小就会影响性能。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#perf.hbase.client.caching" rel="nofollow" title="11.8.1. Scan Caching" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 11.10.1, “Scan Caching”</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.5.2. Shell or client application throws lots of scary exceptions during normal operation" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t416" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.client.scarylogs" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.5.2. 普通操作时，Shell 或客户端应用抛出很多不太重要的异常</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Since 0.20.0 the default log level for <code class="code">org.apache.hadoop.hbase.*</code>is DEBUG.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
On your clients, edit <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$HBASE_HOME/conf/log4j.properties</code> and change this: <code class="code">log4j.logger.org.apache.hadoop.hbase=DEBUG</code> to this: <code class="code">log4j.logger.org.apache.hadoop.hbase=INFO</code>,
 or even <code class="code">log4j.logger.org.apache.hadoop.hbase=WARN</code>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.5.3. Long Client Pauses With Compression" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t417" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.client.longpauseswithcompression" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.5.3. 压缩时客户端长时暂停</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这是一个在HBase区列表中经常被问的问题。场景一般是客户端正在插入大量数据到相对未优化的HBase集群中时发生。压缩正好加重暂停，尽管这不是问题源头。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#precreate.regions" rel="nofollow" title="11.7.2.  Table Creation: Pre-Creating Regions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 11.10.2, “ Table Creation: Pre-Creating
 Regions ”</a> ，关于预先创建区域的模式部分，并确认表没有在单个区域中启动。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#perf.configurations" rel="nofollow" title="11.4. HBase Configurations" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 11.4, “HBase Configurations”</a> 获取集群配置相关信息, 特别是 <code class="code">hbase.hstore.blockingStoreFiles</code>, <code class="code">hbase.hregion.memstore.block.multiplier</code>, <code class="code">MAX_FILESIZE</code> (region
 size), 和 <code class="code">MEMSTORE_FLUSHSIZE.</code></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A slightly longer explanation of why pauses can happen is as follows: Puts are sometimes blocked on the MemStores which are blocked by the flusher thread which is blocked because there are too many files to compact because the compactor is given too many small
 files to compact and has to compact the same data repeatedly. This situation can occur even with minor compactions. Compounding this situation, HBase doesn't compress data in memory. Thus, the 64MB that lives in the MemStore could become a 6MB file after compression
 - which results in a smaller StoreFile. The upside is that more data is packed into the same region, but performance is achieved by being able to write larger files - which is why HBase waits until the flushize before writing a new StoreFile. And smaller StoreFiles
 become targets for compaction. Without compression the files are much bigger and don't need as much compaction, however this is at the expense of I/O.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For additional information, see this thread on <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://search-hadoop.com/m/WUnLM6ojHm1/Long+client+pauses+with+compression&amp;subj=Long+client+pauses+with+compression" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Long
 client pauses with compression</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.5.4. ZooKeeper Client Connection Errors" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t418" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.client.zookeeper" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.5.4. ZooKeeper 客户端连接错误</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
错误类似于...</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_97_7992711" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">11/07/05 11:26:41 WARN zookeeper.ClientCnxn: Session 0x0 for server null,
 unexpected error, closing socket connection and attempting reconnect
 java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: no further information
        at sun.nio.ch.SocketChannelImpl.checkConnect(Native Method)
        at sun.nio.ch.SocketChannelImpl.finishConnect(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.zookeeper.ClientCnxn$SendThread.run(ClientCnxn.java:1078)
 11/07/05 11:26:43 INFO zookeeper.ClientCnxn: Opening socket connection to
 server localhost/127.0.0.1:2181

 unexpected error, closing socket connection and attempting reconnect
 java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: no further information
        at sun.nio.ch.SocketChannelImpl.checkConnect(Native Method)
        at sun.nio.ch.SocketChannelImpl.finishConnect(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.zookeeper.ClientCnxn$SendThread.run(ClientCnxn.java:1078)

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
... 要么是 ZooKeeper 不在了，或网络不可达问题。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
工具 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/trouble.tools.builtin.zkcli" rel="nofollow" title="12.4.1.3. zkcli" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 12.4.1.3, “zkcli”</a> 可以帮助调查 ZooKeeper 问题。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.5.5. Client running out of memory though heap size seems to be stable (but the off-heap/direct heap keeps growing)" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t419" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.client.oome.directmemory.leak" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.5.5. 客户端内存耗尽，但堆大小看起来不太变化( off-heap/direct heap 在增长)</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
You are likely running into the issue that is described and worked through in the mail thread HBase, mail # user - Suspected memory leak and continued over in HBase, mail # dev - FeedbackRe: Suspected memory leak. A workaround is passing your client-side JVM
 a reasonable value for <code class="code">-XX:MaxDirectMemorySize</code>. By default, the <code class="varname">MaxDirectMemorySize</code> is equal to your <code class="code">-Xmx</code> max heapsize setting (if <code class="code">-Xmx</code>is set). Try seting
 it to something smaller (for example, one user had success setting it to <code class="code">1g</code> when they had a client-side heap of <code class="code">12g</code>). If you set it too small, it will bring on <code class="code">FullGCs</code> so keep it
 a bit hefty. You want to make this setting client-side only especially if you are running the new experiemental server-side off-heap cache since this feature depends on being able to use big direct buffers (You may have to keep separate client-side and server-side
 config dirs).</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.5.6. Client Slowdown When Calling Admin Methods (flush, compact, etc.)" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t420" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.client.slowdown.admin" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.5.6. 客户端变慢，在调用管理方法(flush, compact, 等)时发生</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
该客户端问题在 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-5073" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBASE-5073</a> 版本 0.90.6中修订。 客户端的ZooKeeper 内存泄露，而客户端被管理API的额外调用产生的ZooKeeper事件连续调用。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.5.7. Secure Client Cannot Connect ([Caused by GSSException: No valid credentials provided (Mechanism level: Failed to find any Kerberos tgt)])" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="trouble.client.security.rpc" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.5.7. 安全客户端不能连接 ([由 GSSException 引起: No valid credentials provided (Mechanism level: Failed to find any Kerberos tgt)])</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
There can be several causes that produce this symptom.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
First, check that you have a valid Kerberos ticket. One is required in order to set up communication with a secure Apache HBase cluster. Examine the ticket currently in the credential cache, if any, by running the klist command line utility. If no ticket is
 listed, you must obtain a ticket by running the kinit command with either a keytab specified, or by interactively entering a password for the desired principal.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Then, consult the <a target="_blank" href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/1.5.0/docs/guide/security/jgss/tutorials/Troubleshooting.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Java Security Guide troubleshooting section</a>. The most
 common problem addressed there is resolved by setting javax.security.auth.useSubjectCredsOnly system property value to false.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Because of a change in the format in which MIT Kerberos writes its credentials cache, there is a bug in the Oracle JDK 6 Update 26 and earlier that causes Java to be unable to read the Kerberos credentials cache created by versions of MIT Kerberos 1.8.1 or
 higher. If you have this problematic combination of components in your environment, to work around this problem, first log in with kinit and then immediately refresh the credential cache with kinit -R. The refresh will rewrite the credential cache without
 the problematic formatting.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Finally, depending on your Kerberos configuration, you may need to install the <a target="_blank" href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/1.4.2/docs/guide/security/jce/JCERefGuide.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Java Cryptography
 Extension</a>, or JCE. Insure the JCE jars are on the classpath on both server and client systems.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
You may also need to download the <a target="_blank" href="http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jce-6-download-429243.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">unlimited strength JCE policy files</a>. Uncompress
 and extract the downloaded file, and install the policy jars into &lt;java-home&gt;/lib/security.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.6. MapReduce" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t422" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.mapreduce" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.6. MapReduce</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.6.1. You Think You're On The Cluster, But You're Actually Local" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t423" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.mapreduce.local" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.6.1. 你认为自己在用集群, 实际上你在用本地(Local)</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如下的调用栈在使用 <code class="code">ImportTsv</code>时发生，但同样的事可以在错误配置的任何任务中发生。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_98_5814654" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">    WARN mapred.LocalJobRunner: job_local_0001
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Can't read partitions file
       at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.hadoopbackport.TotalOrderPartitioner.setConf(TotalOrderPartitioner.java:111)
       at org.apache.hadoop.util.ReflectionUtils.setConf(ReflectionUtils.java:62)
       at org.apache.hadoop.util.ReflectionUtils.newInstance(ReflectionUtils.java:117)
       at org.apache.hadoop.mapred.MapTask$NewOutputCollector.&lt;init&gt;(MapTask.java:560)
       at org.apache.hadoop.mapred.MapTask.runNewMapper(MapTask.java:639)
       at org.apache.hadoop.mapred.MapTask.run(MapTask.java:323)
       at org.apache.hadoop.mapred.LocalJobRunner$Job.run(LocalJobRunner.java:210)
Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: File _partition.lst does not exist.
       at org.apache.hadoop.fs.RawLocalFileSystem.getFileStatus(RawLocalFileSystem.java:383)
       at org.apache.hadoop.fs.FilterFileSystem.getFileStatus(FilterFileSystem.java:251)
       at org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem.getLength(FileSystem.java:776)
       at org.apache.hadoop.io.SequenceFile$Reader.&lt;init&gt;(SequenceFile.java:1424)
       at org.apache.hadoop.io.SequenceFile$Reader.&lt;init&gt;(SequenceFile.java:1419)
       at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.hadoopbackport.TotalOrderPartitioner.readPartitions(TotalOrderPartitioner.java:296)
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
.. 看到调用栈的关键部分了吗？就是...</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_99_4358103" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">       at org.apache.hadoop.mapred.LocalJobRunner$Job.run(LocalJobRunner.java:210)
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
LocalJobRunner 意思就是任务跑在本地，不在集群。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/mapreduce/package-summary.html#classpath" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/mapreduce/package-summary.html#classpath</a> for
 more information on HBase MapReduce jobs and classpaths.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.7. NameNode" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t424" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.namenode" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.7. NameNode</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
NameNode 更多信息, 参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#arch.hdfs" rel="nofollow" title="9.9. HDFS" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.9, “HDFS”</a>.</p>
<div class="section" title="12.7.1. HDFS Utilization of Tables and Regions" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t425" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.namenode.disk" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.7.1. 表和区域的HDFS 工具</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
要确定HBase 用了HDFS多大空间，可在NameNode使用 <code class="code">hadoop</code> shell命令，例如...</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_100_2934571" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">hadoop fs -dus /hbase/</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
...返回全部HBase对象磁盘占用的情况。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_101_4268899" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">hadoop fs -dus /hbase/myTable</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
...返回HBase表'myTable'磁盘占用的情况。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_102_7630739" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">hadoop fs -du /hbase/myTable</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
...返回HBase的'myTable'表的各区域列表的磁盘占用情况。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
更多关于 HDFS shell 命令的信息，参考 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hadoop.apache.org/common/docs/current/file_system_shell.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HDFS 文件系统 Shell 文档</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.7.2. Browsing HDFS for HBase Objects" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t426" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.namenode.hbase.objects" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.7.2. 浏览 HDFS ，查看 HBase 对象</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
有时需要浏览HDFS上的 HBase对象 。对象包括WALs (Write Ahead Logs), 表，区域，存储文件等。最简易的方法是在NameNode web应用中查看，端口 50070。NameNode web 应用提供到集群中所有 DataNode 的链接，可以无缝浏览。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
存储在HDFS集群中的HBase表的目录结构是...</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_103_6324733" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">&lt;code class="filename" style="color: rgb(0, 122, 0);"&gt;/hbase&lt;/code&gt;
     &lt;code class="filename" style="color: rgb(0, 122, 0);"&gt;/&lt;Table&gt;&lt;/code&gt;             (Tables in the cluster)
          &lt;code class="filename" style="color: rgb(0, 122, 0);"&gt;/&lt;Region&gt;&lt;/code&gt;           (Regions for the table)
               &lt;code class="filename" style="color: rgb(0, 122, 0);"&gt;/&lt;ColumnFamiy&gt;&lt;/code&gt;      (ColumnFamilies for the Region for the table)
                    &lt;code class="filename" style="color: rgb(0, 122, 0);"&gt;/&lt;StoreFile&gt;&lt;/code&gt;        (StoreFiles for the ColumnFamily for the Regions for the table)
            </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HDFS 中的HBase WAL目录结构是..</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_104_7178318" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">&lt;code class="filename" style="color: rgb(0, 122, 0);"&gt;/hbase&lt;/code&gt;
     &lt;code class="filename" style="color: rgb(0, 122, 0);"&gt;/.logs&lt;/code&gt;     
          &lt;code class="filename" style="color: rgb(0, 122, 0);"&gt;/&lt;RegionServer&gt;&lt;/code&gt;    (RegionServers)
               &lt;code class="filename" style="color: rgb(0, 122, 0);"&gt;/&lt;HLog&gt;&lt;/code&gt;           (WAL HLog files for the RegionServer)
            </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考<a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/see%20http://hadoop.apache.org/common/docs/current/hdfs_user_guide.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HDFS User Guide</a> 获取其他非Shell诊断工具如<code class="code">fsck</code>.</p>
<div class="section" title="12.7.2.1. Use Cases" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t427" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.namenode.uncompaction" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.7.2.1. 用例</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
查询HDFS，获取HBase对象的两个通常用例是研究未紧缩表的程度。如果每个列族有大量存储文件(StoreFile)，这表示需要主紧缩。另外，在主紧缩之后，如果存储文件的比较小，意味着表的列族要减少。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.4. 客户端" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t428" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.network" id="trouble.network" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.8. 网络</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div title="12.8.1. Network Spikes" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t429" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.network.spikes" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.8.1. 网络峰值(Network Spikes)</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果看到周期性网络峰值，你可能需要检查compactionQueues，是不是主紧缩正在进行。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#managed.compactions" rel="nofollow" title="2.8.2.8. Managed Compactions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 2.8.2.8, “Managed Compactions”</a> ，获取更多管理紧缩的信息。</p>
</div>
<div title="12.8.2. Loopback IP" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t430" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.network.loopback" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.8.2. 回环IP(Loopback IP)</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase 希望回环 IP 地址是 127.0.0.1. 参考开始章节 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#loopback.ip" rel="nofollow" title="2.2.3. Loopback IP" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 2.2.3, “Loopback IP”</a>.</p>
</div>
<div title="12.8.3. Network Interfaces" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t431" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.network.ints" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.8.3. 网络接口</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
所有网络接口是否正常？你确定吗？参考故障诊断用例研究 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#trouble.casestudy" rel="nofollow" title="12.14. Case Studies" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 12.14, “Case Studies”</a>.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.5. RegionServer" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t432" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.rs" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.9. 区域服务器</h2>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; clear:both">
RegionServer 的更多信息，参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#regionserver.arch" rel="nofollow" title="9.6. RegionServer" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.6, “RegionServer”</a>.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.5.1. 启动错误" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px"></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.9. RegionServer" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px"></div>
<div class="section" title="12.9.1. Startup Errors" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t433" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.rs.startup" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.9.1. 启动错误</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.9.1.1. Master Starts, But RegionServers Do Not" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t434" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.rs.startup.master-no-region" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.9.1.1. 主服务器启动了，但区域服务器没有启动</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
主服务器相信区域服务器有IP地址127.0.0.1 - 这是 localhost 并被解析到主服务器自己的localhost.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
区域服务器错误的通知主服务器他们的IP地址是127.0.0.1.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
修改区域服务器的 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">/etc/hosts</code> 从...</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_105_6636464" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);"># Do not remove the following line, or various programs
# that require network functionality will fail.
127.0.0.1               fully.qualified.regionservername regionservername  localhost.localdomain localhost
::1             localhost6.localdomain6 localhost6
            </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
... 改到 (将主名称从localhost中移掉)...</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_106_936396" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);"># Do not remove the following line, or various programs
# that require network functionality will fail.
127.0.0.1               localhost.localdomain localhost
::1             localhost6.localdomain6 localhost6
            </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.9.1.2. Compression Link Errors" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t435" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.rs.startup.compression" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.9.1.2. Compression Link Errors</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
因为LZO压缩算法需要在集群中的每台机器都要安装，这是一个启动失败的常见错误。如果你获得了如下信息</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_107_4887663" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">11/02/20 01:32:15 ERROR lzo.GPLNativeCodeLoader: Could not load native gpl library
java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: no gplcompression in java.library.path
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibrary(ClassLoader.java:1734)
        at java.lang.Runtime.loadLibrary0(Runtime.java:823)
        at java.lang.System.loadLibrary(System.java:1028)
                     </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
就意味着你的压缩库出现了问题。参见配置章节的 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#lzo" rel="nofollow" title="3.6.4. LZO 压缩" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">LZO compression configuration</a>.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.9.2. Runtime Errors" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t436" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.rs.runtime" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.9.2. 运行时错误</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.9.2.1. RegionServer Hanging" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t437" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.rs.runtime.hang" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.9.2.1. RegionServer Hanging</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Are you running an old JVM (&lt; 1.6.0_u21?)? When you look at a thread dump, does it look like threads are BLOCKED but no one holds the lock all are blocked on? 参考 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-3622" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBASE
 3622 Deadlock in HBaseServer (JVM bug?)</a>. Adding <code class="code">-XX:+UseMembar</code> to the HBase <code class="varname">HBASE_OPTS</code> in <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">conf/hbase-env.sh</code> may fix it.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Also, are you using <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#client.rowlocks" rel="nofollow" title="9.3.4. RowLocks" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.3.4, “RowLocks”</a>? These are discouraged because
 they can lock up the RegionServers if not managed properly.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.9.2.2. java.io.IOException...(Too many open files)" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">

</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果看到如下消息...</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_108_1695850" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">2010-09-13 01:24:17,336 WARN org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.DataNode: 
Disk-related IOException in BlockReceiver constructor. Cause is java.io.IOException: Too many open files
        at java.io.UnixFileSystem.createFileExclusively(Native Method)
        at java.io.File.createNewFile(File.java:883)
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
... 参见快速入门的章节 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ulimit" rel="nofollow" title="2.2.5.  ulimit and nproc" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">ulimit and nproc configuration</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.9.2.3. xceiverCount 258 exceeds the limit of concurrent xcievers 256" style="margin:0px">

</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这个时常会出现在DataNode的日志中。</p>

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
</div>
<div class="section" title='12.9.2.4. System instability, and the presence of "java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: unable to create new native thread in exceptions" HDFS DataNode logs or that of any system daemon' style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="trouble.rs.runtime.oom-nt" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.9.2.4. 系统不稳定,DataNode或者其他系统进程有 "java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: unable to create new native thread in exceptions"的错误</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参见快速入门章节的 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ulimit" rel="nofollow" title="1.3.1.6.  ulimit 和 nproc" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">ulimit and nproc configuration</a>.. 最新的Linux发行版缺省值是 1024 - 这对HBase实在太小了。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.9.2.5. DFS instability and/or RegionServer lease timeouts" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t441" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.rs.runtime.gc" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.9.2.5. DFS不稳定或者RegionServer租期超时</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果你收到了如下的消息:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_109_8089332" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">2009-02-24 10:01:33,516 WARN org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Sleeper: We slept xxx ms, ten times longer than scheduled: 10000
2009-02-24 10:01:33,516 WARN org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Sleeper: We slept xxx ms, ten times longer than scheduled: 15000
2009-02-24 10:01:36,472 WARN org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.HRegionServer: unable to report to master for xxx milliseconds - retrying      
           </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
... 或者看到了全GC压缩操作，你可能正在执行一个全GC。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title='12.9.2.6. "No live nodes contain current block" and/or YouAreDeadException' style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t442" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.rs.runtime.nolivenodes" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.9.2.6. "No live nodes contain current block" and/or YouAreDeadException</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这个错误有可能是OS的文件句柄溢出，也可能是网络故障导致节点无法访问。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参见快速入门章节 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ulimit" rel="nofollow" title="1.3.1.6.  ulimit 和 nproc" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">ulimit and nproc configuration</a>，检查你的网络。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.9.2.7. ZooKeeper SessionExpired events" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t443" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.rs.runtime.zkexpired" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.9.2.7. ZooKeeper 会话超时事件</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Master or RegionServers shutting down with messages like those in the logs:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_110_4275072" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">WARN org.apache.zookeeper.ClientCnxn: Exception
closing session 0x278bd16a96000f to sun.nio.ch.SelectionKeyImpl@355811ec
java.io.IOException: TIMED OUT
       at org.apache.zookeeper.ClientCnxn$SendThread.run(ClientCnxn.java:906)
WARN org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Sleeper: We slept 79410ms, ten times longer than scheduled: 5000
INFO org.apache.zookeeper.ClientCnxn: Attempting connection to server hostname/IP:PORT
INFO org.apache.zookeeper.ClientCnxn: Priming connection to java.nio.channels.SocketChannel[connected local=/IP:PORT remote=hostname/IP:PORT]
INFO org.apache.zookeeper.ClientCnxn: Server connection successful
WARN org.apache.zookeeper.ClientCnxn: Exception closing session 0x278bd16a96000d to sun.nio.ch.SelectionKeyImpl@3544d65e
java.io.IOException: Session Expired
       at org.apache.zookeeper.ClientCnxn$SendThread.readConnectResult(ClientCnxn.java:589)
       at org.apache.zookeeper.ClientCnxn$SendThread.doIO(ClientCnxn.java:709)
       at org.apache.zookeeper.ClientCnxn$SendThread.run(ClientCnxn.java:945)
ERROR org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.HRegionServer: ZooKeeper session expired           
           </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The JVM is doing a long running garbage collecting which is pausing every threads (aka "stop the world"). Since the RegionServer's local ZooKeeper client cannot send heartbeats, the session times out. By design, we shut down any node that isn't able to contact
 the ZooKeeper ensemble after getting a timeout so that it stops serving data that may already be assigned elsewhere.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">Make sure you give plenty of RAM (in <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-env.sh</code>), the default of 1GB won't be able to sustain long running imports.</li><li class="listitem">Make sure you don't swap, the JVM never behaves well under swapping.</li><li class="listitem">Make sure you are not CPU starving the RegionServer thread. For example, if you are running a MapReduce job using 6 CPU-intensive tasks on a machine with 4 cores, you are probably starving the RegionServer enough to create longer garbage
 collection pauses.</li><li class="listitem">Increase the ZooKeeper session timeout</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If you wish to increase the session timeout, add the following to your <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-site.xml</code> to increase the timeout from the default of 60 seconds to 120 seconds.</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_111_6274491" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">&lt;property&gt;
    &lt;name&gt;zookeeper.session.timeout&lt;/name&gt;
    &lt;value&gt;1200000&lt;/value&gt;
&lt;/property&gt;
&lt;property&gt;
    &lt;name&gt;hbase.zookeeper.property.tickTime&lt;/name&gt;
    &lt;value&gt;6000&lt;/value&gt;
&lt;/property&gt;
            </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Be aware that setting a higher timeout means that the regions served by a failed RegionServer will take at least that amount of time to be transfered to another RegionServer. For a production system serving live requests, we would instead recommend setting
 it lower than 1 minute and over-provision your cluster in order the lower the memory load on each machines (hence having less garbage to collect per machine).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If this is happening during an upload which only happens once (like initially loading all your data into HBase), consider bulk loading.</p>
参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#trouble.zookeeper.general" rel="nofollow" title="12.11.2. ZooKeeper, The Cluster Canary" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 12.11.2, “ZooKeeper, The Cluster Canary”</a> for
 other general information about ZooKeeper troubleshooting.</div>
<div class="section" title="12.9.2.8. NotServingRegionException" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t444" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.rs.runtime.notservingregion" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.9.2.8. 无服务区域异常(NotServingRegionException)</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
This exception is "normal" when found in the RegionServer logs at DEBUG level. This exception is returned back to the client and then the client goes back to .META. to find the new location of the moved region.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
However, if the NotServingRegionException is logged ERROR, then the client ran out of retries and something probably wrong.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.9.2.9. Regions listed by domain name, then IP" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t445" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.rs.runtime.double_listed_regions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.9.2.9. 区域列示先是域名，然后IP</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
修复 DNS. HBase 0.92.x以前的版本，反向 DNS 需要和正向查询相同答案。 参考 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-3431" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBASE 3431 RegionServer is not using the name given it
 by the master; double entry in master listing of servers</a> 获取详细细节。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.9.2.10. Logs flooded with '2011-01-10 12:40:48,407 INFO org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.CodecPool: Got brand-new compressor' messages" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="trouble.rs.runtime.codecmsgs" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.9.2.10. 大量类似 '2011-01-10 12:40:48,407 INFO org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.CodecPool: Got brand-new compressor' 日志消息</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
没有采用本地压缩库版本。 参考 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-1900" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBASE-1900 Put back native support when hadoop 0.21 is released</a>。从hadoop的HBase库目录复制本地库或建立链接到正确位置，该消息将消失。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="12.9.2.11. Server handler X on 60020 caught: java.nio.channels.ClosedChannelException" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t447" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="trouble.rs.runtime.client_went_away" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>12.9.2.11. Server handler X on 60020 caught: java.nio.channels.ClosedChannelException</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If you see this type of message it means that the region server was trying to read/send data from/to a client but it already went away. Typical causes for this are if the client was killed (you see a storm of messages like this when a MapReduce job is killed
 or fails) or if the client receives a SocketTimeoutException. It's harmless, but you should consider digging in a bit more if you aren't doing something to trigger them.</p>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
