<dl style="margin:0.8em 0px; line-height:1.2"><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hbase_metrics" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">14.4. HBase 度量</a></span></dt><dd> </dd><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ops.monitoring" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">14.5. HBase 监控</a></span></dt><dd> </dd><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#cluster_replication" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">14.6. 集群复制</a></span></dt><dd> </dd><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ops.backup" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">14.7. HBase 备份</a></span></dt><dd> </dd><dd><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ops.backup" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none"></a></span><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ops.backup" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none"></a></span><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ops.backup" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none"></a></span></dd><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ops.capacity" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">14.8. 容量计划</a></span></dt><dd>
<dl style="margin:0.8em 0px; line-height:1.2"><dt> </dt></dl>
</dd></dl>
</div>
This chapter will cover operational tools and practices required of a running HBase cluster. The subject of operations is related to the topics of <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#trouble" rel="nofollow" title="Chapter 12. Troubleshooting and Debugging HBase" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Chapter 12, <em>Troubleshooting
 and Debugging HBase</em></a>,<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#performance" rel="nofollow" title="Chapter 11. Performance Tuning" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Chapter 11, <em>Performance Tuning</em></a>,
 and <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#configuration" rel="nofollow" title="Chapter 2. Configuration" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Chapter 2, <em>Configuration</em></a> but is a distinct topic in itself.
<div class="section" title="14.1. HBase Tools and Utilities" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t483" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="tools" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1. HBase 工具和实用程序</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这里我们给出HBase工具列表，可用于管理，分析，修复和调试。</p>
<div class="section" title="14.1.1. Driver" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t484" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="driver" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.1. 驱动</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
There is a <code class="code">Driver</code> class that is executed by the HBase jar can be used to invoke frequently accessed utilities. For example,</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_121_6445762" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">HADOOP_CLASSPATH=`${HBASE_HOME}/bin/hbase classpath` ${HADOOP_HOME}/bin/hadoop jar ${HBASE_HOME}/hbase-VERSION.jar 
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
... will return...</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_122_3154890" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">An example program must be given as the first argument.
Valid program names are:
  completebulkload: Complete a bulk data load.
  copytable: Export a table from local cluster to peer cluster
  export: Write table data to HDFS.
  import: Import data written by Export.
  importtsv: Import data in TSV format.
  rowcounter: Count rows in HBase table
  verifyrep: Compare the data from tables in two different clusters. WARNING: It doesn't work for incrementColumnValues'd cells since the timestamp is chan
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
... for allowable program names.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.1.2. HBase hbck" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t485" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbck" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.2. HBase <span class="application">hbck</span></h3>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="subtitle" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t486" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>An <span class="emphasis"><em>fsck</em></span> for your HBase install</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
To run <span class="application">hbck</span> against your HBase cluster run</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_147_3526768" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/hbase hbck</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
At the end of the commands output it prints <span class="emphasis"><em>OK</em></span> or <span class="emphasis"><em>INCONSISTENCY</em></span>. If your cluster reports inconsistencies, pass <span class="command"><strong>-details</strong></span> to see more detail
 emitted. If inconsistencies, run <span class="command"><strong>hbck</strong></span> a few times because the inconsistency may be transient (e.g. cluster is starting up or a region is splitting). Passing <span class="command"><strong>-fix</strong></span> may
 correct the inconsistency (This latter is an experimental feature).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For more information, see <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hbck.in.depth" rel="nofollow" title="Appendix B. hbck In Depth" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Appendix B, <em>hbck In Depth</em></a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.1.3. HFile Tool" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t487" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hfile_tool2" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.3. HFile 工具</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hfile_tool" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.5.2.2. HFile Tool" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5.2.2, “HFile Tool”</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.1.4. WAL Tools" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t488" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="wal_tools" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.4. WAL 工具</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.1.4.1. HLog tool" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t489" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hlog_tool" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.4.1. <code class="classname">HLog</code> tool</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The main method on <code class="classname">HLog</code> offers manual split and dump facilities. Pass it WALs or the product of a split, the content of the <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">recovered.edits</code>. directory.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
You can get a textual dump of a WAL file content by doing the following:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_124_1929477" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);"> &lt;code class="code"&gt;$ ./bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.wal.HLog --dump hdfs://example.org:8020/hbase/.logs/example.org,60020,1283516293161/10.10.21.10%3A60020.1283973724012&lt;/code&gt; </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The return code will be non-zero if issues with the file so you can test wholesomeness of file by redirecting <code class="varname">STDOUT</code> to <code class="code">/dev/null</code> and testing the program return.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Similarly you can force a split of a log file directory by doing:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_125_9195011" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);"> $ ./&lt;code class="code"&gt;bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.wal.HLog --split hdfs://example.org:8020/hbase/.logs/example.org,60020,1283516293161/&lt;/code&gt;</pre>
<div class="section" title="14.1.4.1.1. HLogPrettyPrinter" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h5 class="title" style="color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; margin:0.8em 0px 0px -31.203125px">
<a target="_blank" name="t490" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hlog_tool.prettyprint" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.4.1.1. <code class="classname">HLogPrettyPrinter</code></h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="classname">HLogPrettyPrinter</code> is a tool with configurable options to print the contents of an HLog.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.1.5. Compression Tool" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t491" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="compression.tool" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.5. Compression Tool</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#compression.test" rel="nofollow" title="C.1. CompressionTest Tool" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section C.1, “CompressionTest Tool”</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.1.6. CopyTable" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t492" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="copytable" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.6. CopyTable</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
CopyTable is a utility that can copy part or of all of a table, either to the same cluster or another cluster. The usage is as follows:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_126_9558228" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.CopyTable [--starttime=X] [--endtime=Y] [--new.name=NEW] [--peer.adr=ADR] tablename
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Options:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem"><code class="varname">starttime</code> Beginning of the time range. Without endtime means starttime to forever.</li><li class="listitem"><code class="varname">endtime</code> End of the time range. Without endtime means starttime to forever.</li><li class="listitem"><code class="varname">versions</code> Number of cell versions to copy.</li><li class="listitem"><code class="varname">new.name</code> New table's name.</li><li class="listitem"><code class="varname">peer.adr</code> Address of the peer cluster given in the format hbase.zookeeper.quorum:hbase.zookeeper.client.port:zookeeper.znode.parent</li><li class="listitem"><code class="varname">families</code> Comma-separated list of ColumnFamilies to copy.</li><li class="listitem"><code class="varname">all.cells</code> Also copy delete markers and uncollected deleted cells (advanced option).</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Args:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">tablename Name of table to copy.</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Example of copying 'TestTable' to a cluster that uses replication for a 1 hour window:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_127_1939333" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.CopyTable
--starttime=1265875194289 --endtime=1265878794289
--peer.adr=server1,server2,server3:2181:/hbase TestTable</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<div class="note" title="Scanner Caching" style="margin:0px 0.5in">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -43.921875px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t493" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>Scanner Caching</h3>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Caching for the input Scan is configured via <code class="code">hbase.client.scanner.caching</code> in the job configuration.</p>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 Jonathan Hsieh's <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://www.cloudera.com/blog/2012/06/online-hbase-backups-with-copytable-2/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Online HBase Backups with CopyTable</a> blog post for more
 on <span class="command"><strong>CopyTable</strong></span>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.1.7. Export" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t494" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="export" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.7. 导出</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
导出实用工具可以将表的内容输出成HDFS的序列化文件，如下调用：</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_128_9204867" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.Export &lt;tablename&gt; &lt;outputdir&gt; [&lt;versions&gt; [&lt;starttime&gt; [&lt;endtime&gt;]]]
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Note: caching for the input Scan is configured via <code class="code">hbase.client.scanner.caching</code> in the job configuration.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.1.8. Import" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t495" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="import" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.8. 导入</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
导入实用工具可以加载导出的数据回到HBase，如下调用：</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_129_3189154" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.Import &lt;tablename&gt; &lt;inputdir&gt;
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.1.9. ImportTsv" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t496" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="importtsv" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.9. ImportTsv</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
ImportTsv is a utility that will load data in TSV format into HBase. It has two distinct usages: loading data from TSV format in HDFS into HBase via Puts, and preparing StoreFiles to be loaded via the <code class="code">completebulkload</code>.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
To load data via Puts (i.e., non-bulk loading):</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_130_2406537" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.ImportTsv -Dimporttsv.columns=a,b,c &lt;tablename&gt; &lt;hdfs-inputdir&gt;
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
To generate StoreFiles for bulk-loading:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_131_5768376" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.ImportTsv -Dimporttsv.columns=a,b,c -Dimporttsv.bulk.output=hdfs://storefile-outputdir &lt;tablename&gt; &lt;hdfs-data-inputdir&gt;
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
These generated StoreFiles can be loaded into HBase via <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#completebulkload" rel="nofollow" title="14.1.10. CompleteBulkLoad" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 14.1.10,
 “CompleteBulkLoad”</a>.</p>
<div class="section" title="14.1.9.1. ImportTsv Options" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t497" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="importtsv.options" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.9.1. ImportTsv 选项</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
Running ImportTsv with no arguments prints brief usage information:<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_132_3033911" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">Usage: importtsv -Dimporttsv.columns=a,b,c &lt;tablename&gt; &lt;inputdir&gt;

Imports the given input directory of TSV data into the specified table.

The column names of the TSV data must be specified using the -Dimporttsv.columns
option. This option takes the form of comma-separated column names, where each
column name is either a simple column family, or a columnfamily:qualifier. The special
column name HBASE_ROW_KEY is used to designate that this column should be used
as the row key for each imported record. You must specify exactly one column
to be the row key, and you must specify a column name for every column that exists in the
input data.

By default importtsv will load data directly into HBase. To instead generate
HFiles of data to prepare for a bulk data load, pass the option:
  -Dimporttsv.bulk.output=/path/for/output
  Note: if you do not use this option, then the target table must already exist in HBase

Other options that may be specified with -D include:
  -Dimporttsv.skip.bad.lines=false - fail if encountering an invalid line
  '-Dimporttsv.separator=|' - eg separate on pipes instead of tabs
  -Dimporttsv.timestamp=currentTimeAsLong - use the specified timestamp for the import
  -Dimporttsv.mapper.class=my.Mapper - A user-defined Mapper to use instead of org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.TsvImporterMapper
</pre></div>
<div class="section" title="14.1.9.2. ImportTsv Example" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t498" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="importtsv.example" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.9.2. ImportTsv 示例</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For example, assume that we are loading data into a table called 'datatsv' with a ColumnFamily called 'd' with two columns "c1" and "c2".</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Assume that an input file exists as follows:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_133_6395751" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">row1	c1	c2
row2	c1	c2
row3	c1	c2
row4	c1	c2
row5	c1	c2
row6	c1	c2
row7	c1	c2
row8	c1	c2
row9	c1	c2
row10	c1	c2
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For ImportTsv to use this imput file, the command line needs to look like this:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_134_629644" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);"> HADOOP_CLASSPATH=`${HBASE_HOME}/bin/hbase classpath` ${HADOOP_HOME}/bin/hadoop jar ${HBASE_HOME}/hbase-VERSION.jar importtsv -Dimporttsv.columns=HBASE_ROW_KEY,d:c1,d:c2 -Dimporttsv.bulk.output=hdfs://storefileoutput  datatsv hdfs://inputfile
 </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
... and in this example the first column is the rowkey, which is why the HBASE_ROW_KEY is used. The second and third columns in the file will be imported as "d:c1" and "d:c2", respectively.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.1.9.3. ImportTsv Warning" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t499" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="importtsv.warning" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.9.3. ImportTsv Warning</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If you have preparing a lot of data for bulk loading, make sure the target HBase table is pre-split appropriately.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.1.9.4. See Also" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t500" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="importtsv.also" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.9.4. 参考</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
For more information about bulk-loading HFiles into HBase, see <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#arch.bulk.load" rel="nofollow" title="9.8. Bulk Loading" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.8, “Bulk
 Loading”</a></div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.1.10. CompleteBulkLoad" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t501" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="completebulkload" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.10. CompleteBulkLoad</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">completebulkload</code> 实用工具可以将产生的存储文件移动到HBase表。该工具经常和<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#importtsv" rel="nofollow" title="14.1.9. ImportTsv" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 14.1.9,
 “ImportTsv”</a> 的输出联合使用。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
两种方法调用该工具，带显式类名或通过驱动：</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_135_959841" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.LoadIncrementalHFiles &lt;hdfs://storefileoutput&gt; &lt;tablename&gt;
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
.. 通过驱动..</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_136_7353323" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">HADOOP_CLASSPATH=`${HBASE_HOME}/bin/hbase classpath` ${HADOOP_HOME}/bin/hadoop jar ${HBASE_HOME}/hbase-VERSION.jar completebulkload &lt;hdfs://storefileoutput&gt; &lt;tablename&gt;
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
批量导入 HFiles 到 HBase的更多信息 ，参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#arch.bulk.load" rel="nofollow" title="9.8. Bulk Loading" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.8, “Bulk Loading”</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.1.11. WALPlayer" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t502" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="walplayer" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.11. WALPlayer</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
WALPlayer 实用工具可以重放 WAL 文件到 HBase.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The WAL can be replayed for a set of tables or all tables, and a timerange can be provided (in milliseconds). The WAL is filtered to this set of tables. The output can optionally be mapped to another set of tables.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
WALPlayer can also generate HFiles for later bulk importing, in that case only a single table and no mapping can be specified.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Invoke via:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_137_7160133" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.WALPlayer [options] &lt;wal inputdir&gt; &lt;tables&gt; [&lt;tableMappings&gt;]&gt;
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For example:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_138_9442177" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.WALPlayer /backuplogdir oldTable1,oldTable2 newTable1,newTable2
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.1.12. RowCounter" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t503" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="rowcounter" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.1.12. RowCounter</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
RowCounter 实用工具可以统计表的行数。这是一个好工具，如果担心元数据可能存在不一致，可以用于确认HBase可以读取表的所有分块。</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_139_885190" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.RowCounter &lt;tablename&gt; [&lt;column1&gt; &lt;column2&gt;...]
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Note: caching for the input Scan is configured via <code class="code">hbase.client.scanner.caching</code> in the job configuration.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.2. Region Management" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t504" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.regionmgt" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.2. 区域管理</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.2.1. Major Compaction" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t505" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.regionmgt.majorcompact" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.2.1. 主紧缩</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
主紧缩可以通过HBase shell 或 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HBaseAdmin.html#majorCompact%28java.lang.String%29" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBaseAdmin.majorCompact</a> 进行。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
注意：主紧缩<strong><em>不</em></strong>进行区域合并。更多关于紧缩的信息，参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#compaction" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.5.5. Compaction" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5.5, “Compaction”</a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.2.2. Merge" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t506" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.regionmgt.merge" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.2.2. 合并</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Merge is a utility that can merge adjoining regions in the same table (see org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Merge).</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_140_5708509" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ bin/hbase org.apache.hbase.util.Merge &lt;tablename&gt; &lt;region1&gt; &lt;region2&gt;
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If you feel you have too many regions and want to consolidate them, Merge is the utility you need. Merge must run be done when the cluster is down. 参考 the <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://ofps.oreilly.com/titles/9781449396107/performance.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">O'Reilly
 HBase Book</a> for an example of usage.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Additionally, there is a Ruby script attached to <a target="_blank" class="link" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-1621" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBASE-1621</a> for region merging.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.3. Node Management" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t507" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="node.management" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.3. 节点管理</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.3.1. Node Decommission" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t508" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="decommission" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.3.1. 节点下线</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
你可以在HBase的特定的节点上运行下面的脚本来停止RegionServer:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_141_7990554" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/hbase-daemon.sh stop regionserver</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
RegionServer会首先关闭所有的region然后把它自己关闭，在停止的过程中，RegionServer的会向Zookeeper报告说他已经过期了。master会发现RegionServer已经死了，会把它当作崩溃的server来处理。他会将region分配到其他的节点上去。</p>
<div class="note" title="在下线节点之前要停止Load Balancer" style="margin:0px 0.5in">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -43.921875px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t509" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>在下线节点之前要停止Load Balancer</h3>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果在运行load balancer的时候，一个节点要关闭， 则Load Balancer和Master的recovery可能会争夺这个要下线的Regionserver。为了避免这个问题，先将load balancer停止，参见下面的 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#lb" rel="nofollow" title="Load Balancer" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Load
 Balancer</a>.</p>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
RegionServer下线有一个缺点就是其中的Region会有好一会离线。Regions是被按顺序关闭的。如果一个server上有很多region,从第一个region会被下线，到最后一个region被关闭，并且Master确认他已经死了，该region才可以上线，整个过程要花很长时间。在HBase 0.90.2中，我们加入了一个功能，可以让节点逐渐的摆脱他的负载，最后关闭。HBase 0.90.2加入了 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">graceful_stop.sh</code>脚本，可以这样用，</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_142_3304242" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/graceful_stop.sh 
Usage: graceful_stop.sh [--config &amp;conf-dir&gt;] [--restart] [--reload] [--thrift] [--rest] &amp;hostname&gt;
 thrift      If we should stop/start thrift before/after the hbase stop/start
 rest        If we should stop/start rest before/after the hbase stop/start
 restart     If we should restart after graceful stop
 reload      Move offloaded regions back on to the stopped server
 debug       Move offloaded regions back on to the stopped server
 hostname    Hostname of server we are to stop</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
要下线一台RegionServer可以这样做</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_143_3111051" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/graceful_stop.sh HOSTNAME</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这里的<code class="varname">HOSTNAME</code>是RegionServer的host you would decommission.</p>
<div class="note" title="On HOSTNAME" style="margin:0px 0.5in">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -43.921875px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t510" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>On <code class="varname">HOSTNAME</code></h3>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
传递到<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">graceful_stop.sh</code>的<code class="varname">HOSTNAME</code>必须和hbase使用的hostname一致，hbase用它来区分RegionServers。可以用master的UI来检查RegionServers的id。通常是hostname,也可能是FQDN。不管HBase使用的哪一个，你可以将它传到 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">graceful_stop.sh</code>脚本中去，目前他还不支持使用IP地址来推断hostname。所以使用IP就会发现server不在运行，也没有办法下线了。</p>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">graceful_stop.sh</code> 脚本会一个一个将region从RegionServer中移除出去，以减少改RegionServer的负载。他会先移除一个region,然后再将这个region安置到一个新的地方，再移除下一个，直到全部移除。最后<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">graceful_stop.sh</code>脚本会让RegionServer <span class="command"><strong>stop</strong></span>.,Master会注意到RegionServer已经下线了，这个时候所有的region已经重新部署好。RegionServer就可以干干净净的结束，没有WAL日志需要分割。</p>
<div class="note" title="Load Balancer" style="margin:0px 0.5in">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -43.921875px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t511" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="lb" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>Load Balancer</h3>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当执行<span class="command"><strong>graceful_stop</strong></span>脚本的时候，要将Region Load Balancer关掉(否则balancer和下线脚本会在region部署的问题上存在冲突):</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_144_932994" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">hbase(main):001:0&gt; balance_switch false
true
0 row(s) in 0.3590 seconds</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
上面是将balancer关掉，要想开启：</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_145_1263191" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">hbase(main):001:0&gt; balance_switch true
false
0 row(s) in 0.3590 seconds</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<div class="note" title="Load Balancer" style="margin:0px 0.5in">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.3.2. Rolling Restart" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t512" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="rolling" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.3.2. 依次重启</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
你还可以让这个脚本重启一个RegionServer,不改变上面的Region的位置。要想保留数据的位置，你可以依次重启(Rolling Restart),就像这样:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_150_1485718" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ for i in `cat conf/regionservers|sort`; do ./bin/graceful_stop.sh --restart --reload --debug $i; done &amp;&gt; /tmp/log.txt &amp;
            </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Tail <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">/tmp/log.txt</code>来看脚本的运行过程.上面的脚本只对RegionServer进行操作。要确认load balancer已经关掉。还需要在之前更新master。下面是一段依次重启的伪脚本,你可以借鉴它：</p>
<div class="orderedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ol class="orderedlist" type="1" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
确认你的版本，保证配置已经rsync到整个集群中。如果版本是0.90.2，需要打上HBASE-3744 和 HBASE-3756两个补丁。</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
运行hbck确保你的集群是一致的</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_147_3526768" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/hbase hbck</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当发现不一致的时候，可以修复他。</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
重启Master:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_148_5808813" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/hbase-daemon.sh stop master; ./bin/hbase-daemon.sh start master</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
关闭region balancer:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_149_9519317" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ echo "balance_switch false" | ./bin/hbase</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
在每个RegionServer上运行<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">graceful_stop.sh</code>：</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_150_1485718" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ for i in `cat conf/regionservers|sort`; do ./bin/graceful_stop.sh --restart --reload --debug $i; done &amp;&gt; /tmp/log.txt &amp;
            </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果你在RegionServer还开起来thrift和rest server。还需要加上--thrift or --rest 选项 (参见 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">graceful_stop.sh</code> 脚本的用法).</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
再次重启Master.这会把已经死亡的server列表清空，重新开启balancer.</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
运行 hbck 保证集群是一直的</p>
</li></ol>
</div>
<div class="orderedlist" style="margin:0px"></div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.4. HBase Metrics" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t513" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase_metrics" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.4. HBase 度量</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.4.1. Metric Setup" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t514" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="metric_setup" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.4.1. 度量<span class="title" style="clear:both">安装</span></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参见 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/metrics.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Metrics</a> 可以获得一个enable Metrics emission的指导。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.4.2. RegionServer Metrics" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t515" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="rs_metrics" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.4.2. 区域服务器度量</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.4.2.1. hbase.regionserver.blockCacheCount" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t516" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.blockCacheCount" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.4.2.1. <code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.blockCacheCount</code></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
内存中的Block cache item数量。这个是存储文件(HFiles)的缓存中的数量。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.4.2.2. hbase.regionserver.blockCacheEvictedCount" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t517" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.blockCacheEvictedCount" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.4.2.2. <code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.blockCacheEvictedCount</code></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Number of blocks that had to be evicted from the block cache due to heap size constraints.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.4.2.3. hbase.regionserver.blockCacheFree" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t518" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.blockCacheFree" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.4.2.3. <code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.blockCacheFree</code></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
内存中的Block cache memory 剩余 (单位 bytes).</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.4.2.4. hbase.regionserver.blockCacheHitCachingRatio" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t519" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.blockCacheHitCachingRatio" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.4.2.4. <code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.blockCacheHitCachingRatio</code></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Block cache hit caching ratio (0 to 100). The cache-hit ratio for reads configured to look in the cache (i.e., cacheBlocks=true).</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.4.2.5. hbase.regionserver.blockCacheHitCount" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t520" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.blockCacheHitCount" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.4.2.5. <code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.blockCacheHitCount</code></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Number of blocks of StoreFiles (HFiles) read from the cache.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.4.2.6. hbase.regionserver.blockCacheHitRatio" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t521" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.blockCacheHitRatio" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.4.2.6. <code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.blockCacheHitRatio</code></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Block cache 命中率(0 到 100). Includes all read requests, although those with cacheBlocks=false will always read from disk and be counted as a "cache miss"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.4.2.7. hbase.regionserver.blockCacheMissCount" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t522" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.blockCacheMissCount" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.4.2.7. <code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.blockCacheMissCount</code></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
StoreFiles (HFiles)请求的未在缓存中的分块数量。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.4.2.8. hbase.regionserver.blockCacheSize" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t523" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.blockCacheSize" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.4.2.8. <code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.blockCacheSize</code></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
内存中的Block cache 大小 (单位 bytes). i.e., memory in use by the BlockCache</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.4.2.9. hbase.regionserver.compactionQueueSize" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t524" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.compactionQueueSize" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.4.2.9. <code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.compactionQueueSize</code></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
compaction队列的大小. 这个值是需要进行compaction的region数目</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.4.2.10. hbase.regionserver.flushQueueSize" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t525" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.flushQueueSize" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.4.2.10. <code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.flushQueueSize</code></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Number of enqueued regions in the MemStore awaiting flush.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.4.2.11. hbase.regionserver.fsReadLatency_avg_time" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
