<div class="section" title="14.5. HBase Monitoring" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t538" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.monitoring" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.5. HBase 监控</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.5.1. Overview" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t539" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.monitoring.overview" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.5.1. 概述</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
下面的度量方法对每个区域服务器的宏观监控被证明是是最重要的，特别是在像 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://opentsdb.net/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">OpenTSDB</a>这样的系统中。如果你的集群具有性能问题，你可能得参考本组信息。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">Requests</li><li class="listitem">Compactions queue</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
OS:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">IO Wait</li><li class="listitem">User CPU</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Java:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">GC</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase度量的更多信息，参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hbase_metrics" rel="nofollow" title="14.4. HBase Metrics" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 14.4, “HBase Metrics”</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.5.2. Slow Query Log" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t540" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.slow.query" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.5.2. 查询太慢的日志</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase查询太慢的日志由可分析的 JSON结构描述。客户端操作 (Gets, Puts, Deletes, 等)的属性， 要么运行太久，或产生输出太多。“运行太久”和“输出太多”的门限可配置，如后面所述。输出产生在主区域服务器日志中，以便和其他日志事件一起发现更多细节。它也前置区分标签<code class="constant">(responseTooSlow)</code>, <code class="constant">(responseTooLarge)</code>, <code class="constant">(operationTooSlow)</code>和<code class="constant">(operationTooLarge)</code>，以便当用户只希望看到慢查询时，用grep过滤。</p>
<div class="section" title="14.5.2.1. Configuration" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t541" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1952e9354" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.5.2.1. 配置</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
有两个配置节可用于调整查询太慢日志的门限。</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem"><code class="varname">hbase.ipc.warn.response.time</code> 不被记录太慢日志的查询执行的最大毫秒数(millisecond) 。缺省10000, 即 10 秒。可设 -1 禁止通过时间长短记入日志。</li><li class="listitem"><code class="varname">hbase.ipc.warn.response.size</code> 不被记录日志的查询可返回的最大字节数。缺省 100 MB，可设为 -1 禁止通过大小记入日志。</li></ul>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.5.2.2. Metrics" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t542" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1952e9368" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.5.2.2. 度量</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
查询太慢日志暴露给了JMX 度量。</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem"><code class="varname">hadoop.regionserver_rpc_slowResponse</code> 是一个全局度量，反射所有超时记入日志的响应。</li><li class="listitem"><code class="varname">hadoop.regionserver_rpc_methodName.aboveOneSec</code> 一个度量，反射所有超过一秒时间的响应。</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.5.2.3. Output" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t543" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1952e9383" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.5.2.3. 输出</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
输出以操作做标签，如 <code class="constant">(operationTooSlow)</code> 。如果调用是客户端操作，如 Put, Get, 或 Delete，会暴露详细指纹信息。否则，标签为 <code class="constant">(responseTooSlow)</code> ，也同样提供可分析的JSON 输出，但具有较少细节信息，完全依赖于RPC自身的超时和超量设置。 <code class="constant">TooLarge</code> 代替 <code class="constant">TooSlow</code> 如果响应大小引起日志记录。在大小和时长都引起日志记录时，也是 <code class="constant">TooLarge</code> 后置。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.5.2.4. Example" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t544" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1952e9403" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.5.2.4. 示例</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_151_5719610" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">2011-09-08 10:01:25,824 WARN org.apache.hadoop.ipc.HBaseServer: (operationTooSlow): {"tables":{"riley2":{"puts":[{"totalColumns":11,"families":{"actions":[{"timestamp":1315501284459,"qualifier":"0","vlen":9667580},{"timestamp":1315501284459,"qualifier":"1","vlen":10122412},{"timestamp":1315501284459,"qualifier":"2","vlen":11104617},{"timestamp":1315501284459,"qualifier":"3","vlen":13430635}]},"row":"cfcd208495d565ef66e7dff9f98764da:0"}],"families":["actions"]}},"processingtimems":956,"client":"10.47.34.63:33623","starttimems":1315501284456,"queuetimems":0,"totalPuts":1,"class":"HRegionServer","responsesize":0,"method":"multiPut"}</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
注意，在"tables"结构里的所有东西，是MultiPut的指纹打印的输出。其余的信息是RPC相关的，如处理时间和客户端IP/port。 客户端的其他操作的模式和通用结构与此相同，但根据单个操作的类型会有一定的不同。如果调用不是客户端操作，则指纹细节信息将完全没有。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
对本示例而言，指出了缓慢的原因可能是简单的超大 ( 100MB) multiput，通过 "vlen" 即 value length告知，multiPut中的每个put的域有该信息。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.6. Cluster Replication" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t545" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="cluster_replication" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.6. 集群复制</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参见 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/replication.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">集群复制</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.7. HBase Backup" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t546" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.backup" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.7. HBase 备份</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
有两种通常策略进行 HBase 备份：停止整个集群再备份，和在正在使用的集群上备份。 每一种途径都有优缺点。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
更多信息，参考Sematext的Blog <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://blog.sematext.com/2011/03/11/hbase-backup-options/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBase Backup Options</a>.</p>
<div class="section" title="14.7.1. Full Shutdown Backup" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t547" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.backup.fullshutdown" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.7.1. 全停止备份</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
一些环境可以容忍暂时停止 HBase 集群，如用于后台容量分析，并不提供前台页面。 好处是 NameNode/Master 和 RegionServers是停止的， 不会有任何机会丢失正在处理改变的保存文件或元数据。明显的坏处是集群被 关闭。步骤包括：</p>
<div class="section" title="14.7.1.1. Stop HBase" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t548" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.backup.fullshutdown.stop" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.7.1.1. 停止 HBase</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.7.1.2. Distcp" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t549" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.backup.fullshutdown.distcp" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.7.1.2. Distcp</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Distcp 既用于将HDFS里面的HBase 目录下的内容拷贝到当前集群的另一个目录，也可以拷贝到另一个集群。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
注意： Distcp 工作的情形是集群关闭，没有正在改变的文件。Distcp 不推荐用于正工作着的集群。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.7.1.3. Restore (if needed)" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t550" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.backup.fullshutdown.restore" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.7.1.3. 恢复 (如有必要)</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
通过distcp，从 HDFS备份的数据被拷贝到 '真实' 的hbase 目录。 复制动作产生新的 HDFS 元数据， 所以并不需要从备份的NameNode 元数据恢复, 因为是通过distcp从一个特定的 HDFS 目录 (如, HBase 部分)复制， 不是整个HDFS 文件系统。</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.7.2. Live Cluster Backup - Replication" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t551" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.backup.live.replication" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.7.2. 工作集群备份 - Replication</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
这种方法假设有另一个集群。参考HBase的 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://hbase.apache.org/replication.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">replication</a> 。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.7.3. Live Cluster Backup - CopyTable" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t552" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.backup.live.copytable" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.7.3. 工作集群备份 - CopyTable</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#copytable" rel="nofollow" title="14.1.6. CopyTable" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none"> 14.1.6节, “CopyTable”</a> 工具，即可用于将一个表复制到同集群的另一个表，也可将表复制到另一个集群的另一个表。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
由于集群在工作，有丢失正在改变的数据的风险。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.7.4. Live Cluster Backup - Export" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t553" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.backup.live.export" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.7.4. 工作集群备份 - Export</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#export" rel="nofollow" title="14.1.7. Export" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none"> 14.1.7节, “Export”</a> 是一种将 HDFS 内容导出到同一集群的方法。 恢复数据， <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#import" rel="nofollow" title="14.1.8. Import" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">14.1.8节,
 “Import”</a> 工具可以使用。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
由于集群在工作，有丢失正在改变的数据的风险。</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.8. Capacity Planning" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t554" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.capacity" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.8. 容量计划</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.8.1. Storage" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t555" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.capacity.storage" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.8.1.存储</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
一个常见问题是HBase管理员需要估算一个HBase集群要用多大存储量。可以通过几个方面去考虑，最重要的是集群要加载什么数据。 开始于对HBase内部处理数据(KeyValue)的可靠了解。</p>
<div class="section" title="14.8.1.1. KeyValue" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t556" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.capacity.storage.kv" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.8.1.1. KeyValue</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase storage will be dominated by KeyValues. 参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#keyvalue" rel="nofollow" title="9.7.5.4. KeyValue" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7.5.4, “KeyValue”</a> and <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#keysize" rel="nofollow" title="6.3.2. Try to minimize row and column sizes" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 6.3.2,
 “Try to minimize row and column sizes”</a> for how HBase stores data internally.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
It is critical to understand that there is a KeyValue instance for every attribute stored in a row, and the rowkey-length, ColumnFamily name-length and attribute lengths will drive the size of the database more than any other factor.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.8.1.2. StoreFiles and Blocks" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t557" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.capacity.storage.sf" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.8.1.2. StoreFiles and Blocks</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
KeyValue instances are aggregated into blocks, and the blocksize is configurable on a per-ColumnFamily basis. Blocks are aggregated into StoreFile's. 参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#regions.arch" rel="nofollow" title="9.7. Regions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 9.7,
 “Regions”</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.8.1.3. HDFS Block Replication" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t558" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.capacity.storage.hdfs" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.8.1.3. HDFS Block Replication</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Because HBase runs on top of HDFS, factor in HDFS block replication into storage calculations.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="14.8.2. Regions" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t559" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ops.capacity.regions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>14.8.2. 区域</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Another common question for HBase administrators is determining the right number of regions per RegionServer. This affects both storage and hardware planning. 参考 <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#perf.number.of.regions" rel="nofollow" title="11.4.1. Number of Regions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 11.4.1,
 “Number of Regions”</a>.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="chapter" title="Chapter 15. Building and Developing HBase" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t560" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="developer" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>Chapter 15. 创建和部署HBase</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="toc" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
This chapter will be of interest only to those building and developing HBase (i.e., as opposed to just downloading the latest distribution).</p>
<div class="section" title="15.1. HBase Repositories" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t561" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="repos" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.1. HBase 版本库</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.1.1. SVN" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">

</div>
</div>
</div>

        </pre></div>
<div class="section" title="15.1.2. Git" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t563" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="git" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.1.2. Git</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_153_7742424" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">git clone git://git.apache.org/hbase.git
        </pre></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.2. IDEs" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t564" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="ides" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.2. IDEs</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.2.1. Eclipse" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t565" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="eclipse" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.2.1. Eclipse</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.2.1.1. Code Formatting" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t566" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="eclipse.code.formatting" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.2.1.1. Code Formatting</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-3678" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBASE-3678 Add Eclipse-based Apache Formatter to HBase Wiki</a> for an Eclipse formatter to help ensure
 your code conforms to HBase'y coding convention. The issue includes instructions for loading the attached formatter.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
In addition to the automatic formatting, make sure you follow the style guidelines explained in <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#common.patch.feedback" rel="nofollow" title="15.9.5. Common Patch Feedback" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 15.10.5,
 “Common Patch Feedback”</a></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Also, no @author tags - that's a rule. Quality Javadoc comments are appreciated. And include the Apache license.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.2.1.2. Subversive Plugin" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t567" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="eclipse.svn" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.2.1.2. Subversive Plugin</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Download and install the Subversive plugin.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Set up an SVN Repository target from <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#svn" rel="nofollow" title="15.1.1. SVN" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 15.1.1, “SVN”</a>, then check out the code.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.2.1.3. Git Plugin" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t568" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="eclipse.git.plugin" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.2.1.3. Git Plugin</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If you cloned the project via git, download and install the Git plugin (EGit). Attach to your local git repo (via the Git Repositories window) and you'll be able to see file revision history, generate patches, etc.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.2.1.4. HBase Project Setup in Eclipse" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t569" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="eclipse.maven.setup" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.2.1.4. HBase Project Setup in Eclipse</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The easiest way is to use the m2eclipse plugin for Eclipse. Eclipse Indigo or newer has m2eclipse built-in, or it can be found here:http://www.eclipse.org/m2e/. M2Eclipse provides Maven integration for Eclipse - it even lets you use the direct Maven commands
 from within Eclipse to compile and test your project.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
To import the project, you merely need to go to File-&gt;Import...Maven-&gt;Existing Maven Projects and then point Eclipse at the HBase root directory; m2eclipse will automatically find all the hbase modules for you.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If you install m2eclipse and import HBase in your workspace, you will have to fix your eclipse Build Path. Remove <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">target</code> folder, add <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">target/generated-jamon</code> and <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">target/generated-sources/java</code> folders.
 You may also remove from your Build Path the exclusions on the <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">src/main/resources</code> and <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">src/test/resources</code> to avoid error message in the console
 'Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-antrun-plugin:1.6:run (default) on project hbase: 'An Ant BuildException has occured: Replace: source file .../target/classes/hbase-default.xml doesn't exist'. This will also reduce the eclipse build cycles
 and make your life easier when developing.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.2.1.5. Import into eclipse with the command line" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t570" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="eclipse.commandline" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.2.1.5. Import into eclipse with the command line</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
For those not inclined to use m2eclipse, you can generate the Eclipse files from the command line. First, run (you should only have to do this once):</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_154_7789997" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">mvn clean install -DskipTests</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
and then close Eclipse and execute...</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_155_2023889" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">mvn eclipse:eclipse</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
... from your local HBase project directory in your workspace to generate some new <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">.project</code> and <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">.classpath</code>files. Then reopen Eclipse, and import
 the .project file in the HBase directory to a workspace.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.2.1.6. Maven Classpath Variable" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t571" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="eclipse.maven.class" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.2.1.6. Maven Classpath Variable</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The <code class="varname">M2_REPO</code> classpath variable needs to be set up for the project. This needs to be set to your local Maven repository, which is usually <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">~/.m2/repository</code></p>
If this classpath variable is not configured, you will see compile errors in Eclipse like this...<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_156_9289423" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">Description	Resource	Path	Location	Type
The project cannot be built until build path errors are resolved	hbase		Unknown	Java Problem 
Unbound classpath variable: 'M2_REPO/asm/asm/3.1/asm-3.1.jar' in project 'hbase'	hbase		Build path	Build Path Problem
Unbound classpath variable: 'M2_REPO/com/github/stephenc/high-scale-lib/high-scale-lib/1.1.1/high-scale-lib-1.1.1.jar' in project 'hbase'	hbase		Build path	Build Path Problem 
Unbound classpath variable: 'M2_REPO/com/google/guava/guava/r09/guava-r09.jar' in project 'hbase'	hbase		Build path	Build Path Problem
Unbound classpath variable: 'M2_REPO/com/google/protobuf/protobuf-java/2.3.0/protobuf-java-2.3.0.jar' in project 'hbase'	hbase		Build path	Build Path Problem Unbound classpath variable:
            </pre></div>
<div class="section" title="15.2.1.7. Eclipse Known Issues" style="margin:0px">

</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Eclipse will currently complain about <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">Bytes.java</code>. It is not possible to turn these errors off.</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_157_5159519" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">

<div class="section" title="15.2.1.8. Eclipse - More Information" style="margin:0px">

For additional information on setting up Eclipse for HBase development on Windows, see <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://michaelmorello.blogspot.com/2011/09/hbase-subversion-eclipse-windows.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Michael
 Morello's blog</a> on the topic.</p>

</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.3. Building HBase" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t574" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="build" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.3. 创建HBase</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
This section will be of interest only to those building HBase from source.</p>
<div class="section" title="15.3.1. Building in snappy compression support" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t575" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="build.snappy" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.3.1. Building in snappy compression support</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Pass <code class="code">-Dsnappy</code> to trigger the snappy maven profile for building snappy native libs into hbase.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.3.2. Building the HBase tarball" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t576" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="build.tgz" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.3.2. Building the HBase tarball</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Do the following to build the HBase tarball. Passing the -Drelease will generate javadoc and run the RAT plugin to verify licenses on source.</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_158_8521358" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">% MAVEN_OPTS="-Xmx2g" mvn clean site install assembly:single -Dmaven.test.skip -Prelease</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.3.3. Adding an HBase release to Apache's Maven Repository" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t577" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="mvn_repo" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.3.3. Adding an HBase release to Apache's Maven Repository</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Follow the instructions at <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://www.apache.org/dev/publishing-maven-artifacts.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Publishing Maven Artifacts</a>. The 'trick' to making it all work
 is answering the questions put to you by the mvn release plugin properly, making sure it is using the actual branch AND before doing the <span class="command"><strong>mvn release:perform</strong></span> step, VERY IMPORTANT, check and if necessary hand edit
 the release.properties file that was put under <code class="varname">${HBASE_HOME}</code> by the previous step,<span class="command"><strong>release:perform</strong></span>. You need to edit it to make it point at right locations in SVN.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Use maven 3.0.x.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
At the <span class="command"><strong>mvn release:perform</strong></span> step, before starting, if you are for example releasing hbase 0.92.0, you need to make sure the pom.xml version is 0.92.0-SNAPSHOT. This needs to be checked in. Since we do the maven release
 after actual release, I've been doing this checkin into a particular tag rather than into the actual release tag. So, say we released hbase 0.92.0 and now we want to do the release to the maven repository, in svn, the 0.92.0 release will be tagged 0.92.0.
 Making the maven release, copy the 0.92.0 tag to 0.92.0mvn. Check out this tag and change the version therein and commit.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Here is how I'd answer the questions at <span class="command"><strong>release:prepare</strong></span> time:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_159_2821291" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">What is the release version for "HBase"? (org.apache.hbase:hbase) 0.92.0: : 
What is SCM release tag or label for "HBase"? (org.apache.hbase:hbase) hbase-0.92.0: : 0.92.0mvnrelease
What is the new development version for "HBase"? (org.apache.hbase:hbase) 0.92.1-SNAPSHOT: : 
[INFO] Transforming 'HBase'...</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A strange issue I ran into was the one where the upload into the apache repository was being sprayed across multiple apache machines making it so I could not release. 参考 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/INFRA-4482" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">INFRA-4482
 Why is my upload to mvn spread across multiple repositories?</a>.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" name="mvn.settings.file" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>Here is my <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">~/.m2/settings.xml</code>.</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_160_7328965" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">&lt;settings xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/SETTINGS/1.0.0"
  xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
  xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/SETTINGS/1.0.0
                      http://maven.apache.org/xsd/settings-1.0.0.xsd"&gt;
  &lt;servers&gt;
    &lt;!- To publish a snapshot of some part of Maven --&gt;
    &lt;server&gt;
      &lt;id&gt;apache.snapshots.https&lt;/id&gt;
      &lt;username&gt;YOUR_APACHE_ID
      &lt;/username&gt;
      &lt;password&gt;YOUR_APACHE_PASSWORD
      &lt;/password&gt;
    &lt;/server&gt;
    &lt;!-- To publish a website using Maven --&gt;
    &lt;!-- To stage a release of some part of Maven --&gt;
    &lt;server&gt;
      &lt;id&gt;apache.releases.https&lt;/id&gt;
      &lt;username&gt;YOUR_APACHE_ID
      &lt;/username&gt;
      &lt;password&gt;YOUR_APACHE_PASSWORD
      &lt;/password&gt;
    &lt;/server&gt;
  &lt;/servers&gt;
  &lt;profiles&gt;
    &lt;profile&gt;
      &lt;id&gt;apache-release&lt;/id&gt;
      &lt;properties&gt;
    &lt;gpg.keyname&gt;YOUR_KEYNAME&lt;/gpg.keyname&gt;
    &lt;!--Keyname is something like this ... 00A5F21E... do gpg --list-keys to find it--&gt;
    &lt;gpg.passphrase&gt;YOUR_KEY_PASSWORD
    &lt;/gpg.passphrase&gt;
      &lt;/properties&gt;
    &lt;/profile&gt;
  &lt;/profiles&gt;
&lt;/settings&gt;
        </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
When you run <span class="command"><strong>release:perform</strong></span>, pass <span class="command"><strong>-Papache-release</strong></span> else it will not 'sign' the artifacts it uploads.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If you see run into the below, its because you need to edit version in the pom.xml and add <code class="code">-SNAPSHOT</code> to the version (and commit).</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_161_7102755" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[INFO] Searching repository for plugin with prefix: 'release'.
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Building HBase
[INFO]    task-segment: [release:prepare] (aggregator-style)
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] [release:prepare {execution: default-cli}]
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] BUILD FAILURE
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] You don't have a SNAPSHOT project in the reactor projects list.
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] For more information, run Maven with the -e switch
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time: 3 seconds
[INFO] Finished at: Sat Mar 26 18:11:07 PDT 2011
[INFO] Final Memory: 35M/423M
[INFO] -----------------------------------------------------------------------</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.3.4. Build Gotchas" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t578" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="build.gotchas" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.3.4. Build Gotchas</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If you see <code class="code">Unable to find resource 'VM_global_library.vm'</code>, ignore it. Its not an error. It is <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MSITE-286" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">officially
 ugly</a> though.</p>
<div title="15.4. Adding an Apache HBase release to Apache's Maven Repository" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t579" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.4. Adding an Apache HBase release to Apache's Maven Repository</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Follow the instructions at <a target="_blank" href="http://www.apache.org/dev/publishing-maven-artifacts.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Publishing Maven Artifacts</a> after reading the below miscellaney.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
You must use maven 3.0.x (Check by running <strong>mvn -version</strong>).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Let me list out the commands I used first. The sections that follow dig in more on what is going on. In this example, we are releasing the 0.92.2 jar to the apache maven repository.</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">  # First make a copy of the tag we want to release; presumes the release has been tagged already    # We do this because we need to make some commits for the mvn release plugin to work.    853  svn copy -m "Publishing 0.92.2 to mvn"  https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/hbase/tags/0.92.2 https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/hbase/tags/0.92.2mvn    857  svn checkout https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/hbase/tags/0.92.2mvn    858  cd 0.92.2mvn/    # Edit the version making it release version with a '-SNAPSHOT' suffix (See below for more on this)    860  vi pom.xml    861  svn commit -m "Add SNAPSHOT to the version" pom.xml    862  ~/bin/mvn/bin/mvn release:clean    865  ~/bin/mvn/bin/mvn release:prepare    866  # Answer questions and then ^C to kill the build after the last question. See below for more on this.    867  vi release.properties         # Change the references to trunk svn to be 0.92.2mvn; the release plugin presumes trunk         # Then restart the release:prepare -- it won't ask questions         # because the properties file exists.    868  ~/bin/mvn/bin/mvn release:prepare    # The apache-release profile comes from the apache parent pom and does signing of artifacts published    869  ~/bin/mvn/bin/mvn release:perform  -Papache-release         # When done copying up to apache staging repository,         # browse to repository.apache.org, login and finish         # the release as according to the above         # "Publishing Maven Artifacts.          </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Below is more detail on the commmands listed above.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
At the <strong>mvn release:perform</strong> step, before starting, if you are for example releasing hbase 0.92.2, you need to make sure the pom.xml version is 0.92.2-SNAPSHOT. This needs to be checked in. Since we do the maven release after actual release,
 I've been doing this checkin into a copy of the release tag rather than into the actual release tag itself (presumes the release has been properly tagged in svn). So, say we released hbase 0.92.2 and now we want to do the release to the maven repository, in
 svn, the 0.92.2 release will be tagged 0.92.2. Making the maven release, copy the 0.92.2 tag to 0.92.2mvn. Check out this tag and change the version therein and commit.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Currently, the mvn release wants to go against trunk. I haven't figured how to tell it to do otherwise so I do the below hack. The hack comprises answering the questions put to you by the mvn release plugin properly, then immediately control-C'ing the build
 after the last question asked as the build release step starts to run. After control-C'ing it, You'll notice a release.properties in your build dir. Review it. Make sure it is using the proper branch -- it tends to use trunk rather than the 0.92.2mvn or whatever
 that you want it to use -- so hand edit the release.properties file that was put under ${HBASE_HOME} by the <strong>release:perform</strong> invocation. When done, resstart the <strong>release:perform</strong>.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Here is how I'd answer the questions at <strong>release:prepare</strong> time:</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">What is the release version for "HBase"? (org.apache.hbase:hbase) 0.92.2: :  What is SCM release tag or label for "HBase"? (org.apache.hbase:hbase) hbase-0.92.2: : 0.92.2mvn  What is the new development version for "HBase"? (org.apache.hbase:hbase) 0.92.3-SNAPSHOT: :  [INFO] Transforming 'HBase'...</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
When you run <strong>release:perform</strong>, pass <strong>-Papache-release</strong> else it will not 'sign' the artifacts it uploads.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A strange issue I ran into was the one where the upload into the apache repository was being sprayed across multiple apache machines making it so I could not release. See<a target="_blank" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/INFRA-4482" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">INFRA-4482
 Why is my upload to mvn spread across multiple repositories?</a>.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<a target="_blank" name="mvn.settings.file" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>Here is my ~/.m2/settings.xml. This is read by the release plugin. The apache-release profile will pick up your gpg key setup from here if you've specified it into
 the file. The password can be maven encrypted as suggested in the "Publishing Maven Artifacts" but plain text password works too (just don't let anyone see your local settings.xml).</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">&lt;settings xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/SETTINGS/1.0.0"    xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"    xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/SETTINGS/1.0.0                        http://maven.apache.org/xsd/settings-1.0.0.xsd"&gt;    &lt;servers&gt;      &lt;!- To publish a snapshot of some part of Maven --&gt;      &lt;server&gt;        &lt;id&gt;apache.snapshots.https&lt;/id&gt;        &lt;username&gt;YOUR_APACHE_ID        &lt;/username&gt;        &lt;password&gt;YOUR_APACHE_PASSWORD        &lt;/password&gt;      &lt;/server&gt;      &lt;!-- To publish a website using Maven --&gt;      &lt;!-- To stage a release of some part of Maven --&gt;      &lt;server&gt;        &lt;id&gt;apache.releases.https&lt;/id&gt;        &lt;username&gt;YOUR_APACHE_ID        &lt;/username&gt;        &lt;password&gt;YOUR_APACHE_PASSWORD        &lt;/password&gt;      &lt;/server&gt;    &lt;/servers&gt;    &lt;profiles&gt;      &lt;profile&gt;        &lt;id&gt;apache-release&lt;/id&gt;        &lt;properties&gt;      &lt;gpg.keyname&gt;YOUR_KEYNAME&lt;/gpg.keyname&gt;      &lt;!--Keyname is something like this ... 00A5F21E... do gpg --list-keys to find it--&gt;      &lt;gpg.passphrase&gt;YOUR_KEY_PASSWORD      &lt;/gpg.passphrase&gt;        &lt;/properties&gt;      &lt;/profile&gt;    &lt;/profiles&gt;  &lt;/settings&gt;          </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If you see run into the below, its because you need to edit version in the pom.xml and add -SNAPSHOT to the version (and commit).</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">[INFO] Scanning for projects...  [INFO] Searching repository for plugin with prefix: 'release'.  [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------  [INFO] Building HBase  [INFO]    task-segment: [release:prepare] (aggregator-style)  [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------  [INFO] [release:prepare {execution: default-cli}]  [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------  [ERROR] BUILD FAILURE  [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------  [INFO] You don't have a SNAPSHOT project in the reactor projects list.  [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------  [INFO] For more information, run Maven with the -e switch  [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------  [INFO] Total time: 3 seconds  [INFO] Finished at: Sat Mar 26 18:11:07 PDT 2011  [INFO] Final Memory: 35M/423M  [INFO] -----------------------------------------------------------------------</pre>
</div>
<div title="15.5. Generating the HBase Reference Guide" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px"><br>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.4. Publishing a new version of hbase.apache.org" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px"></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t580" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.5. Generating the HBase Reference Guide</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The manual is marked up using <a target="_blank" href="http://www.docbook.org/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">docbook</a>. We then use the <a target="_blank" href="http://code.google.com/p/docbkx-tools/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">docbkx
 maven plugin</a> to transform the markup to html. This plugin is run when you specify the <strong>site</strong> goal as in when you run <strong>mvn site</strong> or you can call the plugin explicitly to just generate the manual by doing <strong>mvn docbkx:generate-html</strong> (TODO:
 It looks like you have to run <strong>mvn site</strong>first because docbkx wants to include a transformed hbase-default.xml. Fix). When you run mvn site, we do the document generation twice, once to generate the multipage manual and then again for the single
 page manual (the single page version is easier to search).</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t581" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.6. Updating hbase.apache.org</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div title="15.6.1. Contributing to hbase.apache.org" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t582" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.org.site.contributing" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.6.1. Contributing to hbase.apache.org</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The Apache HBase apache web site (including this reference guide) is maintained as part of the main Apache HBase source tree, under /src/main/docbkx and /src/main/site [<a target="_blank" name="d2520e10462" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d2520e10462" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">30</a>].
 The former -- docbkx -- is this reference guide as a bunch of xml marked up using <a target="_blank" href="http://docbook.org/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">docbook</a>; the latter is the hbase site (the navbars, the header,
 the layout, etc.), and some of the documentation, legacy pages mostly that are in the process of being merged into the docbkx tree that is converted to html by a maven plugin by the site build.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
To contribute to the reference guide, edit these files under site or docbkx and submit them as a patch (see <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#submitting.patches" rel="nofollow" title="15.11. Submitting Patches" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 15.11,
 “Submitting Patches”</a>). Your Jira should contain a summary of the changes in each section (see <a target="_blank" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-6081" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBASE-6081</a> for
 an example).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
To generate the site locally while you're working on it, run:</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">mvn site</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Then you can load up the generated HTML files in your browser (file are under /target/site).</p>
</div>
<div title="15.6.2. Publishing hbase.apache.org" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t583" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.org.site.publishing" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.6.2. Publishing hbase.apache.org</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
As of <a target="_blank" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/INFRA-5680" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">INFRA-5680 Migrate apache hbase website</a>, to publish the website, build it, and then deploy it over a checkout
 ofhttps://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/hbase/hbase.apache.org/trunk. Finally, check it in. For example, if trunk is checked out out at /Users/stack/checkouts/trunk and the hbase website, hbase.apache.org, is checked out at /Users/stack/checkouts/hbase.apache.org/trunk,
 to update the site, do the following:</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">              # Build the site and deploy it to the checked out directory                # Getting the javadoc into site is a little tricky.  You have to build it before you invoke 'site'.                $ MAVEN_OPTS=" -Xmx3g" mvn clean install -DskipTests javadoc:aggregate site  site:stage -DstagingDirectory=/Users/stack/checkouts/hbase.apache.org/trunk            </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Now check the deployed site by viewing in a brower, browse to file:////Users/stack/checkouts/hbase.apache.org/trunk/index.html and check all is good. If all checks out, commit it and your new build will show up immediately at http://hbase.apache.org</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">              $ cd /Users/stack/checkouts/hbase.apache.org/trunk                $ svn status                # Do an svn add of any new content...                $ svn add ....                $ svn commit -m 'Committing latest version of website...'    </pre>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.5. Tests" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t584" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.tests" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.7. 测试</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Developers, at a minimum, should familiarize themselves with the unit test detail; unit tests in HBase have a character not usually seen in other projects.</p>
<div class="section" title="15.5.1. HBase Modules" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t585" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.moduletests" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.7.1. HBase 模块</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
As of 0.96, HBase is split into multiple modules which creates "interesting" rules for how and where tests are written. If you are writting code for <code class="classname">hbase-server</code>, see <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hbase.unittests" rel="nofollow" title="15.5.2. Unit Tests" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 15.7.2,
 “Unit Tests”</a>for how to write your tests; these tests can spin up a minicluster and will need to be categorized. For any other module, for example <code class="classname">hbase-common</code>, the tests must be strict unit tests and just test the class under
 test - no use of the HBaseTestingUtility or minicluster is allowed (or even possible given the dependency tree).</p>
<div class="section" title="15.5.1.1. Running Tests in other Modules" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t586" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.moduletest.run" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.7.1.1. 在其他模块中运行测试</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
If the module you are developing in has no other dependencies on other HBase modules, then you can cd into that module and just run:<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_162_3288495" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">mvn test</pre>which will just run the tests IN THAT MODULE. If there are other dependencies on other modules, then you will
 have run the command from the ROOT HBASE DIRECTORY. This will run the tests in the other modules, unless you specify to skip the tests in that module. For instance, to skip the tests in the hbase-server module, you would run:<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_163_587049" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">mvn clean test -Dskip-server-tests</pre>from the top
 level directory to run all the tests in modules other than hbase-server. Note that you can specify to skip tests in multiple modules as well as just for a single module. For example, to skip the tests in <code class="classname">hbase-server</code> and <code class="classname">hbase-common</code>,
 you would run:<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_164_8998418" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">mvn clean test -Dskip-server-tests -Dskip-common-tests</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Also, keep in mind that if you are running tests in the <code class="classname">hbase-server</code> module you will need to apply the maven profiles discussed in <a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hbase.unittests.cmds" rel="nofollow" title="15.5.2.4. Running tests" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 15.7.2.4,
 “Running tests”</a> to get the tests to run properly.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="15.5.2. Unit Tests" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t587" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.unittests" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.7.2. 单元测试</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div title="15.7. Tests" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px"></div>
</div>
</div>
<div title="15.7.1. Apache HBase Modules" style="margin:0px"></div>
<div title="15.7.2. Unit Tests" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px"></div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Apache HBase unit tests are subdivided into four categories: small, medium, large, and integration with corresponding JUnit <a target="_blank" href="http://www.junit.org/node/581" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">categories</a>: SmallTests, MediumTests, LargeTests,IntegrationTests.
 JUnit categories are denoted using java annotations and look like this in your unit test code.</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">...  @Category(SmallTests.class)  public class TestHRegionInfo {    @Test    public void testCreateHRegionInfoName() throws Exception {      // ...    }  }</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The above example shows how to mark a unit test as belonging to the small category. All unit tests in HBase have a categorization.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The first three categories, small, medium, and large are for tests run when you type $ mvn test; i.e. these three categorizations are for HBase unit tests. The integration category is for not for unit tests but for integration tests. These are run when you
 invoke $ mvn verify. Integration tests are described in <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#integration.tests" rel="nofollow" title="15.7.5. Integration Tests" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 15.7.5, “Integration
 Tests”</a> and will not be discussed further in this section on HBase unit tests.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Apache HBase uses a patched maven surefire plugin and maven profiles to implement its unit test characterizations.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Read the below to figure which annotation of the set small, medium, and large to put on your new HBase unit test.</p>
<div title="15.7.2.1. Small Tests" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t588" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.unittests.small" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.7.2.1. Small Tests<a target="_blank" name="d2520e10591" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<em>Small</em> tests are executed in a shared JVM. We put in this category all the tests that can be executed quickly in a shared JVM. The maximum execution time for a small test is 15 seconds, and small tests should not use a (mini)cluster.</p>
</div>
<div title="15.7.2.2. Medium Tests" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t589" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.unittests.medium" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.7.2.2. Medium Tests<a target="_blank" name="d2520e10602" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<em>Medium</em> tests represent tests that must be executed before proposing a patch. They are designed to run in less than 30 minutes altogether, and are quite stable in their results. They are designed to last less than 50 seconds individually. They can use
 a cluster, and each of them is executed in a separate JVM.</p>
</div>
<div title="15.7.2.3. Large Tests" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t590" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.unittests.large" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.7.2.3. Large Tests<a target="_blank" name="d2520e10612" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<em>Large</em> tests are everything else. They are typically large-scale tests, regression tests for specific bugs, timeout tests, performance tests. They are executed before a commit on the pre-integration machines. They can be run on the developer machine
 as well.</p>
</div>
<div title="15.7.2.4. Integration Tests" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t591" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.unittests.integration" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.7.2.4. Integration Tests<a target="_blank" name="d2520e10622" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<em>Integration</em> tests are system level tests. See <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#integration.tests" rel="nofollow" title="15.7.5. Integration Tests" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 15.7.5, “Integration
 Tests”</a> for more info.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div title="15.7.3. Running tests" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t592" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.unittests.cmds" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.7.3. Running tests</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Below we describe how to run the Apache HBase junit categories.</p>
<div title="15.7.3.1. Default: small and medium category tests" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t593" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.unittests.cmds.test" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.7.3.1. Default: small and medium category tests</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Running</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">mvn test</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
will execute all small tests in a single JVM (no fork) and then medium tests in a separate JVM for each test instance. Medium tests are NOT executed if there is an error in a small test. Large tests are NOT executed. There is one report for small tests, and
 one report for medium tests if they are executed.</p>
</div>
<div title="15.7.3.2. Running all tests" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t594" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.unittests.cmds.test.runAllTests" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.7.3.2. Running all tests</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Running</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">mvn test -P runAllTests</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
will execute small tests in a single JVM then medium and large tests in a separate JVM for each test. Medium and large tests are NOT executed if there is an error in a small test. Large tests are NOT executed if there is an error in a small or medium test.
 There is one report for small tests, and one report for medium and large tests if they are executed.</p>
</div>
<div title="15.7.3.3. Running a single test or all tests in a package" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t595" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.unittests.cmds.test.localtests.mytest" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.7.3.3. Running a single test or all tests in a package</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
To run an individual test, e.g. MyTest, do</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">mvn test -Dtest=MyTest</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
You can also pass multiple, individual tests as a comma-delimited list:</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">mvn test -Dtest=MyTest1,MyTest2,MyTest3</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
You can also pass a package, which will run all tests under the package:</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">mvn test -Dtest=org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.*</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
When -Dtest is specified, localTests profile will be used. It will use the official release of maven surefire, rather than our custom surefire plugin, and the old connector (The HBase build uses a patched version of the maven surefire plugin). Each junit tests
 is executed in a separate JVM (A fork per test class). There is no parallelization when tests are running in this mode. You will see a new message at the end of the -report: "[INFO] Tests are skipped". It's harmless. While you need to make sure the sum of Tests
 run: in the Results : section of test reports matching the number of tests you specified because no error will be reported when a non-existent test case is specified.</p>
</div>
<div title="15.7.3.4. Other test invocation permutations" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t596" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.unittests.cmds.test.profiles" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>15.7.3.4. Other test invocation permutations</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Running</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">mvn test -P runSmallTests</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
will execute "small" tests only, using a single JVM.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Running</p>
<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap; word-wrap:break-word; margin-top:0.75em; margin-bottom:0.75em; line-height:1">mvn test -P runMediumTests</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
