ZooKeeper/HBase 互相认证 (<a target="_blank" class="link" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-2418" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBASE-2418</a>) 是 HBase安全配置所必不可少的一部分 (<a target="_blank" class="link" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-3025" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBASE-3025</a>)。
 为简化说明, 本节忽略所必需的额外配置 ( HDFS 安全和 Coprocessor 配置)。 推荐使用HBase内置 Zookeeper 配置 (相对独立 Zookeeper quorum) 以简化学习.</p>
<div class="section" title="2.5.2.1. Operating System Prerequisites" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t653" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e1097" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>16.2.1. 操作系统预置</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
需要一个工作 Kerberos KDC 配置. 每个 <code class="code">$HOST</code> 运行一个 ZooKeeper 服务器, 应该有个主要的 <code class="code">zookeeper/$HOST</code>. 对每个主机，为 <code class="code">zookeeper/$HOST</code>添加一个 key (使用 <code class="code">kadmin</code> 或 <code class="code">kadmin.local</code> 工具的 <code class="code">ktadd</code> 命令)
 ，将该key文件复制到 <code class="code">$HOST</code>, 并设置仅对该 <code class="code">$HOST</code>上运行 zookeeper 的用户只读。注意文件位置, 我们将在下面以 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$PATH_TO_ZOOKEEPER_KEYTAB</code> 使用。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Similarly, for each <code class="code">$HOST</code> that will run an HBase server (master or regionserver), you should have a principle: <code class="code">hbase/$HOST</code>. For each host, add a keytab file called <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase.keytab</code> containing
 a service key for <code class="code">hbase/$HOST</code>, copy this file to <code class="code">$HOST</code>, and make it readable only to the user that will run an HBase service on <code class="code">$HOST</code>. Note the location of this file, which we will
 use below as<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$PATH_TO_HBASE_KEYTAB</code>.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Each user who will be an HBase client should also be given a Kerberos principal. This principal should usually have a password assigned to it (as opposed to, as with the HBase servers, a keytab file) which only this user knows. The client's principal's <code class="code">maxrenewlife</code> should
 be set so that it can be renewed enough so that the user can complete their HBase client processes. For example, if a user runs a long-running HBase client process that takes at most 3 days, we might create this user's principal within <code class="code">kadmin</code> with: <code class="code">addprinc
 -maxrenewlife 3days</code>. The Zookeeper client and server libraries manage their own ticket refreshment by running threads that wake up periodically to do the refreshment.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
On each host that will run an HBase client (e.g. <code class="code">hbase shell</code>), add the following file to the HBase home directory's <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">conf</code> directory:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_168_8334340" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                  Client {
                    com.sun.security.auth.module.Krb5LoginModule required
                    useKeyTab=false
                    useTicketCache=true;
                  };
                </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
We'll refer to this JAAS configuration file as <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$CLIENT_CONF</code> below.</p>
<div class="section" title="2.5.2.2. HBase-managed Zookeeper Configuration" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t654" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e1178" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>16.2.2. HBase内置的 Zookeeper 配置</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
每个节点要运行一个 zookeeper, 一个主服务, 或一个 regionserver,在<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">HBASE_HOME</code>的conf目录中创建如下所示的 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/1.4.2/docs/guide/security/jgss/tutorials/LoginConfigFile.html" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">JAAS</a> 配置文件:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_169_9220945" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                  Server {
                    com.sun.security.auth.module.Krb5LoginModule required
                    useKeyTab=true
                    keyTab="$PATH_TO_ZOOKEEPER_KEYTAB"
                    storeKey=true
                    useTicketCache=false
                    principal="zookeeper/$HOST";
                  };
                  Client {
                    com.sun.security.auth.module.Krb5LoginModule required
                    useKeyTab=true
                    useTicketCache=false
                    keyTab="$PATH_TO_HBASE_KEYTAB"
                    principal="hbase/$HOST";
                  };
                </pre><code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$PATH_TO_HBASE_KEYTAB</code> 和 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$PATH_TO_ZOOKEEPER_KEYTAB</code>文件是上面创建的。 <code class="code">$HOST</code> 该节点主机名.
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">Server</code> 由 Zookeeper quorum 服务器使用, <code class="code">Client</code> 节由 HBase master 和 regionserver使用。 The path to this file should be substituted for the text <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$HBASE_SERVER_CONF</code> in
 the <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-env.sh</code> listing below.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The path to this file should be substituted for the text <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$CLIENT_CONF</code> in the <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-env.sh</code> listing below.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Modify your <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-env.sh</code> to include the following:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_170_107551" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                  export HBASE_OPTS="-Djava.security.auth.login.config=$CLIENT_CONF"
                  export HBASE_MANAGES_ZK=true
                  export HBASE_ZOOKEEPER_OPTS="-Djava.security.auth.login.config=$HBASE_SERVER_CONF"
                  export HBASE_MASTER_OPTS="-Djava.security.auth.login.config=$HBASE_SERVER_CONF"
                  export HBASE_REGIONSERVER_OPTS="-Djava.security.auth.login.config=$HBASE_SERVER_CONF"
                </pre>where <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$HBASE_SERVER_CONF</code> and <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$CLIENT_CONF</code> are the full paths to the JAAS configuration files created above.
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Modify your <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-site.xml</code> on each node that will run zookeeper, master or regionserver to contain:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_171_4374462" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                  &lt;configuration&gt;
                    &lt;property&gt;
                      &lt;name&gt;hbase.zookeeper.quorum&lt;/name&gt;
                      &lt;value&gt;$ZK_NODES&lt;/value&gt;
                    &lt;/property&gt;
                    &lt;property&gt;
                      &lt;name&gt;hbase.cluster.distributed&lt;/name&gt;
                      &lt;value&gt;true&lt;/value&gt;
                    &lt;/property&gt;
                    &lt;property&gt;
                      &lt;name&gt;hbase.zookeeper.property.authProvider.1&lt;/name&gt;
                      &lt;value&gt;org.apache.zookeeper.server.auth.SASLAuthenticationProvider&lt;/value&gt;
                    &lt;/property&gt;
                    &lt;property&gt;
                      &lt;name&gt;hbase.zookeeper.property.kerberos.removeHostFromPrincipal&lt;/name&gt;
                      &lt;value&gt;true&lt;/value&gt;
                    &lt;/property&gt;
                    &lt;property&gt;
                      &lt;name&gt;hbase.zookeeper.property.kerberos.removeRealmFromPrincipal&lt;/name&gt;
                      &lt;value&gt;true&lt;/value&gt;
                    &lt;/property&gt;
                  &lt;/configuration&gt;
                  </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
where <code class="code">$ZK_NODES</code> is the comma-separated list of hostnames of the Zookeeper Quorum hosts.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Start your hbase cluster by running one or more of the following set of commands on the appropriate hosts:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_172_2196405" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                  bin/hbase zookeeper start
                  bin/hbase master start
                  bin/hbase regionserver start
                </pre></div>
<div class="section" title="2.5.2.3. External Zookeeper Configuration" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t655" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e1253" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>16.2.3. 外部 Zookeeper 配置</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
增加 JAAS 配置文件:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_173_5939928" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                  Client {
                    com.sun.security.auth.module.Krb5LoginModule required
                    useKeyTab=true
                    useTicketCache=false
                    keyTab="$PATH_TO_HBASE_KEYTAB"
                    principal="hbase/$HOST";
                  };
                </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$PATH_TO_HBASE_KEYTAB</code> 是上面创建的keytab，以便 HBase 服务可以在本主机运行 , <code class="code">$HOST</code> 是该节点的 hostname . 将该配置放到 HBase home配置目录.在下面的 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$HBASE_SERVER_CONF</code> 进行引用.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
修改 hbase-env.sh 增加如下项:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_174_1777004" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                  export HBASE_OPTS="-Djava.security.auth.login.config=$CLIENT_CONF"
                  export HBASE_MANAGES_ZK=false
                  export HBASE_MASTER_OPTS="-Djava.security.auth.login.config=$HBASE_SERVER_CONF"
                  export HBASE_REGIONSERVER_OPTS="-Djava.security.auth.login.config=$HBASE_SERVER_CONF"
                </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
修改每个节点的 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-site.xml</code> 包含下面内容:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_175_8759913" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                  &lt;configuration&gt;
                    &lt;property&gt;
                      &lt;name&gt;hbase.zookeeper.quorum&lt;/name&gt;
                      &lt;value&gt;$ZK_NODES&lt;/value&gt;
                    &lt;/property&gt;
                    &lt;property&gt;
                      &lt;name&gt;hbase.cluster.distributed&lt;/name&gt;
                      &lt;value&gt;true&lt;/value&gt;
                    &lt;/property&gt;
                  &lt;/configuration&gt;
                  
                </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">$ZK_NODES</code>是逗号分隔的Zookeeper Quorum主机名列表。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
每个Zookeeper Quorum节点增加 <code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">zoo.cfg</code> 包含下列内容:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_176_2437399" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                      authProvider.1=org.apache.zookeeper.server.auth.SASLAuthenticationProvider
                      kerberos.removeHostFromPrincipal=true
                      kerberos.removeRealmFromPrincipal=true
                  </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
在每个主机创建 JAAS 配置并包含:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_177_4719443" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                  Server {
                    com.sun.security.auth.module.Krb5LoginModule required
                    useKeyTab=true
                    keyTab="$PATH_TO_ZOOKEEPER_KEYTAB"
                    storeKey=true
                    useTicketCache=false
                    principal="zookeeper/$HOST";
                  };
                  </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<code class="code">$HOST</code> 每个Quorum 的主机名. 我们会在下面的<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">$ZK_SERVER_CONF</code>引用本文件的全路径名称.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
在每个 Zookeeper Quorum主机启动 Zookeeper:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_178_6129436" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                    SERVER_JVMFLAGS="-Djava.security.auth.login.config=$ZK_SERVER_CONF" bin/zkServer start
                  </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
启动HBase 集群。在适当的节点运行下面的一到多个命令：</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_179_47684" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                  bin/hbase master start
                  bin/hbase regionserver start
                </pre></div>
<div class="section" title="2.5.2.4. Zookeeper Server Authentication Log Output" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t656" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e1312" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>16.2.4. Zookeeper 服务端认证日志输出</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果上面配置成功, 你应该可以看到如下所示的Zookeeper 服务器日志:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_180_5394390" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">11/12/05 22:43:39 INFO zookeeper.Login: successfully logged in.
11/12/05 22:43:39 INFO server.NIOServerCnxnFactory: binding to port 0.0.0.0/0.0.0.0:2181
11/12/05 22:43:39 INFO zookeeper.Login: TGT refresh thread started.
11/12/05 22:43:39 INFO zookeeper.Login: TGT valid starting at:        Mon Dec 05 22:43:39 UTC 2011
11/12/05 22:43:39 INFO zookeeper.Login: TGT expires:                  Tue Dec 06 22:43:39 UTC 2011
11/12/05 22:43:39 INFO zookeeper.Login: TGT refresh sleeping until: Tue Dec 06 18:36:42 UTC 2011
..
11/12/05 22:43:59 INFO auth.SaslServerCallbackHandler: 
  Successfully authenticated client: authenticationID=hbase/ip-10-166-175-249.us-west-1.compute.internal@HADOOP.LOCALDOMAIN; 
  authorizationID=hbase/ip-10-166-175-249.us-west-1.compute.internal@HADOOP.LOCALDOMAIN.
11/12/05 22:43:59 INFO auth.SaslServerCallbackHandler: Setting authorizedID: hbase
11/12/05 22:43:59 INFO server.ZooKeeperServer: adding SASL authorization for authorizationID: hbase
                </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="2.5.2.5. Zookeeper Client Authentication Log Output" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t657" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e1320" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>16.2.5. Zookeeper 客户端认证日志输出</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Zookeeper 客户端侧 (HBase master 或 regionserver), 应该可以看到如下所示的东西:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_181_9727341" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">11/12/05 22:43:59 INFO zookeeper.ZooKeeper: Initiating client connection, connectString=ip-10-166-175-249.us-west-1.compute.internal:2181 sessionTimeout=180000 watcher=master:60000
11/12/05 22:43:59 INFO zookeeper.ClientCnxn: Opening socket connection to server /10.166.175.249:2181
11/12/05 22:43:59 INFO zookeeper.RecoverableZooKeeper: The identifier of this process is 14851@ip-10-166-175-249
11/12/05 22:43:59 INFO zookeeper.Login: successfully logged in.
11/12/05 22:43:59 INFO client.ZooKeeperSaslClient: Client will use GSSAPI as SASL mechanism.
11/12/05 22:43:59 INFO zookeeper.Login: TGT refresh thread started.
11/12/05 22:43:59 INFO zookeeper.ClientCnxn: Socket connection established to ip-10-166-175-249.us-west-1.compute.internal/10.166.175.249:2181, initiating session
11/12/05 22:43:59 INFO zookeeper.Login: TGT valid starting at:        Mon Dec 05 22:43:59 UTC 2011
11/12/05 22:43:59 INFO zookeeper.Login: TGT expires:                  Tue Dec 06 22:43:59 UTC 2011
11/12/05 22:43:59 INFO zookeeper.Login: TGT refresh sleeping until: Tue Dec 06 18:30:37 UTC 2011
11/12/05 22:43:59 INFO zookeeper.ClientCnxn: Session establishment complete on server ip-10-166-175-249.us-west-1.compute.internal/10.166.175.249:2181, sessionid = 0x134106594320000, negotiated timeout = 180000
                </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="2.5.2.6. Configuration from Scratch" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t658" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e1328" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>16.2.6. 从头开始配置</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
在当前标准的 Amazon Linux AMI上测试通过. 先按上面的描述配置 KDC 和 主要节点. 然后获取代码并执行检测.<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_182_1519019" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                git clone git://git.apache.org/hbase.git
                cd hbase
                mvn -Psecurity,localTests clean test -Dtest=TestZooKeeperACL
                </pre>再按上面描述配置 HBase. 手工编辑target/cached_classpath.txt (如下)..<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_183_2372604" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                bin/hbase zookeeper &amp;
                bin/hbase master &amp;
                bin/hbase regionserver &amp;
                </pre></div>

<div class="section" title="2.5.2.7.1. Fix target/cached_classpath.txt" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h4 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t660" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1934e1340" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>16.2.7.1. 完善 target/cached_classpath.txt</h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
必须在 <code class="code">target/cached_classpath.txt</code> 重写标准 hadoop-core jar 文件为包含 HADOOP-7070 修改的版本。可以使用下列脚本完成:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_184_8766086" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">                  echo `find ~/.m2 -name "*hadoop-core*7070*SNAPSHOT.jar"` ':' `cat target/cached_classpath.txt` | sed 's/ //g' &gt; target/tmp.txt 
                  mv target/tmp.txt target/cached_classpath.txt
                  </pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>

<a target="_blank" name="t663" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>Chapter 17. 社区</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<strong>Table of Contents</strong></p>
<dl style="margin:0.8em 0px; line-height:1.2"><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#decisions" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">17.1. 决策</a></dt><dd>
<dl style="margin:0.8em 0px; line-height:1.2"><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#feature_branches" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">17.1.1. 特征分支</a></dt><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#patchplusonepolicy" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">17.1.2. 补丁 +1 政策</a></dt></dl>
</dd><dt><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#community.roles" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">17.2. 社区角色</a></dt><dd>

</dd></dl>

<div title="17.1. Decisions" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t664" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="decisions" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>17.1. 决策</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div title="17.1.1. Feature Branches" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t665" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="feature_branches" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>17.1.1. 特征分支</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
特征分支很容易制作。你可以不是代码提交者。只需提供需要添加到JIRA上的分支名称到开发者邮件列表，代码提交者会为你添加。然后你可以在你的特征分支下提交发行文件到Apache HBase (TM) JIRA。你的代码保留在别处——一定要公开以便观察到——你可以在开发邮件列表更新进度。当特征已经准备好提交时，3+1 位代码提交者将合并你的特征。[<a target="_blank" name="d352e11068" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d352e11068" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">34</a>]</p>
</div>
<div title="17.1.2. Patch +1 Policy" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t666" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="patchplusonepolicy" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>17.1.2. 补丁 +1 政策</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
The below policy is something we put in place 09/2012. It is a suggested policy rather than a hard requirement. We want to try it first to see if it works before we cast it in stone.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Apache HBase is made of <a target="_blank" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE#selectedTab=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.project%3Acomponents-panel" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">components</a>. Components
 have one or more <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#OWNER" rel="nofollow" title="17.2.1. Component Owner" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section 17.2.1, “Component Owner”</a>s. See the 'Description' field on the <a target="_blank" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE#selectedTab=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.project%3Acomponents-panel" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">components</a> JIRA
 page for who the current owners are by component.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Patches that fit within the scope of a single Apache HBase component require, at least, a +1 by one of the component's owners before commit. If owners are absent -- busy or otherwise -- two +1s by non-owners will suffice.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Patches that span components need at least two +1s before they can be committed, preferably +1s by owners of components touched by the x-component patch (TODO: This needs tightening up but I think fine for first pass).</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Any -1 on a patch by anyone vetos a patch; it cannot be committed until the justification for the -1 is addressed.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div title="17.2. Community Roles" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t667" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="community.roles" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>17.2. 社区角色</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div title="17.2.1. Component Owner" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t668" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="OWNER" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>17.2.1. 组件所有者</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
组件所有者列在Apache HBase JIRA <a target="_blank" href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE#selectedTab=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.project%3Acomponents-panel" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">components</a>页的描述域内。所有者列在描述域而不是“组件领导者”域，因为后者只允许列一个人，而我们鼓励组件由多人所有。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Owners are volunteers who are (usually, but not necessarily) expert in their component domain and may have an agenda on how they think their Apache HBase component should evolve.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Duties include:</p>
<div style="margin:0px">
<ol type="1" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Owners will try and review patches that land within their component's scope.</p>
</li><li>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If applicable, if an owner has an agenda, they will publish their goals or the design toward which they are driving their component</p>
</li></ol>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If you would like to be volunteer as a component owner, just write the dev list and we'll sign you up. Owners do not need to be committers.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div style="margin:0px"><br>
<hr width="100" align="left" style="margin:0.6em; border-top-width:0px; border-right-width:0px; border-left-width:0px; border-style:solid; border-color:rgb(206,206,206)">
<div style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
[<a target="_blank" id="ftn.d352e11068" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d352e11068" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">34</a>] See <a target="_blank" href="http://search-hadoop.com/m/asM982C5FkS1" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">HBase,
 mail # dev - Thoughts about large feature dev branches</a></p>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
 </p>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="appendix" title="Appendix B. hbck In Depth" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t679" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbck.in.depth" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>附录B. 深入hbck</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="toc" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<strong>Table of Contents</strong></p>
<dl style="margin:0.8em 0px; line-height:1.2"><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d1952e10633" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">B.1. 运行 hbck 定位不一致的地方</a></span></dt><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d1952e10646" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">B.2. 不一致</a></span></dt><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d1952e10665" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">B.3. 本地修复</a></span></dt><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d1952e10703" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">B.4. 区域叠加修复</a></span></dt><dd>
<dl style="margin:0.8em 0px; line-height:1.2"><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d1952e10742" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">B.4.1. 特例: Meta 没有正确分配</a></span></dt><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d1952e10751" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">B.4.2. <span class="title">特例: HBase 版本文件丢失</span></a></span></dt><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d1952e10758" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">B.4.3. <span class="title">特例: Root 和 META 损毁</span>.</a></span></dt></dl>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBaseFsck (hbck) 是一个检查区域一致性和表完整性问题的工具，可以修复损坏的HBase. 它工作在两个基本模式-- 只读不一致性定位模式和多相读写修复模式。</p>
<div class="section" title="B.1. Running hbck to identify inconsistencies" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t680" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1952e10633" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>B.1. 运行 hbck 定位不一致性</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
要检查HBase集群是否损坏，在HBase集群中运行 hbck ：<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_185_2509611" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/hbase hbck
</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
命令输出结束的地方，会打印OK 或告诉你多少损坏(INCONSISTENCIES)出现。你也许想运行hbck几次，因为一些损坏可能是暂时的。(如集群正启动或区域正分裂)。 从运维来说，你可能希望有规律运行hbck 并在反复报告不一致性时设置报警(如通过 nagios) 。 A run of hbck will report a list of inconsistencies along with a brief description of the regions and tables affected. The
 using the <code class="code">-details</code> option will report more details including a representative listing of all the splits present in all the tables.</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_186_920980" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/hbase hbck -details
</pre></div>
<div class="section" title="B.2. Inconsistencies" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t681" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1952e10646" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>B.2. 不一致</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If after several runs, inconsistencies continue to be reported, you may have encountered a corruption. These should be rare, but in the event they occur newer versions of HBase include the hbck tool enabled with automatic repair options.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
There are two invariants that when violated create inconsistencies in HBase:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">HBase’s region consistency invariant is satisfied if every region is assigned and deployed on exactly one region server, and all places where this state kept is in accordance.</li><li class="listitem">HBase’s table integrity invariant is satisfied if for each table, every possible row key resolves to exactly one region.</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Repairs generally work in three phases -- a read-only information gathering phase that identifies inconsistencies, a table integrity repair phase that restores the table integrity invariant, and then finally a region consistency repair phase that restores the
 region consistency invariant. Starting from version 0.90.0, hbck could detect region consistency problems report on a subset of possible table integrity problems. It also included the ability to automatically fix the most common inconsistency, region assignment
 and deployment consistency problems. This repair could be done by using the <code class="code">-fix</code> command line option. These problems close regions if they are open on the wrong server or on multiple region servers and also assigns regions to region
 servers if they are not open.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Starting from HBase versions 0.90.7, 0.92.2 and 0.94.0, several new command line options are introduced to aid repairing a corrupted HBase. This hbck sometimes goes by the nickname “uberhbck”. Each particular version of uber hbck is compatible with the HBase’s
 of the same major version (0.90.7 uberhbck can repair a 0.90.4). However, versions &lt;=0.90.6 and versions &lt;=0.92.1 may require restarting the master or failing over to a backup master.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="B.3. Localized repairs" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t682" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1952e10665" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>B.3. 本地修复</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
When repairing a corrupted HBase, it is best to repair the lowest risk inconsistencies first. These are generally region consistency repairs -- localized single region repairs, that only modify in-memory data, ephemeral zookeeper data, or patch holes in the
 META table. Region consistency requires that the HBase instance has the state of the region’s data in HDFS (.regioninfo files), the region’s row in the .META. table., and region’s deployment/assignments on region servers and the master in accordance. Options
 for repairing region consistency include:</p>
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem"><code class="code">-fixAssignments</code> (equivalent to the 0.90 <code class="code">-fix</code> option) repairs unassigned, incorrectly assigned or multiply assigned regions.</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">-fixMeta</code> which removes meta rows when corresponding regions are not present in HDFS and adds new meta rows if they regions are present in HDFS while not in META.</li></ul>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
To fix deployment and assignment problems you can run this command:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_187_3759432" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/hbase hbck -fixAssignments
</pre>To fix deployment and assignment problems as well as repairing incorrect meta rows you can run this command:.<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_188_7677679" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/hbase hbck -fixAssignments -fixMeta
</pre>There are a few classes of table integrity problems that are low risk repairs. The first two are degenerate (startkey
 == endkey) regions and backwards regions (startkey &gt; endkey). These are automatically handled by sidelining the data to a temporary directory (/hbck/xxxx). The third low-risk class is hdfs region holes. This can be repaired by using the:
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem"><code class="code">-fixHdfsHoles</code> option for fabricating new empty regions on the file system. If holes are detected you can use -fixHdfsHoles and should include -fixMeta and -fixAssignments to make the new region consistent.</li></ul>
</div>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_189_7974857" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/hbase hbck -fixAssignments -fixMeta -fixHdfsHoles
</pre>Since this is a common operation, we’ve added a the <code class="code">-repairHoles</code> flag that is equivalent to the previous command:<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_190_9700494" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/hbase hbck -repairHoles
</pre>If inconsistencies still remain after these steps, you most likely have table integrity
 problems related to orphaned or overlapping regions.</div>
<div class="section" title="B.4. Region Overlap Repairs" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t683" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1952e10703" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>B.4. 区域叠加修复</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
Table integrity problems can require repairs that deal with overlaps. This is a riskier operation because it requires modifications to the file system, requires some decision making, and may require some manual steps. For these repairs it is best to analyze
 the output of a <code class="code">hbck -details</code> run so that you isolate repairs attempts only upon problems the checks identify. Because this is riskier, there are safeguard that should be used to limit the scope of the repairs. WARNING: This is a
 relatively new and have only been tested on online but idle HBase instances (no reads/writes). Use at your own risk in an active production environment! The options for repairing table integrity violations include:
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem"><code class="code">-fixHdfsOrphans</code> option for “adopting” a region directory that is missing a region metadata file (the .regioninfo file).</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">-fixHdfsOverlaps</code> ability for fixing overlapping regions</li></ul>
</div>
When repairing overlapping regions, a region’s data can be modified on the file system in two ways: 1) by merging regions into a larger region or 2) by sidelining regions by moving data to “sideline” directory where data could be restored later. Merging a large
 number of regions is technically correct but could result in an extremely large region that requires series of costly compactions and splitting operations. In these cases, it is probably better to sideline the regions that overlap with the most other regions
 (likely the largest ranges) so that merges can happen on a more reasonable scale. Since these sidelined regions are already laid out in HBase’s native directory and HFile format, they can be restored by using HBase’s bulk load mechanism. The default safeguard
 thresholds are conservative. These options let you override the default thresholds and to enable the large region sidelining feature.
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem"><code class="code">-maxMerge &lt;n&gt;</code> maximum number of overlapping regions to merge</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">-sidelineBigOverlaps</code> if more than maxMerge regions are overlapping, sideline attempt to sideline the regions overlapping with the most other regions.</li><li class="listitem"><code class="code">-maxOverlapsToSideline &lt;n&gt;</code> if sidelining large overlapping regions, sideline at most n regions.</li></ul>
</div>
Since often times you would just want to get the tables repaired, you can use this option to turn on all repair options:
<div class="itemizedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ul class="itemizedlist" type="disc" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem"><code class="code">-repair</code> includes all the region consistency options and only the hole repairing table integrity options.</li></ul>
</div>
Finally, there are safeguards to limit repairs to only specific tables. For example the following command would only attempt to repair table TableFoo and TableBar.<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_191_6409622" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/hbase/ hbck -repair TableFoo TableBar
</pre>
<div class="section" title="B.4.1. Special cases: Meta is not properly assigned" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t684" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1952e10742" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>B.4.1. 特例: Meta 没有正确分配</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
There are a few special cases that hbck can handle as well. Sometimes the meta table’s only region is inconsistently assigned or deployed. In this case there is a special <code class="code">-fixMetaOnly</code> option that can try to fix meta assignments.<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_192_4787972" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/hbase hbck -fixMetaOnly -fixAssignments
</pre></div>
<div class="section" title="B.4.2. Special cases: HBase version file is missing" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t685" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1952e10751" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>B.4.2. 特例: HBase 版本文件丢失</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
HBase’s data on the file system requires a version file in order to start. If this flie is missing, you can use the <code class="code">-fixVersionFile</code> option to fabricating a new HBase version file. This assumes that the version of hbck you are running
 is the appropriate version for the HBase cluster.</div>
<div class="section" title="B.4.3. Special case: Root and META are corrupt." style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h3 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -46.8125px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t686" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="d1952e10758" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>B.4.3. 特例: Root 和 META 损毁.</h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
最严重损坏场景是 ROOT 或 META 损坏，HBase 启动失败。这种情况可以使用OfflineMetaRepair 工具创建新的ROOT和META 区域和表。 This tool assumes that HBase is offline. It then marches through the existing HBase home directory, loads as much information from region metadata files (.regioninfo files) as
 possible from the file system. If the region metadata has proper table integrity, it sidelines the original root and meta table directories, and builds new ones with pointers to the region directories and their data.<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_193_9578271" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ ./bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.OfflineMetaRepair
</pre>NOTE: This tool is not
 as clever as uberhbck but can be used to bootstrap repairs that uberhbck can complete. If the tool succeeds you should be able to start hbase and run online repairs if necessary.</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="appendix" title="Appendix B. HBase中的压缩" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3">
<a target="_blank" name="t687" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="compression" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>Appendix C. HBase中的压缩</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="toc" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<strong>Table of Contents</strong></p>
<dl style="margin:0.8em 0px; line-height:1.2"><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#compression.test" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">B.1. 测试压缩工具</a></span></dt><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hbase.regionserver.codecs" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">B.2. <code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.codecs</code></a></span></dt><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#lzo.compression" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">B.3. LZO</a></span></dt><dt><span class="section"><a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#gzip.compression" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">B.4. GZIP</a></span></dt></dl>
</div>
<div class="section" title="B.1. 测试压缩工具" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t688" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="compression.test" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>C.1. 测试压缩工具</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
HBase有一个用来测试压缩新的工具。要想运行它，输入<code class="code">/bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.CompressionTest</code>. 就会有提示这个工具的具体用法</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="B.2.  hbase.regionserver.codecs" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t689" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="hbase.regionserver.codecs" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>C.2.  <code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.codecs</code></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
如果你的安装错误，就会测试不成功，或者无法启动。可以在你的<code class="filename" style="color:rgb(0,122,0)">hbase-site.xml</code>加上配置 <code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.codecs </code>值你需要的codecs。例如，如果 <code class="varname">hbase.regionserver.codecs </code>的值是 <code class="code">lzo,gz</code> 同时lzo不存在或者没有正确安装，
 RegionServer在启动的时候会提示配置错误。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
当一台新机器加入到集群中的时候，管理员一定要注意，这台新机器有可能要安装特定的压缩解码器。</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="B.3.  LZO" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t690" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="lzo.compression" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>C.3.  LZO</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
很不幸，HBase是Apache的协议，而LZO是GPL的协议。HBase不能自带LZO，因此LZO需要在安装HBase之前安装。参见 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://wiki.apache.org/hadoop/UsingLzoCompression" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">使用 LZO 压缩</a>介绍了如何在HBase中使用LZO</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
一个常见的问题是，用户在一开始使用LZO的时候会很好，但是数月过去，管理员在给集群添加集群的时候，他们忘记了LZO的事情。在0.90.0版本之后，我们会运行失败，但也有可能不。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
参考 <a target="_blank" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#hbase.regionserver.codecs.html" rel="nofollow" title="C.2.  hbase.regionserver.codecs" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Section C.2, “ hbase.regionserver.codecs ”</a> for a feature
 to help protect against failed LZO install.</p>
</div>
<div class="section" title="B.4.  GZIP" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t691" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="gzip.compression" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>C.4.  GZIP</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
相对于LZO，GZIP的压缩率更高但是速度更慢。在某些特定情况下，压缩率是优先考量的。Java会使用Java自带的GZIP，除非Hadoop的本地库在CLASSPATH中。在这种情况下，最好使用本地压缩器。(如果本地库不存在，可以在Log看到很多<span class="emphasis"><em>Got brand-new compressor</em></span>。参见<a target="_blank" class="xref" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#brand.new.compressor" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Q: </a>)</p>
<div class="section" title="C.5.  SNAPPY" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t692" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="snappy.compression" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>C.5.  SNAPPY</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
If snappy is installed, HBase can make use of it (courtesy of <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://code.google.com/p/hadoop-snappy/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">hadoop-snappy</a> <sup>[<a target="_blank" name="d1934e10793" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#ftn.d1934e10793" rel="nofollow" class="footnote" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">29</a>]</sup>).</p>
<div class="orderedlist" style="margin:0px">
<ol class="orderedlist" type="1" style="margin:0px 0px 0px 78.015625px; line-height:1.2">
<li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Build and install <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://code.google.com/p/snappy/" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">snappy</a> on all nodes of your cluster.</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Use CompressionTest to verify snappy support is enabled and the libs can be loaded ON ALL NODES of your cluster:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_194_1860316" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.CompressionTest hdfs://host/path/to/hbase snappy</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</li><li class="listitem">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
Create a column family with snappy compression and verify it in the hbase shell:</p>
<pre code_snippet_id="615022" snippet_file_name="blog_20150309_195_5745544" class="programlisting" name="code" style="white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 0.75em; margin-bottom: 0.75em; line-height: 1; padding: 1ex; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);">$ hbase&gt; create 't1', { NAME =&gt; 'cf1', COMPRESSION =&gt; 'SNAPPY' }
hbase&gt; describe 't1'</pre>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
In the output of the "describe" command, you need to ensure it lists "COMPRESSION =&gt; 'SNAPPY'"</p>
</li></ol>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
<div class="footnotes" style="margin:0px"><br>
<hr width="100" align="left" style="margin:0.6em; border-top-width:0px; border-right-width:0px; border-left-width:0px; border-style:solid; border-color:rgb(206,206,206)">
<div class="footnote" style="margin:0px">
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
<sup>[<a target="_blank" id="ftn.d1934e10793" href="http://abloz.com/hbase/book.html#d1934e10793" rel="nofollow" class="para" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">29</a>] </sup>参考 <a target="_blank" class="link" href="http://search-hadoop.com/m/Ds8d51c263B1/%2522Hadoop-Snappy+in+synch+with+Hadoop+trunk%2522&amp;subj=Hadoop+Snappy+in+synch+with+Hadoop+trunk" rel="nofollow" style="color:rgb(255,153,0); text-decoration:none">Alejandro's
 note</a> up on the list on difference between Snappy in Hadoop and Snappy in HBase</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" title="C.6. Changing Compression Schemes" style="margin:0px">
<div class="titlepage" style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<div style="margin:0px">
<h2 class="title" style="margin:0.8em 0px 0px -62.40625px; padding:0px; color:rgb(153,0,0); line-height:1.3; clear:both">
<a target="_blank" name="t693" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a><a target="_blank" name="changing.compression" style="color:rgb(255,153,0)"></a>C.6. Changing Compression Schemes</h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
A frequent question on the dist-list is how to change compression schemes for ColumnFamilies. This is actually quite simple, and can be done via an alter command. Because the compression scheme is encoded at the block-level in StoreFiles, the table does <span class="emphasis"><em>not</em></span> need
 to be re-created and the data does <span class="emphasis"><em>not</em></span> copied somewhere else. Just make sure the old codec is still available until you are sure that all of the old StoreFiles have been compacted.</p>
</div>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px">
</p>
</div>
</div>
